translation.zh: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
translation.en: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
translation.medium: Chongqing Vocational College tries out modern apprentice system on admission of new students-China News Service
translation.reference: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
translation.en: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
translation.source: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
translation.medium: Yesterday, reporters learned from the municipal Education Committee that starting this year, our city will pilot the “modern apprentice” talent training mode in 60 vocational schools. Students who participate in the pilot will be trained as apprentices while studying, and will be enrolled as regular employees of the enterprise after they are admitted.
translation.reference: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.

translation.zh: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
translation.en: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
translation.source: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
translation.medium: The municipal education committee requires that the recruitment and employment process of vocational schools be regulated, and the dual identity of students as both vocational school students and employees of enterprises be clearly defined. According to the principle of mutual selection, students, schools, and enterprises sign a tripartite agreement. For students under 18 years old who are not yet 16 years old, a quadripartite agreement must be signed by the student, guardian, school, and enterprise to determine the rights and specific positions, teaching content, and rights protection of the student during on-the-job training.
translation.reference: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.

translation.zh: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
translation.source: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
translation.medium: Encourage试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.

translation.zh: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
translation.source: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
translation.medium: The experimental school wants to reform the mode of talent training.
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.

translation.zh: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
translation.source: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
translation.medium: The school and enterprise jointly design the talent training plan, and formulate professional teaching standards, curriculum standards, position standards, enterprise tutor standards, quality monitoring standards and relevant implementation plans.
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.

translation.zh: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
translation.en: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
translation.source: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
translation.medium: The pilot program aims to cultivate the educational system. Students determine their internship time in enterprises according to the plan of cultivating talents. Generally, on-the-job training lasts for 6 months.
translation.reference: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.

translation.zh: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
translation.en: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
translation.source: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
translation.medium: In enterprise practice, the enterprise team management model should be implemented. According to the different characteristics of the profession, 1 teacher can lead 2-5 students to form a learning group, so that students can master the skills required for each training position.
translation.reference: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.

translation.zh: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
translation.en: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
translation.source: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
translation.medium: According to the arrangement, from 2016 to August 2019, our city divided into three batches to determine 60 city-level modern apprentices, with a total of 3000 students (apprentices).
translation.reference: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.

translation.zh: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
translation.en: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
translation.source: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
translation.medium: on a trial basis and then promote it. The principle of exploring a long-term mechanism for establishing school-enterprise partnerships, joint training and integration of human resources will be gradually promoted. This will effectively improve the employment skills of students and increase their employment rate and quality.
translation.reference: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.

translation.zh: 我的 App 显示已送达，但我还没收到
translation.en: My App says it’s delivered, but I haven’t received it.
translation.source: 我的 App 显示已送达，但我还没收到
translation.medium: My app says it's delivered but I haven't received it
translation.reference: My App says it’s delivered, but I haven’t received it.

translation.zh: 刚刚叫了个外卖，我不知道挂在了门口
translation.en: I just ordered food and I didn’t know it was hung on the door handle.
translation.source: 刚刚叫了个外卖，我不知道挂在了门口
translation.medium: Just ordered takeout, don't know if it's at the door
translation.reference: I just ordered food and I didn’t know it was hung on the door handle.

translation.zh: 然后叫重送
translation.en: and ask for a re-delivery
translation.source: 然后叫重送
translation.medium: Then call for a replay
translation.reference: and ask for a re-delivery

translation.zh: 我住在上水，为何订单会在海辉花园
translation.en: I live in Shangshui, and why is the order in Haihui Garden?
translation.source: 我住在上水，为何订单会在海辉花园
translation.medium: I live on the upstream side, why did the order go to the Hangzhou Flower Garden
translation.reference: I live in Shangshui, and why is the order in Haihui Garden?

translation.zh: 地址弄错了吗
translation.en: Is the address wrong?
translation.source: 地址弄错了吗
translation.medium: Did you enter the wrong address?
translation.reference: Is the address wrong?

translation.zh: 这款吸尘器考虑很久了，最后狠心割草，吸尘效果不错，家里粉尘明显少多了，就是单手拿有点沉；湿拖有待改善，来回脱会有尘痕；总体还是很满意的
translation.en: I’ve been paying attention to this vacuum cleaner for a long time, and finally decided to buy it; with good dust collecting function, there is much less dust at home, but it is a litter heavier when being held with a single hand; the wet mopping function shall be further improved, for there are traces of dust when mopping with it back and forth; generally speaking, it is satisfactory.
translation.source: 这款吸尘器考虑很久了，最后狠心割草，吸尘效果不错，家里粉尘明显少多了，就是单手拿有点沉；湿拖有待改善，来回脱会有尘痕；总体还是很满意的
translation.medium: This vacuum cleaner has been considered for a long time. In the end, it is reluctant to cut grass, and the suction effect is not bad. The indoor dust is significantly less, but it is a bit heavy to hold; the wet cleaning needs to be improved, and there will be dust when it is returned; overall, it is still satisfied.
translation.reference: I’ve been paying attention to this vacuum cleaner for a long time, and finally decided to buy it; with good dust collecting function, there is much less dust at home, but it is a litter heavier when being held with a single hand; the wet mopping function shall be further improved, for there are traces of dust when mopping with it back and forth; generally speaking, it is satisfactory.

translation.zh: 料理机挺沉的，看着高大上，适合我这种厨房小白，孩子说比我自己炒的好吃，做过两荤两素，糖醋排骨尤为好吃，时间久点，其他用时很短，噪音很小，不用担心炒糊，也不用担心不会做了！
translation.en: The food processer is heavy and looks luxurious, suitable for beginners in kitchen like me, and my child said the dishes cooked by the food processer were more delicious than what I cooked; I cooked two meat dishes and two vegetable dishes with it, and the sweet and sour ribs were especially delicious although they took longer time; it cooked the other dishes with less time and very small noises; I’ll never worry about over cooking or not capable of cooking certain dishes!
translation.source: 料理机挺沉的，看着高大上，适合我这种厨房小白，孩子说比我自己炒的好吃，做过两荤两素，糖醋排骨尤为好吃，时间久点，其他用时很短，噪音很小，不用担心炒糊，也不用担心不会做了！
translation.medium: The food processor is really immersive, looking up at the high ceiling, it is suitable for me, a cooking novice. My child said that it tasted better than what I fried. I have made twice-cooked and double-boiled dishes before, and the sweet and sour pork is especially delicious. It takes a long time, but the other dishes take very little time, and the noise is very small, so you do not have to worry that it will not turn out, nor do you have to worry that it will be too noisy!
translation.reference: The food processer is heavy and looks luxurious, suitable for beginners in kitchen like me, and my child said the dishes cooked by the food processer were more delicious than what I cooked; I cooked two meat dishes and two vegetable dishes with it, and the sweet and sour ribs were especially delicious although they took longer time; it cooked the other dishes with less time and very small noises; I’ll never worry about over cooking or not capable of cooking certain dishes!

translation.zh: 收到货，中午迫不及待炒了三个菜，真是科技改变生活，火候和调料的把控**精准，菜的口感直接升级为大厨级别，不错，对于不善于下厨的**是神器，推荐购买！
translation.en: I cooked three dishes with it at noon as soon as I received it; science and technology can really change our life; the duration of heating and the seasoning were controlled in an accurate way, and the dishes were really delicious; it is really a magic tool for new hands in the kitchen, and I strongly recommend it!
translation.source: 收到货，中午迫不及待炒了三个菜，真是科技改变生活，火候和调料的把控**精准，菜的口感直接升级为大厨级别，不错，对于不善于下厨的**是神器，推荐购买！
translation.medium: Received the goods. Could not wait to cook three dishes. Really, technology has changed life. The control of heat and seasonings of the wok is so precise that the taste of the dish is directly upgraded to the level of a professional chef. It is good. For those who are not good at cooking, this is a great tool. Recommended for purchase!
translation.reference: I cooked three dishes with it at noon as soon as I received it; science and technology can really change our life; the duration of heating and the seasoning were controlled in an accurate way, and the dishes were really delicious; it is really a magic tool for new hands in the kitchen, and I strongly recommend it!

translation.zh: 我给厨房又添置了新成员。
translation.en: I’ve added a new member to my kitchen.
translation.source: 我给厨房又添置了新成员。
translation.medium: I have added a new member to the kitchen.
translation.reference: I’ve added a new member to my kitchen.

translation.zh: 智能料理机，自动调控火候、自动翻炒的那种。
translation.en: A smart food processor, which can control the duration of heating as well as stir and fry automatically.
translation.source: 智能料理机，自动调控火候、自动翻炒的那种。
translation.medium: It is an intelligent cooking machine that automatically adjusts the flame and flips over by itself.
translation.reference: A smart food processor, which can control the duration of heating as well as stir and fry automatically.

translation.zh: 再也不用害怕被热油烫到，再也不用害怕控制不好火候把菜炒焦或者夹生了。
translation.en: I’ll never worry about getting hot oil on my skin, or getting burnt or half-cooked dishes due to lack of control of the heating.
translation.source: 再也不用害怕被热油烫到，再也不用害怕控制不好火候把菜炒焦或者夹生了。
translation.medium: We no longer have to be afraid of being scalded by hot oil, and we no longer have to be afraid that the fire is not well-controlled and the dishes are burned or stuck.
translation.reference: I’ll never worry about getting hot oil on my skin, or getting burnt or half-cooked dishes due to lack of control of the heating.

translation.zh: 炒出来的的菜比我弄得好吃多了，番茄炒蛋都炒得特别入味，鸡蛋口感特别好。
translation.en: The dishes cooked by the food processor are much more delicious than what I cook; the fried eggs with tomatoes are really tasty, with especially good texture of the eggs.
translation.source: 炒出来的的菜比我弄得好吃多了，番茄炒蛋都炒得特别入味，鸡蛋口感特别好。
translation.medium: The dishes that were cooked were much tastier than what I had made, especially the tomato and egg dish which had a particularly nice flavor and texture.
translation.reference: The dishes cooked by the food processor are much more delicious than what I cook; the fried eggs with tomatoes are really tasty, with especially good texture of the eggs.

translation.zh: 这个锅买得好值。
translation.en: The pot is worth the money.
translation.source: 这个锅买得好值。
translation.medium: This pot is worth the price.
translation.reference: The pot is worth the money.

translation.zh: 东西不错，值得购买，非常好
translation.en: The product is good, worth buying, really nice.
translation.source: 东西不错，值得购买，非常好
translation.medium: Everything is good, worth buying, very good.
translation.reference: The product is good, worth buying, really nice.

translation.zh: 整体很好，很清晰，跟描述的一致。
translation.en: Overall, it’s good, clear, and the same as described.
translation.source: 整体很好，很清晰，跟描述的一致。
translation.medium: Very good, very clear, consistent with the description.
translation.reference: Overall, it’s good, clear, and the same as described.

translation.zh: 值得拥有。
translation.en: It is worth buying.
translation.source: 值得拥有。
translation.medium: Worth having.
translation.reference: It is worth buying.

translation.zh: 客服也非常好。
translation.en: Customer service is very good.
translation.source: 客服也非常好。
translation.medium: The customer service is also very good.
translation.reference: Customer service is very good.

translation.zh: 屏幕大，清楚，眼睛不累，暂没发现其他异常
translation.en: The big and clear screen is friendly to my eyes, and no abnormality has been detected so far.
translation.source: 屏幕大，清楚，眼睛不累，暂没发现其他异常
translation.medium: The screen is large, clear, and does not tire the eyes. No abnormalities have been found so far.
translation.reference: The big and clear screen is friendly to my eyes, and no abnormality has been detected so far.

translation.zh: 比现在主流的显示器厚了不少，还有就是边框宽了点，边框和屏幕的缝隙有点大，不过屏幕显示效果不错，配件齐全
translation.en: It’s much thicker than the mainstream monitors at present, and the frame is a little bit wide; the gap between the frame and the screen is a little bit large; but the display effect is good and the accessories are complete.
translation.source: 比现在主流的显示器厚了不少，还有就是边框宽了点，边框和屏幕的缝隙有点大，不过屏幕显示效果不错，配件齐全
translation.medium: It is thicker than the current mainstream displays. In addition, the bezel is a bit wider, and the seam between the bezel and the screen is a bit large. However, the screen display effect is good, and the accessories are complete.
translation.reference: It’s much thicker than the mainstream monitors at present, and the frame is a little bit wide; the gap between the frame and the screen is a little bit large; but the display effect is good and the accessories are complete.

translation.zh: 物流速度快！
translation.en: Shipping is fast!
translation.source: 物流速度快！
translation.medium: 物流速度快!
translation.reference: Shipping is fast!

translation.zh: 商家服务态度好！
translation.en: The seller has great service attitude!
translation.source: 商家服务态度好！
translation.medium: The merchant service attitude is good!
translation.reference: The seller has great service attitude!

translation.zh: 用了一段时间，质量不错，屏幕分辨率也很清晰。
translation.en: I’ve used it for some time; it is of high quality, with clear screen resolution.
translation.source: 用了一段时间，质量不错，屏幕分辨率也很清晰。
translation.medium: It has taken a bit of time, but the quality is good, and the screen resolution is also very clear.
translation.reference: I’ve used it for some time; it is of high quality, with clear screen resolution.

translation.zh: 炒股非常棒，一分4，太完美了
translation.en: It’s perfect for speculating on the stock market, and one screen can be split into four, perfect!
translation.source: 炒股非常棒，一分4，太完美了
translation.medium: Fried stock is very good, 4 points, too perfect
translation.reference: It’s perfect for speculating on the stock market, and one screen can be split into four, perfect!

translation.zh: 物流快，东西好，买的第二台，的确是好东西，显示画面高质量，不因为屏幕大而失真，接口全。
translation.en: Fast shipping, good product; it’s the second one I’ve bought and it is indeed good with high quality screen display and no distortion due to the large screen; the interfaces are complete as well.
translation.source: 物流快，东西好，买的第二台，的确是好东西，显示画面高质量，不因为屏幕大而失真，接口全。
translation.medium: 物流快，东西好，买的第二台，的确是好东西，显示画面高质量，不因为屏幕大而失真，接口全
translation.reference: Fast shipping, good product; it’s the second one I’ve bought and it is indeed good with high quality screen display and no distortion due to the large screen; the interfaces are complete as well.

translation.zh: 感观不错，色彩还原好，质量可以！
translation.en: Nice perception, good color rendition performance and high quality!
translation.source: 感观不错，色彩还原好，质量可以！
translation.medium: Great screen, good color restoration, quality is fine!
translation.reference: Nice perception, good color rendition performance and high quality!

translation.zh: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
translation.en: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
translation.source: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
translation.medium: China Children's Center will hold a series of activities for children to experience "high technology" during the "61".
translation.reference: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
translation.source: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Beijing May 20 wire (Huang Xiaohui, Zhou Jingjing) reporter 20th learned from the China Children's Center that from May 28 to June 1 "Children's Day" before and after, the China Children's Center will hold a series of children's creative experience and children's art festivals, and let the children spend the "Children's Day" under the charm of front-end technology.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.

translation.zh: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
translation.en: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
translation.source: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
translation.medium: It is understood that the activities held by China Children's Center during this year's "Children's Day" on June 1 include "Love Family, Create Future" children's future education carnival, the first children's visual art festival, "Books Bring Happiness" event and "Family Reading" comic book series activities.
translation.reference: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.

translation.zh: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
translation.en: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
translation.source: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
translation.medium: At the 2016 "Children's Day" media briefing held on June 20, Deputy Director of the China Children's Center Li Zhongming said that "Love Family, Create Future" is the key event for this year's China Children's Center "Children's Day" celebrations.
translation.reference: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.

translation.zh: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
translation.en: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
translation.source: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
translation.medium: The activity focuses on integrating social innovation with family personal creativity, through the participation of children and families in various innovative educational activities, making innovative practice become a cultural gene of the masses, and making "doing" become a new learning and living way for the majority of families.
translation.reference: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.

translation.zh: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
translation.en: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
translation.source: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
translation.medium: It is understood that the “Love Family, Create Future” children’s future education program includes more than 30 leading-edge technology experience content, such as “Douban Creator” children’s experience activities, the 1st anniversary celebration of “Cowboys Children’s Exploration Museum” and “Explore the Whole Family Love Children’s Carnival”, VR full-民体验 plan, “Creator Tribe” interactive workshop and so on.
translation.reference: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.

translation.zh: 烧五花肉饭变泡菜五花肉饭

translation.source: 会不会又要买够 $100、$200 才能用
translation.medium: Can we buy enough for $100 or $200?
translation.reference: Would it be possible that you can only use it when you buy $100 or $200?

translation.zh: 令人担心，究竟要等多久才会完成

translation.reference: It’s worrying, how long do I have to wait before it arrives?

translation.en: Okay, thanks for the help.

translation.medium: Can you help me follow up?

translation.en: The restaurant said the food had been cooked for more than half an hour.
translation.source: 餐厅表示已经煮好食物半个多小时了
translation.medium: The restaurant said the food had been cooking for more than half an hour
translation.reference: The restaurant said the food had been cooked for more than half an hour.

translation.medium: But no-one has been in to rob food

translation.zh: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
translation.en: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
translation.source: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
translation.medium: South African doctor: Oomycete spread is strong but mostly mild
translation.reference: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases

translation.zh: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
translation.en: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
translation.source: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
translation.medium: Many doctors and health experts in South Africa believe that the symptoms caused by the new coronavirus are milder than those caused by the Deltavirus, although the spreading speed is faster.
translation.reference: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.

translation.zh: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
translation.en: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
translation.source: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
translation.medium: According to the Associated Press, as the spread of the Omega variant in South Africa, a group of more than 5,000 doctors in Johannesburg, South Africa reported that the symptoms of the patients they are currently treating are mild, such as body aches and coughing, similar to flu-like symptoms.
translation.reference: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.

translation.zh: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
translation.en: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
translation.source: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
translation.medium: The organization's chief medical officer, Dr. Unben Pillay, said he was seeing dozens of patients each day but none required hospitalization.
translation.reference: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.

translation.zh: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
translation.en: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
translation.source: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
translation.medium: They are able to control the illness at home and most people recover within 10 to 14 days, Mr Pelley said.
translation.reference: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”

translation.zh: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
translation.en: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
translation.source: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
translation.medium: This includes the elderly and those with underlying health problems who are more prone to severe disease due to COVID-19.
translation.reference: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.

translation.zh: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
translation.en: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
translation.source: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
translation.medium: He said in comparison to the first wave of the Deltra fever, the new coronavirus patients he treated "found it difficult to breathe and had low blood oxygen levels.
translation.reference: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.

translation.zh: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
translation.en: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
translation.source: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
translation.medium: Many were kept in hospital for several days.
translation.reference: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.

translation.zh: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
translation.en: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
translation.source: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
translation.medium: Other doctors have shared similar experiences in the two weeks since the first case of the virus was reported in southern Africa.
translation.reference: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.

translation.zh: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
translation.en: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
translation.source: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
translation.medium: Although it will take several weeks to gather enough data, the doctor's observations and early evidence provide some clues.
translation.reference: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.

translation.zh: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
translation.en: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
translation.source: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
translation.medium: According to the National Institute of Infectious Diseases in South Africa, among the new coronavirus patients who were hospitalized in the past few weeks, only 30% had severe symptoms, which is half of the proportion of severe cases in the first wave of the epidemic. The average hospitalization time decreased from 8 days to 2.8 days. Among the recent coronavirus patients, only 3% died, while in the early cases in South Africa, the mortality rate reached 20%.
translation.reference: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.

translation.zh: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
translation.en: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
translation.source: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
translation.medium: Willem Hanekom, chief of the Africa Health Research Institute, quoted data from the National Institute of Communicable Diseases and other reports to say, "All signs currently point to this being a mild disease."
translation.reference: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”

translation.zh: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
translation.en: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
translation.source: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
translation.medium: It's still early, he said. "We need to see the follow-up data."
translation.reference: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.

translation.zh: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
translation.en: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
translation.source: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
translation.medium: In normal circumstances, hospitalization and deaths occur later, but we are just two weeks into this outbreak.
translation.reference: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”

translation.zh: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
translation.en: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
translation.source: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
translation.medium: At the same time, scientists around the world are observing case numbers and hospitalization rates, and testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatment methods.
translation.reference: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.

translation.zh: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
translation.en: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
translation.source: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
translation.medium: Despite still being the world's main SARS-CoV-2 virus strain, cases of the disease are appearing in dozens of countries, with South Africa as the epicentre.
translation.reference: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.

translation.zh: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
translation.en: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
translation.source: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
translation.medium: According to health officials, a new case in the first week of December saw an increase of 400% in the province, with tests showing that cases of the Omsk variant accounted for more than 90%.
translation.reference: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.

translation.zh: 感谢今天的支持者，80盒全部送出去了！
translation.en: Thank you to all the supporters today; all 80 boxes have been given out!
translation.source: 感谢今天的支持者，80盒全部送出去了！
translation.medium: Thanks to today's supporters, all 80 boxes have been sent out!
translation.reference: Thank you to all the supporters today; all 80 boxes have been given out!

translation.zh: 美容养颜汤的材料：
translation.en: Ingredients of beauty soup:
translation.source: 美容养颜汤的材料：
translation.medium: Materials for making beauty soup:
translation.reference: Ingredients of beauty soup:

translation.zh: 白木耳的作用：味甘、性平，归肺、胃、肾经；有强精、补肾、润肠、益胃、补气、和血、强心、滋阴、润肺、生津、壮身、补脑、提神、美容、嫩肤、延年益寿之功效；用于治肺热咳嗽、肺燥干咳、妇女月经不调、胃炎、大便秘结等病症；对阴虚火旺不受参茸等温热滋补的病人是一种良好的补品
translation.en: Functions of tremella: sweet in taste and neutral in nature, belong to channels of lung, stomach and kidney, have the effects of strengthening sperm, tonifying kidney, moistening intestine, nourishing stomach, tonifying vitality and blood, strengthening heart, nourishing yin, moistening lungs, promoting secretion, strengthening body, tonifying brain, refreshing beauty, tendering skin and prolonging life; it is used for treatment of diseases such as lung-heat type cough, dry-lung cough, menstrual irregularity of women, gastritis and constipation; it is a good tonic for patients with excessive heat and yin deficiency but are not suitable for warm tonic such as ginseng and velvet antler.
translation.source: 白木耳的作用：味甘、性平，归肺、胃、肾经；有强精、补肾、润肠、益胃、补气、和血、强心、滋阴、润肺、生津、壮身、补脑、提神、美容、嫩肤、延年益寿之功效；用于治肺热咳嗽、肺燥干咳、妇女月经不调、胃炎、大便秘结等病症；对阴虚火旺不受参茸等温热滋补的病人是一种良好的补品
translation.medium: The function of white mulberry: sweet and neutral, benefiting the lungs, stomach, kidneys; having strong essence, nourishing the kidneys, moistening the intestines, benefiting the stomach, nourishing the blood, strengthening the heart, replenishing blood, moistening the lungs, enriching the body, nourishing the brain, lifting the spirit, beauty, healthy skin, prolonging life; used for treating symptoms such as cough with phlegm, dry cough, irregular menstruation, stomach inflammation, constipation, and other diseases; and for patients with yin vacuity and fire excess, it is a good supplement.
translation.reference: Functions of tremella: sweet in taste and neutral in nature, belong to channels of lung, stomach and kidney, have the effects of strengthening sperm, tonifying kidney, moistening intestine, nourishing stomach, tonifying vitality and blood, strengthening heart, nourishing yin, moistening lungs, promoting secretion, strengthening body, tonifying brain, refreshing beauty, tendering skin and prolonging life; it is used for treatment of diseases such as lung-heat type cough, dry-lung cough, menstrual irregularity of women, gastritis and constipation; it is a good tonic for patients with excessive heat and yin deficiency but are not suitable for warm tonic such as ginseng and velvet antler.

translation.zh: 桃胶的作用：味苦，性平，归大肠，膀胱经。
translation.en: Functions of peach glue: bitter in taste, mild in nature, belong to the large intestine and bladder channels.
translation.source: 桃胶的作用：味苦，性平，归大肠，膀胱经。
translation.medium: The function of peppermint: bitter, neutral, enter the large intestine and bladder.
translation.reference: Functions of peach glue: bitter in taste, mild in nature, belong to the large intestine and bladder channels.

translation.zh: 功效：和血，通淋，止痢，止痛，也可以补水，润肠，如果有便秘的人，可以多吃桃胶。
translation.en: Effects: tonify blood, dredge lymph, stop dysentery and pain, replenish water, moisten intestines; people with constipation can eat more peach glue.
translation.source: 功效：和血，通淋，止痢，止痛，也可以补水，润肠，如果有便秘的人，可以多吃桃胶。
translation.medium: Effects: It can stop bleeding, relieve constipation, and can also be used to replenish water and moisturize the intestines. If you have diarrhea, you can eat more peppermint.
translation.reference: Effects: tonify blood, dredge lymph, stop dysentery and pain, replenish water, moisten intestines; people with constipation can eat more peach glue.

translation.zh: 枸杞子的作用：性平，味甘，归肝，胃经。
translation.en: Effect of fruits of Chinese wolfberries: neutral in nature and sweet in taste, belonging to the channels of liver and stomach.
translation.source: 枸杞子的作用：性平，味甘，归肝，胃经。
translation.medium: The role of licorice: sexually balanced, sweet, beneficial to the liver and stomach.
translation.reference: Effect of fruits of Chinese wolfberries: neutral in nature and sweet in taste, belonging to the channels of liver and stomach.

translation.zh: 益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。
translation.en: Nourish the liver and the eyes, tonify the liver and the kidney, whiten and nourish the skin, nourish deficiency, produce secretion and delay aging.
translation.source: 益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。
translation.medium: Beneficial to the liver, nourishing the kidneys, improving complexion, supplementing essence, delaying aging.
translation.reference: Nourish the liver and the eyes, tonify the liver and the kidney, whiten and nourish the skin, nourish deficiency, produce secretion and delay aging.

translation.zh: 红枣的作用：味甘，性平，归脾，胃经，有补脾和胃，益气生津养血安神，如果脾胃虚弱，气血不足失眠者可以多服用红枣。
translation.en: Functions of red dates: sweet in taste, calm in nature, return to the spleen, go through stomach channel, tonify the spleen and stomach, replenish qi, generate fluid, nourish blood and calm nerves; people whose spleen and stomach are weak, whose Qi and blood are insufficient, and who suffer from insomnia can eat more red dates.
translation.source: 红枣的作用：味甘，性平，归脾，胃经，有补脾和胃，益气生津养血安神，如果脾胃虚弱，气血不足失眠者可以多服用红枣。
translation.medium: The role of red dates: delicious, sexually balanced, beneficial for the spleen and stomach, with the effect of nourishing blood and promoting sleep. If the spleen and stomach are weak and there is a lack of blood and energy, insomniacs can eat more red dates.
translation.reference: Functions of red dates: sweet in taste, calm in nature, return to the spleen, go through stomach channel, tonify the spleen and stomach, replenish qi, generate fluid, nourish blood and calm nerves; people whose spleen and stomach are weak, whose Qi and blood are insufficient, and who suffer from insomnia can eat more red dates.

translation.zh: 龙眼肉的作用：味甘性温，归心,脾经，适用于心脾两虚者。
translation.en: Functions of arillus gongan: sweet in taste, warm in nature, return to the heart, spleen channel, suitable for those with deficiency of both heart and spleen.
translation.source: 龙眼肉的作用：味甘性温，归心,脾经，适用于心脾两虚者。
translation.medium: The function of dragon's eye meat: delicious, appetizing, suitable for those with weak heart and spleen.
translation.reference: Functions of arillus gongan: sweet in taste, warm in nature, return to the heart, spleen channel, suitable for those with deficiency of both heart and spleen.

translation.zh: 龙眼肉还能润肤美容，养血安神,,补益心脾，壮阳益气，贫血的人也适合服用，失眠者也适合。
translation.en: Arillus gongan can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood and calm the nerves, tonify the heart and spleen, invigorate Yang and Qi, and is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.
translation.source: 龙眼肉还能润肤美容，养血安神,,补益心脾，壮阳益气，贫血的人也适合服用，失眠者也适合。
translation.medium: It can also moisturize the skin, nourish blood, enhance Qi, improve complexion, and is suitable for people with poor blood circulation or insomnia.
translation.reference: Arillus gongan can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood and calm the nerves, tonify the heart and spleen, invigorate Yang and Qi, and is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.

translation.zh: 莲子的作用：味甘涩，性平，归心，脾，肾经。
translation.en: Functions of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in taste, flat in nature, return to heart, spleen and kidney channels.
translation.source: 莲子的作用：味甘涩，性平，归心，脾，肾经。
translation.medium: The role of lotus: sweet, neutral, calming, heart, kidney.
translation.reference: Functions of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in taste, flat in nature, return to heart, spleen and kidney channels.

translation.zh: 养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。
translation.en: Nourish the heart and calm the nerves, treat palpitations, insomnia, stomach deficiency, forgetfulness, vexation and thirstiness, nourish and replenish deficiency, and prevent spermatorrhea and premature ejaculation.
translation.source: 养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。
translation.medium: Caring for the heart and mind, insomnia due to worry, stomach empty, forgetfulness, thirsty for knowledge, nourishing and filling the void, stopping the flow of thoughts.
translation.reference: Nourish the heart and calm the nerves, treat palpitations, insomnia, stomach deficiency, forgetfulness, vexation and thirstiness, nourish and replenish deficiency, and prevent spermatorrhea and premature ejaculation.

translation.zh: 因此，这个养颜美容汤不仅是一道甜品，而且还可以养生！
translation.en: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also helps you stay healthy!
translation.source: 因此，这个养颜美容汤不仅是一道甜品，而且还可以养生！
translation.medium: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also healthy!
translation.reference: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also helps you stay healthy!

translation.zh: 多吃，能使您心神安康！
translation.en: Eating more can make you healthy both physically and mentally!
translation.source: 多吃，能使您心神安康！
translation.medium: Eating more can make you mentally and physically healthy!
translation.reference: Eating more can make you healthy both physically and mentally!

translation.zh: 而且又不会像燕窝那么贵，多吃不会使你口袋破大洞！
translation.en: Plus, it won't be as expensive as bird’s nest, so eating a lot will not make you spend a lot!
translation.source: 而且又不会像燕窝那么贵，多吃不会使你口袋破大洞！
translation.medium: It's not as expensive as swallows, and eating a lot won't make your mouth big!
translation.reference: Plus, it won't be as expensive as bird’s nest, so eating a lot will not make you spend a lot!

translation.zh: 此食物已凉了，食物有可能会变坏
translation.en: The food is cold, and food can go bad.
translation.source: 此食物已凉了，食物有可能会变坏
translation.medium: This food has cooled down. The food may have spoiled.
translation.reference: The food is cold, and food can go bad.

translation.zh: 餐单 #NUMBER#，由最初预计 18:40 送达，改过一次后变为到现在预计 19:15 送达！
translation.en: Meal order #NUMBER# was originally estimated to be delivered by 18:40, and now it is estimated to arrive by 19:15!
translation.source: 餐单 #NUMBER#，由最初预计 18:40 送达，改过一次后变为到现在预计 19:15 送达！
translation.medium: Order #NUMBER# which was initially estimated to be delivered at 6.40pm has now been rescheduled for delivery at 7.15pm!
translation.reference: Meal order #NUMBER# was originally estimated to be delivered by 18:40, and now it is estimated to arrive by 19:15!

translation.zh: 晚餐时间有限，请尽快处理！
translation.en: Dinner time is limited, so please hurry up and deal with it!
translation.source: 晚餐时间有限，请尽快处理！
translation.medium: Dinner time is limited, please handle it as soon as possible!
translation.reference: Dinner time is limited, so please hurry up and deal with it!

translation.zh: 我没有收到啊
translation.en: I didn’t receive it.
translation.source: 我没有收到啊
translation.medium: I didn't receive it.
translation.reference: I didn’t receive it.

translation.zh: 下单才 5 分钟，怎么会已完成
translation.en: I only placed the order 5 minutes ago, so how is it completed already?
translation.source: 下单才 5 分钟，怎么会已完成
translation.medium: How is it possible to complete an order within 5 minutes?
translation.reference: I only placed the order 5 minutes ago, so how is it completed already?

translation.zh: 实际优惠 code 详情是在哪里看
translation.en: Where can I see the details of the actual discount code?
translation.source: 实际优惠 code 详情是在哪里看
translation.medium: Where can I find the actual discount code details?
translation.reference: Where can I see the details of the actual discount code?

translation.zh: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
translation.en: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
translation.source: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
translation.medium: Educational evaluation: What do we rely on to save abducted children?
translation.reference: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?

translation.zh: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
translation.en: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
translation.source: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
translation.medium: If we take the analogy of the famous public interest advertising slogan "Without buying and selling there is no killing", in the environment without "收拐" demand, the mass prevention and control and anti-trafficking make the trafficking act profitless, risky and costly. So this kind of crime will not be repeated.
translation.reference: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.

translation.zh: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
translation.en: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
translation.source: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
translation.medium: Recently, the Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security launched an emergency response platform for missing children developed by the police.
translation.reference: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.

translation.zh: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
translation.en: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
translation.source: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
translation.medium: This is an authoritative channel for issuing missing children information and an Internet information platform set up for timely recovery of abducted children.
translation.reference: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.

translation.zh: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
translation.en: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
translation.source: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
translation.medium: Upon hearing the name of this App, “Together”, one would immediately feel warm.
translation.reference: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.

translation.zh: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
translation.en: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
translation.source: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
translation.medium: The new technology means not only "artistic" and "emotional", but also informatized and practical and effective.
translation.reference: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.

translation.zh: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
translation.en: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
translation.source: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
translation.medium: The primary goal of law enforcement is to find the abducted child and protect their physical safety and freedom.
translation.reference: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.

translation.zh: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
translation.en: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
translation.source: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
translation.medium: The second is the trial and punishment of the suspects.
translation.reference: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.

translation.zh: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
translation.en: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
translation.source: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
translation.medium: The significance of criminal punishment, ranging from individual punishment to social prevention and legal education, can be expressed in many "big words".
translation.reference: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.

translation.zh: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
translation.en: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
translation.source: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
translation.medium: But the top priority should be given to the personal safety of the victim before the breakthrough of the criminal case.
translation.reference: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.

translation.zh: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
translation.en: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.
translation.source: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
translation.medium: Major topics such as "whether child trafficking should be punished by death" and so on can be temporarily shelved and discussed carefully; but helping trafficked children is imperative.
translation.reference: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.

translation.zh: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
translation.en: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.
translation.source: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
translation.medium: According to the investigation experience of such cases, human traffickers are accustomed to quickly leave the scene after committing the crime.
translation.reference: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.

translation.zh: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
translation.en: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.
translation.source: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
translation.medium: The longer the search takes, the further the child may be from the parent, making the case more difficult to solve.
translation.reference: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.

translation.zh: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
translation.en: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.
translation.source: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
translation.medium: In this case, taking out a direct help like "B��圆" platform is indeed a pragmatic action and effective way to solve the case and find back the children.
translation.reference: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.

translation.zh: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
translation.en: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.
translation.source: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
translation.medium: After all, "changing course" is a major task that requires the operation of the entire legal system.
translation.reference: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.

translation.zh: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
translation.en: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.
translation.source: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
translation.medium: Combating crime, protecting the rights of children and parents, from improving legislation to safeguarding justice and law enforcement, all require the implementation of "care for the young and weak".
translation.reference: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.

translation.zh: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
translation.en: In addition, we can do better to prevent abduction of children from the perspectives of both family and society.
translation.source: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
translation.medium: In addition, the prevention of child trafficking, from families to society, can be further improved.
translation.reference: In addition, we can do better to prevent abduction of children from the perspectives of both family and society.

translation.zh: 比如一个常见的案例，一家三口在火车站休息，父母熟睡，醒来才发现孩子不见了。
translation.en: Take a common case as an example; parents and a child were taking a rest at the train station, and the parents found their child missing after waking up.
translation.source: 比如一个常见的案例，一家三口在火车站休息，父母熟睡，醒来才发现孩子不见了。
translation.medium: For example, a common case is that a family of three were resting at the train station, and when they woke up, they found that their child was missing.
translation.reference: Take a common case as an example; parents and a child were taking a rest at the train station, and the parents found their child missing after waking up.

translation.zh: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。
translation.en: You cannot expect a 2-year-old child to protect himself/herself; however, as parents of young children, adults shall have at least some degree of protection awareness.
translation.source: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。
translation.medium: We cannot expect a two-year-old child to have sufficient self-protection skills, but as a parent of young children, we should at least have some awareness of protection.
translation.reference: You cannot expect a 2-year-old child to protect himself/herself; however, as parents of young children, adults shall have at least some degree of protection awareness.

translation.zh: 父母两人轮流休息，又或将孩子置于稳妥的保护之下，都是预防儿童被拐的最起码手段。
translation.en: The father and the mother can take turns in taking rest, or they can protect their child in a proper way, which are the basic approaches for protecting children from being abducted.
translation.source: 父母两人轮流休息，又或将孩子置于稳妥的保护之下，都是预防儿童被拐的最起码手段。
translation.medium: Parents taking turns to rest and placing their children in safe protection are the most effective methods to prevent children from being abducted.
translation.reference: The father and the mother can take turns in taking rest, or they can protect their child in a proper way, which are the basic approaches for protecting children from being abducted.

translation.zh: 从警方打击拐卖犯罪的另一面看，购买被拐儿童一方也应被关注和惩治。
translation.en: Viewing from the other side of the crackdown on abduction, the party purchasing the abducted children shall be given attention to and punished, too.
translation.source: 从警方打击拐卖犯罪的另一面看，购买被拐儿童一方也应被关注和惩治。
translation.medium: From another perspective of the police cracking down on child trafficking, those who buy these children should also be monitored and punished.
translation.reference: Viewing from the other side of the crackdown on abduction, the party purchasing the abducted children shall be given attention to and punished, too.

translation.zh: 单个的不法行为，往往只是长长链条中的一环。
translation.en: Any single illegal behavior is usually one link of a long chain.
translation.source: 单个的不法行为，往往只是长长链条中的一环。
translation.medium: A single act of illegality is often only a link in a long chain.
translation.reference: Any single illegal behavior is usually one link of a long chain.

translation.zh: 根据我国《刑法》规定，拐卖儿童罪的法定刑起刑点为5年；情节特别严重的，可至死刑，并处没收财产。
translation.en: According to the Penal Code in our country, the criminal penalty starting point of child abduction and sale is 5 years; suspects with especially serious circumstance may be sentenced to death penalty with confiscation of property.
translation.source: 根据我国《刑法》规定，拐卖儿童罪的法定刑起刑点为5年；情节特别严重的，可至死刑，并处没收财产。
translation.medium: According to the provisions of China's Criminal Law, the statutory penalty for trafficking children is 5 years' imprisonment. In cases where the circumstances are particularly serious, the sentence may be up to death with confiscation of property.
translation.reference: According to the Penal Code in our country, the criminal penalty starting point of child abduction and sale is 5 years; suspects with especially serious circumstance may be sentenced to death penalty with confiscation of property.

translation.zh: 起刑点高、最高刑重，在“轻刑化”的大趋势下，拐卖儿童罪显然属于处罚较重的罪。
translation.en: Under the trend of “light sentencing”, the crime of abducting and selling children has a high starting point and heavy maximum standard of sentencing, and thus it is clearly a crime with heavier sentence.
translation.source: 起刑点高、最高刑重，在“轻刑化”的大趋势下，拐卖儿童罪显然属于处罚较重的罪。
translation.medium: The crime of trafficking children is obviously a crime of heavier punishment in the trend of "lightening punishment".
translation.reference: Under the trend of “light sentencing”, the crime of abducting and selling children has a high starting point and heavy maximum standard of sentencing, and thus it is clearly a crime with heavier sentence.

translation.zh: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。
translation.en: However, there are still lots of cases of abduction every year.
translation.source: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。
translation.medium: To this day, there are still many cases of trafficking every year.
translation.reference: However, there are still lots of cases of abduction every year.

translation.zh: 可见，部分人在养育儿女方面的观念落后，法律意识淡薄。
translation.en: It is clear that some people are still lagging behind in the concept of raising children and have dim legal awareness.
translation.source: 可见，部分人在养育儿女方面的观念落后，法律意识淡薄。
translation.medium: It can be seen that some people's views on raising children are lagging behind, and their legal awareness is weak.
translation.reference: It is clear that some people are still lagging behind in the concept of raising children and have dim legal awareness.

translation.zh: 对这部分人的法制教育应该同步跟进。
translation.en: Legal education should be provided to these people.
translation.source: 对这部分人的法制教育应该同步跟进。
translation.medium: Legal education should be synchronized for this group of people.
translation.reference: Legal education should be provided to these people.

translation.zh: 要有效控制拐卖犯罪，不能仅靠官方严格执法。
translation.en: It requires not only strict enforcement from authorities to effectively control the crime of abduction and selling.
translation.source: 要有效控制拐卖犯罪，不能仅靠官方严格执法。
translation.medium: To effectively control trafficking crimes, we cannot rely solely on strict law enforcement by the authorities.
translation.reference: It requires not only strict enforcement from authorities to effectively control the crime of abduction and selling.

translation.zh: 倘若收拐“市场”广泛存在，拐卖者利欲熏心，不断创新拐卖手段，形成与执法者的“斗法”局面，打拐行动势必会陷入低效的泥淖。
translation.en: If the “market” of buying abducted children still exists, and abductors continuously create new ways to abduct children driven by the profits; this will lead to a situation where the criminals and law enforcers plot against each other, and the action to crack down on adduction will inevitably be low in efficiency.
translation.source: 倘若收拐“市场”广泛存在，拐卖者利欲熏心，不断创新拐卖手段，形成与执法者的“斗法”局面，打拐行动势必会陷入低效的泥淖。
translation.medium: If the “markets” are widespread, the sellers will be greedy and constantly innovate in their selling methods, leading to a “battle” situation with law enforcers. The sellers’ actions will inevitably become inefficient.
translation.reference: If the “market” of buying abducted children still exists, and abductors continuously create new ways to abduct children driven by the profits; this will lead to a situation where the criminals and law enforcers plot against each other, and the action to crack down on adduction will inevitably be low in efficiency.

translation.zh: 因此，破除落后观念，普及法律常识，也有助于根治拐卖、收买儿童犯罪。
translation.en: Therefore, correcting outdated concepts and popularizing legal common sense are also conducive to eradicating the crime of abducting, trafficking and buying children.
translation.source: 因此，破除落后观念，普及法律常识，也有助于根治拐卖、收买儿童犯罪。
translation.medium: Therefore, eradicating outdated concepts, promoting legal consciousness, can also help eliminate trafficking and buying of children.
translation.reference: Therefore, correcting outdated concepts and popularizing legal common sense are also conducive to eradicating the crime of abducting, trafficking and buying children.

translation.zh: 杨浩东在马栏山宣讲党的十九届六中全会和省党代会精神
translation.en: Yang Haodong publicized the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CPC and the provincial congress of Party representatives.
translation.source: 杨浩东在马栏山宣讲党的十九届六中全会和省党代会精神
translation.medium: Yang Jiechi delivers a speech on behalf of the 19th CPC National Congress and the Provincial Party Congress spirit
translation.reference: Yang Haodong publicized the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CPC and the provincial congress of Party representatives.

translation.zh: 从党的百年奋斗史中汲取奋进力量
translation.en: Draw energy from the history of the 100 years of struggle of the Party
translation.source: 从党的百年奋斗史中汲取奋进力量
translation.medium: and push forward the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
translation.reference: Draw energy from the history of the 100 years of struggle of the Party

translation.zh: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 龚柏威）根据省委统一安排，12月10日上午，省委常委、省委宣传部部长杨浩东在马栏山视频文创园作互动宣讲，深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神，学习贯彻习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神，学习贯彻省第十二次党代会精神。
translation.en: Report of Hunan Daily on December 10 (full-media journalist: Gong Bowei), according to unified arrangement of the provincial Party committee, on the morning of December 10, Yang Haodong, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and the Ministry of Publicity Department of the provincial Party committee, gave a lecture in the Malan Mountain video cultural and creative park, to study the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee, the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan.
translation.source: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 龚柏威）根据省委统一安排，12月10日上午，省委常委、省委宣传部部长杨浩东在马栏山视频文创园作互动宣讲，深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神，学习贯彻习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神，学习贯彻省第十二次党代会精神。
translation.medium: Hunan Daily December 10 news (Reporter: Fang Bo) In accordance with the unified arrangement of the Provincial Party Committee, on the morning of December 10, Provincial Party Committee Standing Committee, Provincial Party Committee Propaganda Department Minister Yang Hongdao went to the video park in Maonanshan to deliver an interactive lecture, in-depth study and implement the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress, study and implement the spirit of Xi Jinping’s important speeches and instructions, and study and implement the spirit of the 12th Provincial Congress.
translation.reference: Report of Hunan Daily on December 10 (full-media journalist: Gong Bowei), according to unified arrangement of the provincial Party committee, on the morning of December 10, Yang Haodong, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and the Ministry of Publicity Department of the provincial Party committee, gave a lecture in the Malan Mountain video cultural and creative park, to study the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee, the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan.

translation.zh: 杨浩东从理想信念与初心使命、自我革命与青春大党、党的领袖和党的理论等三个方面，结合自身感悟、亲身经历，深入浅出、全面系统地阐释了全会精神的核心要义和实践要求。
translation.en: In combination of his feelings and experiences, Yang Haodong interpreted the core essence and the requirement on practice of the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee in terms of three aspects, i.e., original aspiration and mission, self-revolution, as well as the young Party, leaders of Party and theory of the Party.
translation.source: 杨浩东从理想信念与初心使命、自我革命与青春大党、党的领袖和党的理论等三个方面，结合自身感悟、亲身经历，深入浅出、全面系统地阐释了全会精神的核心要义和实践要求。
translation.medium: Yang Jiechi, from the ideal and belief, the initial mission, the self-revolution and the youthfulness of the Party, the leaders and the theories of the Party, combined his own realization and his personal experience, and explained comprehensively and systematically the core essence and the practical requirements of the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress.
translation.reference: In combination of his feelings and experiences, Yang Haodong interpreted the core essence and the requirement on practice of the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee in terms of three aspects, i.e., original aspiration and mission, self-revolution, as well as the young Party, leaders of Party and theory of the Party.

translation.zh: 他指出，要将全会精神和习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神、省党代会精神结合起来学，融会贯通学，增强捍卫“两个确立 ” 、 做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，坚定不移沿着习近平总书记指引的方向前进。
translation.en: As pointed by Yang Haodong, it is necessary to combine the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee and the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan, to digest them and strengthen the guarding of the “two-establishment” and the ideological consciousness, political consciousness and action consciousness of the “two-guarding”, and to unwaveringly move forward in the direction pointed by General Secretary Xi Jinping.
translation.source: 他指出，要将全会精神和习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神、省党代会精神结合起来学，融会贯通学，增强捍卫“两个确立 ” 、 做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，坚定不移沿着习近平总书记指引的方向前进。
translation.medium: He pointed out that we should integrate the essence of the 1st National Congress of the CPC and the important instructions given by General Secretary Xi Jinping in his important speech in Lake Dongting into the study and practice of the Provincial Party Committee, so as to strengthen the thought of “upholding the two safeguards” and “carrying out the two safeguards” and enhance self-consciousness, political consciousness and sense of responsibility, and unswervingly move forward in the direction indicated by General Secretary Xi Jinping.
