translation.reference: As pointed by Yang Haodong, it is necessary to combine the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee and the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan, to digest them and strengthen the guarding of the “two-establishment” and the ideological consciousness, political consciousness and action consciousness of the “two-guarding”, and to unwaveringly move forward in the direction pointed by General Secretary Xi Jinping.

translation.zh: 在互动交流环节，基层干部代表、企业代表、青年代表就三个历史决议的关系、如何理解“两个确立”的决定性意义、文化企业如何把握导向、新时代青年如何从百年党史中汲取力量等进行了提问，杨浩东以通俗的语言、生动的事例一一解答，他殷殷寄语青年党员，要从党的百年奋斗史中，汲取奋进的力量，紧密团结在党中央周围，坚定不移跟党走,用青春奉献书写责任和担当。
translation.en: In the interaction and exchange part, representatives of grass-rooted cadres, representatives of enterprises and representatives of young people asked questions about relationship among the three historical resolutions, correct understanding on decisive significance of the “two-establishment”, the way for cultural enterprises to master the orientation and the way for young people to abstract energy from the Party’s 100-year history; Yang Haodong answered the questions in plain language and with vivid cases, and he hoped the young Party members would abstract energy for progress from the history of the Party of 100 years, be unified around the Party Central Committee and follow the decisions made by the Party unswervingly and write responsibility and undertaking with youth and contributions.
translation.source: 在互动交流环节，基层干部代表、企业代表、青年代表就三个历史决议的关系、如何理解“两个确立”的决定性意义、文化企业如何把握导向、新时代青年如何从百年党史中汲取力量等进行了提问，杨浩东以通俗的语言、生动的事例一一解答，他殷殷寄语青年党员，要从党的百年奋斗史中，汲取奋进的力量，紧密团结在党中央周围，坚定不移跟党走,用青春奉献书写责任和担当。
translation.medium: At the interactive exchange segment, grassroots party branch representatives, enterprise representatives and youth representatives asked questions about the relationship between the three historical resolutions, how to understand the decisive significance of “two establishments”, how cultural enterprises can grasp the orientation, how young people in the new era can draw strength from the history of the Party and so on. Yang Jiechi answered the questions in a plain-spoken language and with vivid examples. He advised young Party members to draw strength from the history of the Party’s struggle and unite closely around the CPC Central Committee, unswervingly follow the Party and use the book of youth dedication and responsibility to write a responsible society.
translation.reference: In the interaction and exchange part, representatives of grass-rooted cadres, representatives of enterprises and representatives of young people asked questions about relationship among the three historical resolutions, correct understanding on decisive significance of the “two-establishment”, the way for cultural enterprises to master the orientation and the way for young people to abstract energy from the Party’s 100-year history; Yang Haodong answered the questions in plain language and with vivid cases, and he hoped the young Party members would abstract energy for progress from the history of the Party of 100 years, be unified around the Party Central Committee and follow the decisions made by the Party unswervingly and write responsibility and undertaking with youth and contributions.

translation.zh: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
translation.en: The number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022 - Xinhua News
translation.source: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
translation.medium: 2022 Beijing area college graduates expected to reach 268,000 - Xinhua
translation.reference: The number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022 - Xinhua News

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
translation.en: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na) Reporter learned from the 2022 Beijing University and College Graduates’ Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference jointly held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security that the number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, increased by 16,000 compared with last year.
translation.source: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11 wire (Reporter: Yang Na)Reporters learned from the 2022 Beijing College Graduates Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference held jointly by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission, Beijing Human Resources and Social Security Bureau that the number of college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, an increase of 16,000 over the previous year.
translation.reference: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na) Reporter learned from the 2022 Beijing University and College Graduates’ Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference jointly held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security that the number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, increased by 16,000 compared with last year.

translation.zh: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
translation.en: Responsible person from Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security introduced that the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring to provide assistance for those with difficulties, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.
translation.source: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
translation.medium: The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will deploy the employment of Beijing college graduates from the aspects of strengthening supply and demand matching, enhancing policy support, expanding employment channels, ensuring difficulty relief, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship and improving employment efficiency.
translation.reference: Responsible person from Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security introduced that the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring to provide assistance for those with difficulties, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.

translation.zh: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
translation.en: Reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security will establish a platform to increase work position supply, take the initiative to contact 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employing unit, and integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", that is, expand the batch of recruitment of institutions, expand the batch of recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the batch of recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the batch of recruitment of military recruits, expand the batch of employment probation retention, and expand the batch of entrepreneurship to promote employment; implement the dynamic management of "one policy for one student", recommend no less than 5 jobs for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates from poor families with the willingness to work will be assisted.
translation.source: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
translation.medium: Reporters learned that the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will build a practice platform, increase the supply of positions, and actively contact the 40 base stations for graduates to understand the employment experience. Visit enterprises, integrate demand information and position information. Focus on “6+1”. That is, expand the recruitment of enterprises, expand the recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the recruitment of grassroots projects, expand the recruitment of those due to retire, expand the recruitment of those who want to stay on, and expand the recruitment of those who want to start businesses. Implement “one
translation.reference: Reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security will establish a platform to increase work position supply, take the initiative to contact 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employing unit, and integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", that is, expand the batch of recruitment of institutions, expand the batch of recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the batch of recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the batch of recruitment of military recruits, expand the batch of employment probation retention, and expand the batch of entrepreneurship to promote employment; implement the dynamic management of "one policy for one student", recommend no less than 5 jobs for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates from poor families with the willingness to work will be assisted.

translation.zh: 其实，不知道是店铺出错，还是骑手出错
translation.en: Actually, I don’t what went wrong, the restaurant or the delivery person.
translation.source: 其实，不知道是店铺出错，还是骑手出错
translation.medium: In fact, it was not the shop that was at fault, but the courier.
translation.reference: Actually, I don’t what went wrong, the restaurant or the delivery person.

translation.zh: 袋子上没有单据
translation.en: There is no receipt on the bag.
translation.source: 袋子上没有单据
translation.medium: There is no invoice in the bag.
translation.reference: There is no receipt on the bag.

translation.zh: 追查不了
translation.en: It can’t be traced.
translation.source: 追查不了
translation.medium: Could not be found.
translation.reference: It can’t be traced.

translation.zh: 希望你们了解一下
translation.en: I hope you can find out about it.
translation.source: 希望你们了解一下
translation.medium: I hope you understand
translation.reference: I hope you can find out about it.

translation.zh: 因为送货时间比显示快了 30 分钟
translation.en: Because the delivery time is 30 minutes faster than what is displayed.
translation.source: 因为送货时间比显示快了 30 分钟
translation.medium: Because the delivery time is 30 minutes faster than the display.
translation.reference: Because the delivery time is 30 minutes faster than what is displayed.

translation.zh: 没有了，谢谢
translation.en: Nothing else, thanks.
translation.source: 没有了，谢谢
translation.medium: No, thank you.
translation.reference: Nothing else, thanks.

translation.zh: 是的，已经换了一个骑手
translation.en: Yes, the delivery person has been changed.
translation.source: 是的，已经换了一个骑手
translation.medium: Yes, we've got a rider
translation.reference: Yes, the delivery person has been changed.

translation.zh: 他已经等了好久
translation.en: He has been waiting for a long time.
translation.source: 他已经等了好久
translation.medium: He's waited long enough.
translation.reference: He has been waiting for a long time.

translation.zh: 那家餐厅一直都说在处理中
translation.en: The restaurant always said they were processing it.
translation.source: 那家餐厅一直都说在处理中
translation.medium: The restaurant said they are still processing it.
translation.reference: The restaurant always said they were processing it.

translation.zh: 等了几个小时
translation.en: Waited for a few hours.
translation.source: 等了几个小时
translation.medium: After a few hours
translation.reference: Waited for a few hours.

translation.zh: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
translation.en: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
translation.source: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
translation.medium: The International Olive Oil Council divides olive oil into two categories and five grades: virgin olive oil and refined olive oil.
translation.reference: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.

translation.zh: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
translation.en: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
translation.source: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
translation.medium: Cold-pressed olive oil, also known as extra virgin olive oil, is obtained from the fresh olive fruit by mechanical extraction and filtering to remove impurities.
translation.reference: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.

translation.zh: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
translation.en: There are three levels according to acidity:
translation.source: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
translation.medium: According to acidity, there are three levels:
translation.reference: There are three levels according to acidity:

translation.zh: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
translation.en: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
translation.source: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
translation.medium: Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO): is the highest quality and quantity of olive oil, it is a pure natural product.
translation.reference: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.

translation.zh: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
translation.en: It has premium taste, a slight and pleasant plant fragrance and a acidity of less than 1%.
translation.source: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
translation.medium: The taste is excellent, with a gentle and pleasant plant fragrance, and the acidity does not exceed 1%.
translation.reference: It has premium taste, a slight and pleasant plant fragrance and a acidity of less than 1%.

translation.zh: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
translation.en: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.
translation.source: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
translation.medium: High Quality Extra Virgin Olive Oil (Fine Virgin): The acidity is slightly higher but does not exceed 2%, with a pure and fragrant taste.
translation.reference: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.

translation.zh: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
translation.en: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
translation.source: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
translation.medium: Extra Virgin Olive Oil (Ordinary Virgin): The taste and aroma are still present, and the acidity does not exceed 3.3%.
translation.reference: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.

translation.zh: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
translation.en: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
translation.source: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
translation.medium: The extraction of olive oil refers to the olive oil obtained after the initial pressing of olive oil with a acidity level exceeding 3.3%, or it is called "second oil".
translation.reference: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.

translation.zh: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
translation.en: Refined Olive Oil can be divided into two categories:
translation.source: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
translation.medium: Olive oil can be divided into two levels:
translation.reference: Refined Olive Oil can be divided into two categories:

translation.zh: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
translation.en: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
translation.source: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
translation.medium: Common olive oil (Olive Oil): a mixture of refined olive oil and a certain proportion of freshly pressed olive oil, to adjust the taste and color, with an acidity of 1.5% or less, it is a transparent light yellow color.
translation.reference: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.

translation.zh: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
translation.en: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
translation.source: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
translation.medium: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil: is obtained by extracting and refining olive oil from the residue.
translation.reference: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.

translation.zh: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
translation.en: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.
translation.source: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
translation.medium: If you have watched the classification, you should have already discovered that the acidity of olive oil is an extremely important indicator.
translation.reference: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.

translation.zh: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
translation.en: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.
translation.source: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
translation.medium: You should know that olive oil is like wine made from grapes. Olive oil from different production areas and different olive varieties will produce oil of different standards.
translation.reference: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.

translation.zh: 油橄榄的最佳生长地：
translation.en: The best growing area of olives:
translation.source: 油橄榄的最佳生长地：
translation.medium: The best place to grow olive trees:
translation.reference: The best growing area of olives:

translation.zh: 地中海沿岸具有油橄榄生长所需的最适宜的土壤和气温、日照、空气湿度以及降水量等气候条件。
translation.en: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.
translation.source: 地中海沿岸具有油橄榄生长所需的最适宜的土壤和气温、日照、空气湿度以及降水量等气候条件。
translation.medium: The Mediterranean coast has the most suitable climate conditions for olive trees to grow, including soil and temperature, sunshine, air humidity, and rainfall.
translation.reference: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.

translation.zh: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。
translation.en: Aside from the Mediterranean costal area, olives can only be planted sporadically in suitable areas in other areas.
translation.source: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。
translation.medium: 除了地中海沿岸外，其他地区只能在适宜的区域零星种植。
translation.reference: Aside from the Mediterranean costal area, olives can only be planted sporadically in suitable areas in other areas.

translation.zh: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
translation.en: Main producing areas (the Mediterranean):
translation.source: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
translation.medium: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
translation.reference: Main producing areas (the Mediterranean):

translation.zh: 意大利、西班牙、希腊、土耳其、葡萄牙、摩洛哥、叙利亚、以色列、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、埃及、巴基斯坦、黎巴嫩等等，与其气候类似的也有远在南纬度的阿根廷、秘鲁、南非等等。
translation.en: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, etc., and Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc., which are far away in the southern latitude and have similar climate.
translation.source: 意大利、西班牙、希腊、土耳其、葡萄牙、摩洛哥、叙利亚、以色列、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、埃及、巴基斯坦、黎巴嫩等等，与其气候类似的也有远在南纬度的阿根廷、秘鲁、南非等等。
translation.medium: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, and other countries with similar climates are also found in the southern hemisphere, such as Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc.
translation.reference: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, etc., and Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc., which are far away in the southern latitude and have similar climate.

translation.zh: 油橄榄的采摘月份：
translation.en: Picking time of olives:
translation.source: 油橄榄的采摘月份：
translation.medium: The olive harvesting season:
translation.reference: Picking time of olives:

translation.zh: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。
translation.en: March to June each year is the time for olive trees to blossom and bear fruit, and from July to October, the fruit begins to develop and ripen, and the color of fruit will transition from green to red, purple and finally black.
translation.source: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。
translation.medium: From 3 to 6 June every year is the time for olive trees to bloom and fruit, and from 7 to 10 October the fruit begins to develop and ripen, transitioning from green to red, purple, and finally black.
translation.reference: March to June each year is the time for olive trees to blossom and bear fruit, and from July to October, the fruit begins to develop and ripen, and the color of fruit will transition from green to red, purple and finally black.

translation.zh: 11月至次年2月是果实的采摘季节（橄榄油的新鲜度可是很重要的哦）。
translation.en: November to February of next year is the picking time of fruit (the freshness of olive oil is very important).
translation.source: 11月至次年2月是果实的采摘季节（橄榄油的新鲜度可是很重要的哦）。
translation.medium: From November to the following February is the real harvest season (the freshness of the olive oil is very important).
translation.reference: November to February of next year is the picking time of fruit (the freshness of olive oil is very important).

translation.zh: 橄榄油的营养成分：
translation.en: Nutrients of olive oil:
translation.source: 橄榄油的营养成分：
translation.medium: The nutritional composition of olive oil:
translation.reference: Nutrients of olive oil:

translation.zh: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
translation.en: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid, vitamin A, vitamin B, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin K and antioxidants.
translation.source: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
translation.medium: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fats, including oleic acid and palmitoleic acid, as well as vitamins A, B, D, E, K, and antioxidants.
translation.reference: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid, vitamin A, vitamin B, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin K and antioxidants.

translation.zh: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。
translation.en: Olive oil is deemed the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the oils found so far.
translation.source: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。
translation.medium: Olive oil is considered the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the fats discovered so far.
translation.reference: Olive oil is deemed the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the oils found so far.

translation.zh: 民主峰会落幕，拜登称自由之火永不熄灭
translation.en: The Summit for Democracy ended, and Biden said the fire of freedom would never extinguish
translation.source: 民主峰会落幕，拜登称自由之火永不熄灭
translation.medium: Democratic Summit ends, Biden says the flame of freedom will never be extinguished
translation.reference: The Summit for Democracy ended, and Biden said the fire of freedom would never extinguish

translation.zh: 由美国总统拜登召集、有全球110个国家的政府以及公民社会和私营部门领导人出席的线上“民主峰会 ” ( Summit for Democracy)星期五（12月10日）落幕。
translation.en: The online “Summit for Democracy” held by Biden, the U.S. president, and attended by leaders of governments, civil society and private sector from 110 countries came to a close on Friday (December 10).
translation.source: 由美国总统拜登召集、有全球110个国家的政府以及公民社会和私营部门领导人出席的线上“民主峰会 ” ( Summit for Democracy)星期五（12月10日）落幕。
translation.medium: The online "Summit for Democracy" concluded on Friday (December 10) with the attendance of leaders from 110 countries, government officials, civil society and private sector leaders called by US President Donald Trump.
translation.reference: The online “Summit for Democracy” held by Biden, the U.S. president, and attended by leaders of governments, civil society and private sector from 110 countries came to a close on Friday (December 10).

translation.zh: 拜登在闭幕词中说，自由之火在世界每个人的心中燃烧，专制政权永远无法将其熄灭。
translation.en: Biden said in the closing speech that a dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.
translation.source: 拜登在闭幕词中说，自由之火在世界每个人的心中燃烧，专制政权永远无法将其熄灭。
translation.medium: Biden said in his closing remarks that the flame of freedom burns in every person's heart, and authoritarian regimes will never extinguish it.
translation.reference: Biden said in the closing speech that a dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.

translation.zh: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
translation.en: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.
translation.source: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
translation.medium: He also said that plans are underway to hold the second global "Democracy Summit" next year.
translation.reference: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.

translation.zh: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
translation.en: Tang Feng, representative of Taiwan government and member of the administrative council, and Luo Guancong, Hong Kong democracy and human rights activist who is currently in exile in the UK, made speeches at the summit on the second day.
translation.source: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
translation.medium: Taiwan government representative, Political Affairs Committee member Tang Feng and Hong Kong democracy activist Roy Cheung, who is now in exile in the UK, also spoke at the summit on the second day.
translation.reference: Tang Feng, representative of Taiwan government and member of the administrative council, and Luo Guancong, Hong Kong democracy and human rights activist who is currently in exile in the UK, made speeches at the summit on the second day.

translation.zh: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
translation.en: Biden said, “We know that we are facing arduous tasks.
translation.source: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
translation.medium: We know how difficult the work is that lies before us, Biden said.
translation.reference: Biden said, “We know that we are facing arduous tasks.

translation.zh: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
translation.en: But we also know that we can meet the challenges, just as I mentioned before and as what this Summit stands for, the world of democracy is everywhere.
translation.source: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
translation.medium: But we also know that we can face challenges because, as I have said before, democracy is all around us.
translation.reference: But we also know that we can meet the challenges, just as I mentioned before and as what this Summit stands for, the world of democracy is everywhere.

translation.zh: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
translation.en: A dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.”
translation.source: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
translation.medium: "An authoritarian regime can never extinguish the flame of freedom, which burns in the hearts of people around the world."
translation.reference: A dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.”

translation.zh: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
translation.en: Biden also said that joint efforts from the whole society were required to defend democracy.
translation.source: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
translation.medium: Biden also stated that defending democracy requires the collective effort of the entire society.
translation.reference: Biden also said that joint efforts from the whole society were required to defend democracy.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
translation.en: He said, “as leaders of governments, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms, realize transparent accountability governance, so as to be better equipped to resist the buffer and impact of dictatorship as well as people who bluntly pursue power in front of public benefits.”
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
translation.medium: He said: "As leaders of this government, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, to strengthen the bulwarks of democracy, to drive reform, to achieve transparent accountability, to resist more effectively the forces of authoritarianism and incumbency, and those who seek power before the public interest."
translation.reference: He said, “as leaders of governments, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms, realize transparent accountability governance, so as to be better equipped to resist the buffer and impact of dictatorship as well as people who bluntly pursue power in front of public benefits.”

translation.zh: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
translation.en: The themes on the second day of the “Summit for Democracy” were strengthening human rights, consolidating democracy and fighting against authoritarians, as well as fighting against digital authoritarianism and affirming the values of democracy.
translation.source: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
translation.medium: The themes of the second day of the “Democracy Summit” are respectively defending human rights, consolidating democracy and resisting authoritarianism, as well as countering digital authoritarianism and affirming democratic values.
translation.reference: The themes on the second day of the “Summit for Democracy” were strengthening human rights, consolidating democracy and fighting against authoritarians, as well as fighting against digital authoritarianism and affirming the values of democracy.

translation.zh: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
translation.en: That day happened to be “International Human Rights Day”.
translation.source: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
translation.medium: on the International Human Rights Day.
translation.reference: That day happened to be “International Human Rights Day”.

translation.zh: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
translation.en: Guterres, the Secretary General of the United Nations, said in the opening speech on that day that the democracy was facing challenges globally, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.
translation.source: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
translation.medium: UN Secretary-General António Guterres also said in his opening speech on the same day that the cause of democracy is facing challenges, especially those brought by new digital technologies.
translation.reference: Guterres, the Secretary General of the United Nations, said in the opening speech on that day that the democracy was facing challenges globally, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
translation.en: He said, “It’s the time to reiterate the common values, standpoint, as well as the tenacity of democracy.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
translation.medium: It's time now to reaffirm our shared values and positions and our democratic resilience, he said.
translation.reference: He said, “It’s the time to reiterate the common values, standpoint, as well as the tenacity of democracy.

translation.zh: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
translation.en: Social dialogue needs to be deepened to solve the problem of inequality, fight against corruption, update social contracts, invest in high-quality education, and provide more opportunities for women and girls.
translation.source: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
translation.medium: This requires deepening social dialogue, addressing inequality, combating corruption, updating social contracts, investing in quality education, and expanding opportunities for women and girls.
translation.reference: Social dialogue needs to be deepened to solve the problem of inequality, fight against corruption, update social contracts, invest in high-quality education, and provide more opportunities for women and girls.

translation.zh: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
translation.en: This also requires us to condemn populism, nativism and extremism of all forms, including making use of all the tools provided by technical revolutions.”
translation.source: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
translation.medium: This also requires a firm condemnation of all forms of populism, nationalism, and extremism, including the use of all tools provided by the technological revolution.
translation.reference: This also requires us to condemn populism, nativism and extremism of all forms, including making use of all the tools provided by technical revolutions.”

translation.zh: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
translation.en: Luo Guancong, democracy and human rights activist from Hong Kong, gave a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, to remind conferees to continuously pay attention to the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities in China including Uygur ethnic group and the Tibetans.
translation.source: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
translation.medium: Hong Kong democracy activist Ronny Tong delivered a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, reminding participants to continue to pay attention to the human rights situation of ethnic minorities such as the Uygurs and Tibetans in China.
translation.reference: Luo Guancong, democracy and human rights activist from Hong Kong, gave a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, to remind conferees to continuously pay attention to the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities in China including Uygur ethnic group and the Tibetans.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
translation.en: He said, “For a long time, the world has always accepted the rising of China; however, no mechanism has been established for accountability.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
translation.medium: He said: "For a long time, the world has been tolerating China's rise without establishing a mechanism to hold it accountable.
translation.reference: He said, “For a long time, the world has always accepted the rising of China; however, no mechanism has been established for accountability.

translation.zh: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
translation.en: This is the reason why there must be cooperation between politicians and civil society leaders.
translation.source: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
translation.medium: This is why political figures and civil society leaders must collaborate.
translation.reference: This is the reason why there must be cooperation between politicians and civil society leaders.

translation.zh: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
translation.en: We have to ensure that we will use all (the resources) we have to make the renaissance of democracy our primary task.”
translation.source: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
translation.medium: "We must use all that we have (resources) to ensure the revival of democracy is our top priority."
translation.reference: We have to ensure that we will use all (the resources) we have to make the renaissance of democracy our primary task.”

translation.zh: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
translation.en: Luo Guancong also called on the free world to unite together and fight against the threats from the Communist Party of China.
translation.source: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
translation.medium: Ron DeSantis also called on the free world to unite against the threat of communism.
translation.reference: Luo Guancong also called on the free world to unite together and fight against the threats from the Communist Party of China.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
translation.en: He said, “Some of you may be afraid of offend General Secretary Xi Jinping, some of you may not want to lose the Chinese market, and some of you may not realize the threat (of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
translation.medium: He said: "Maybe some of you are afraid of irritating General Secretary Xi Jinping, maybe some of you don't want to lose the Chinese market, maybe some of you have not realised (the threat of the Communist Party) to our democratic values."
translation.reference: He said, “Some of you may be afraid of offend General Secretary Xi Jinping, some of you may not want to lose the Chinese market, and some of you may not realize the threat (of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values.

translation.zh: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
translation.en: And this is the reason why we failed.
translation.source: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
translation.medium: And that's why we failed.
translation.reference: And this is the reason why we failed.

translation.zh: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
translation.en: This is also the reason why we must make changes.”
translation.source: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
translation.medium: This is another reason why we must change.
translation.reference: This is also the reason why we must make changes.”

translation.zh: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
translation.en: When attending the round table discussion on “Striking digital authoritarianism and affirming the value of democracy”, Tang Feng, member of the administrative council of Taiwan, issued Country Declaration with a video to emphasize that Taiwan is on the forefront of fighting against dictatorship and authoritarianism.
translation.source: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
translation.medium: Taiwan's Executive Yuan Secretary-General Tang Feng attended the roundtable discussion on "Combating Digital Authoritarianism and Upholding Democratic Values" and released the "National Statement" via video, emphasizing that Taiwan is at the forefront of combating authoritarianism and power.
translation.reference: When attending the round table discussion on “Striking digital authoritarianism and affirming the value of democracy”, Tang Feng, member of the administrative council of Taiwan, issued Country Declaration with a video to emphasize that Taiwan is on the forefront of fighting against dictatorship and authoritarianism.

translation.zh: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
translation.en: He also shared experience on how to fight against COVID-19 epidemic with transparent information and the construction of mutual trust.
translation.source: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
translation.medium: He also shared how to combat the COVID-19 pandemic through information transparency and building trust.
translation.reference: He also shared experience on how to fight against COVID-19 epidemic with transparent information and the construction of mutual trust.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
translation.en: He said, “As democracy in Taiwan is still making progress, we shall always stand on the forefront of fighting against the authoritarianism of the whole world, and shall play the leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
translation.medium: "At a time when Taiwan's democracy is in its infancy, we have always stood at the forefront of the global fight against authoritarianism, playing a leadership role in promoting global freedom, democracy, and human rights."
translation.reference: He said, “As democracy in Taiwan is still making progress, we shall always stand on the forefront of fighting against the authoritarianism of the whole world, and shall play the leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.

translation.zh: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
translation.en: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments from all over the world rationalize human rights violations in the name of public health and collective interests, leading to retrogress in global democracy.
translation.source: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
translation.medium: During the pandemic, authoritarian governments around the world, in the name of public health and collective interest, have rationalized human rights violations, which is a sign of global democracy in retreat.
translation.reference: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments from all over the world rationalize human rights violations in the name of public health and collective interests, leading to retrogress in global democracy.

translation.zh: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
translation.en: However, in Taiwan, we can control the epidemic without putting cities on lockdown, and we can defeat false information without removing it.”
translation.source: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
translation.medium: However, in Taiwan, we do not have to besiege the city to control the epidemic, nor do we have to lower the flag to fight false information."
translation.reference: However, in Taiwan, we can control the epidemic without putting cities on lockdown, and we can defeat false information without removing it.”

translation.zh: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
translation.en: On the second day of the “Summit for Democracy”, Treasury Department of United States announced it would implement legal sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in several countries including China and North Korea which were identified as having severely infringed on human rights; at the same time, it would implement investment restriction on a Chinese company which was identified as assisting in infringing on human rights by utilizing surveillance techniques.
translation.source: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
translation.medium: At the same time as the schedule for the “Democracy Summit”, the US Treasury Department announced sanctions against 15 individuals and 10 entities from China, North Korea and several other countries that have been recognized as having seriously violated human rights, and imposed investment restrictions on a Chinese company that has been recognized as having used surveillance technology to assist in the violation of human rights.
translation.reference: On the second day of the “Summit for Democracy”, Treasury Department of United States announced it would implement legal sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in several countries including China and North Korea which were identified as having severely infringed on human rights; at the same time, it would implement investment restriction on a Chinese company which was identified as assisting in infringing on human rights by utilizing surveillance techniques.

translation.medium: The pictures have been taken and uploaded to you.

translation.en: I will definitely make a complaint.
translation.source: 我一定会投诉

translation.en: Why didn’t you say it earlier if you couldn’t deliver it?
translation.source: 你送不到，怎么不早点讲啊

translation.en: Hi, the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce delivered from the restaurant is raw.

translation.reference: Hi, the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce delivered from the restaurant is raw.

translation.zh: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
translation.en: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.
translation.source: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
translation.medium: Want to try tennis but fear that I may not persevere, so I want to find a slightly expensive trainer first.
translation.reference: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.

translation.zh: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
translation.en: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.
translation.source: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
translation.medium: It is not friendly, in fact, the price is often inversely proportional to the degree of friendliness. If you cannot distinguish, then the expensive normal shot is more friendly than the affordable one. Such "entrance shots" are actually industrial waste.
translation.reference: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.

translation.zh: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
translation.en: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.
translation.source: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
translation.medium: Their strength is very weak, the ball just hit the palm, the vibration is very large, the hardball cannot be held, and the high hand is very difficult to control.
translation.reference: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.

translation.zh: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
translation.en: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.
translation.source: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
translation.medium: The logic and subtext behind their words are - tennis is so hard, you know you can't learn, we know you can't bear to buy expensive things, so we'll sell you cheap stuff that will mess you up, you'll play twice and won't want to play anymore, so this shot is cheap, and you won't mind.
translation.reference: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.

translation.zh: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
translation.en: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
translation.source: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
translation.medium: If you can really tell the difference, it means you have made progress. Wait until you have the money and come here to buy the expensive ones.
translation.reference: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.

translation.zh: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
translation.en: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
translation.source: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
translation.medium: Spend similar money to buy a second-hand racquet, choose Prince or Dunlop, as these two brands are not well-known, so good racquets are also not expensive. A new racquet priced at 500 or 600 yuan is quite all right, while a second-hand racquet priced at 200 yuan for a thousand yuan is not so great.
translation.reference: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?

translation.zh: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
translation.en: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
translation.source: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
translation.medium: Very friendly to beginners, but after the beginner’s stage, it becomes very difficult, but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the beginner’s stage.
translation.reference: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.

translation.source: 订单已多次延迟送货时间
translation.medium: The delivery time has been repeatedly postponed.
translation.reference: The delivery time of the order has been put off multiple times.

translation.en: Hello, I ordered some food from this restaurant, and after I received the delivery I found a lot of things were missing and the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce was raw.

translation.reference: Hello, I ordered some food from this restaurant, and after I received the delivery I found a lot of things were missing and the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce was raw.

translation.zh: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
translation.en: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school teachers of music, PE and fine art in three years - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
translation.medium: Jiangxi will train tens of thousands of rural primary school music teachers in three years - Xinhua
translation.reference: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school teachers of music, PE and fine art in three years - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanchang on May 22 (journalist: Chen Yushan): According to Ministry of Education of Jiangxi, in order to strengthen the supportability for teachers of subjects that are in short supply and realize balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi province planned to train 1 music teacher, 1 art teacher and 1 PE teacher who are qualified for each elementary school in rural areas of the whole province (villages, towns and below) in three years since 2016; a total of 10 thousand teachers will be trained.
translation.source: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency,南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培��
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanchang on May 22 (journalist: Chen Yushan): According to Ministry of Education of Jiangxi, in order to strengthen the supportability for teachers of subjects that are in short supply and realize balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi province planned to train 1 music teacher, 1 art teacher and 1 PE teacher who are qualified for each elementary school in rural areas of the whole province (villages, towns and below) in three years since 2016; a total of 10 thousand teachers will be trained.

translation.zh: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
translation.en: It is understood that the training objects this time are teachers of other subjects under 45 years old with basic knowledge or talent of music, art and PE in rural primary schools in Jiangxi and can work as music, art or PE teachers at the same time.
translation.source: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
translation.medium: It is understood that this training is aimed at rural primary school teachers in Jiangxi Province who are 45 years old and below and have music, art, physical education knowledge or abilities. They can serve as teachers for other subjects related to music, art, and physical education.
translation.reference: It is understood that the training objects this time are teachers of other subjects under 45 years old with basic knowledge or talent of music, art and PE in rural primary schools in Jiangxi and can work as music, art or PE teachers at the same time.

translation.zh: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
translation.en: Through training, they can master basic knowledge and teaching skills of the subjects of music, PE and art, and update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability; a team of music, PE and art teachers who are good at many subjects and specialize in one will be constructed to relieve the problem of lack of music, PE and art teachers in rural schools.
translation.source: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
translation.medium: Through training, they will master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of the Department of Aural and Music Theory, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve the teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability, and self-development ability of the department, and build a team of multi-skilled aural and music theory teachers to alleviate the problem of the lack of aural and music theory teachers in the countryside.
translation.reference: Through training, they can master basic knowledge and teaching skills of the subjects of music, PE and art, and update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability; a team of music, PE and art teachers who are good at many subjects and specialize in one will be constructed to relieve the problem of lack of music, PE and art teachers in rural schools.

translation.zh: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
translation.en: In order to ensure training quality and effect, Jiangxi plans to train 1 music, 1 art and 1 PE trainers for each elementary school in 100 counties (cities and districts) in Jiangxi, with a total of 300 trainers, to comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design and organization ability, training ability, network research workshop construction ability, so as to teach, demonstrate, guide and supervise.
translation.source: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
translation.medium: To ensure the quality and effectiveness of training, Jiangxi also plans to train 100 county (city, district) music, art, and physical education teachers in the province, with a total of 300 trainees. This will comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration ability, curriculum design organization ability, training ability, and network construction ability, and serve as a role model, demonstration, guidance, and supervision.
translation.reference: In order to ensure training quality and effect, Jiangxi plans to train 1 music, 1 art and 1 PE trainers for each elementary school in 100 counties (cities and districts) in Jiangxi, with a total of 300 trainers, to comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design and organization ability, training ability, network research workshop construction ability, so as to teach, demonstrate, guide and supervise.

translation.zh: 推荐理由:深层清洁皮肤，帮你洗掉皮肤上的灰尘和油光，细致毛孔，并且可以全效滋养肌肤，有效保湿去斑，能改善皮肤暗黄及色斑状况，坚持使用能帮助提升肌肤的提升自我修护能力，帮助肌肤恢复紧致。
translation.en: Recommendation: It deeply cleans the skin, helps you wash away the dust and oily on your skin, refines the pores, fully nourishes the skin, effectively moisturizes and removes freckles, improves the skin’s darkness, yellowness and blemishes, and keeping using it will help improve your skin’s self-healing ability and help your skin return to its tight state.

translation.medium: Recommend reasons: Deep cleaning removes dirt and oil from the skin, delicate pores, nourishes and moisturizes the skin, and can effectively prevent blemishes. It can also improve the yellowing and color spots on the skin, and if used regularly, can help improve the self-repair ability of the skin and help the skin recover its elasticity.
translation.reference: Recommendation: It deeply cleans the skin, helps you wash away the dust and oily on your skin, refines the pores, fully nourishes the skin, effectively moisturizes and removes freckles, improves the skin’s darkness, yellowness and blemishes, and keeping using it will help improve your skin’s self-healing ability and help your skin return to its tight state.

Whether it is a specialized cosmetic or not, it has the effect of calming and whitening, and the net content (mL/g) is packaged, the effect of adding water, suitable for any skin texture, the effect of moisturizing, and the product is packaged in an outer box. The fine and delicate hair pores, the deep layer of cleaning, and there are now more than 220,000 people who have evaluated it. It has received a 98% positive rating. It is comfortable to use, of high grade, and packaged well.
translation.reference: The shelf life of this product is 4 years; place of production: Huzhou, Zhejiang; whether it is a special-purpose cosmetics: no; functions: soothing, calming, whitening; net content (mL/g); set; function: hydrating; suitable for: any type of skin; package is a box; functions: shrinking pores, deep cleaning; at present, over 220,000 people have reviewed it with 98% positive comments saying it is comfortable to use, and it is luxurious and nicely packed.

translation.zh: 推荐理由:深层清洁毛孔污垢，软化老化角质，提拉紧致肌肤，淡化面部细纹，柔软丰盈面部，保湿的同时可以改善肤质，防止小皱纹的发生，适合任何肤质，温和不油腻。
translation.en: Recommendation: It can deeply clean the dirt in pores, exfoliate skin, lift and tighten skin, fade facial fine lines, soften and enrich facial skin, moisturize skin while improving skin quality and preventing small wrinkles at the same time; it is mild and not greasy, suitable for any skin type.
translation.source: 推荐理由:深层清洁毛孔污垢，软化老化角质，提拉紧致肌肤，淡化面部细纹，柔软丰盈面部，保湿的同时可以改善肤质，防止小皱纹的发生，适合任何肤质，温和不油腻。
translation.medium: Recommendation reasons: Deep cleaning pores, softening hardened sebum, tightening facial muscles, blurring facial fine lines, moisturizing and nourishing the skin, and preventing the occurrence of small wrinkles. It is suitable for all skin types and is gentle and non-oily.
translation.reference: Recommendation: It can deeply clean the dirt in pores, exfoliate skin, lift and tighten skin, fade facial fine lines, soften and enrich facial skin, moisturize skin while improving skin quality and preventing small wrinkles at the same time; it is mild and not greasy, suitable for any skin type.

translation.zh: Hello，訂的餐还要多久才送到

translation.medium: Hello, how long will the ordered food take to arrive?
translation.reference: Hello, how much longer will the ordered food arrive?

translation.en: They have wrapped up.

translation.zh: 您的骑手电话是 #PHONENUMBER#，名字叫#NAME#
translation.en: The number and name of your delivery person is #PHONENUMBER# and #NAME#.
translation.source: 您的骑手电话是 #PHONENUMBER#，名字叫#NAME#
translation.medium: Your rider's phone number is #PHONENUMBER#, their name is #NAME#.
translation.reference: The number and name of your delivery person is #PHONENUMBER# and #NAME#.

translation.zh: 麻烦你给个合理交代
translation.en: Please offer me a reasonable solution.

translation.reference: OK, if there is really not, please return the money for the order.

translation.zh: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
translation.en: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.
translation.source: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
translation.medium: In fact, dressing is very important for chubby girls.
translation.reference: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.

translation.zh: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.
translation.source: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
translation.medium: For chubby girls, the skirt cannot be too short or too long, with a length just above the knee, it can cover the thighs well.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.

translation.zh: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
translation.en: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.
translation.source: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
translation.medium: If the skirt is too short, it will reveal the fat legs.
translation.reference: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.

translation.zh: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
translation.en: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.
translation.source: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
translation.medium: Too long will give people a feeling of being short and chubby.
translation.reference: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.

translation.zh: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
translation.en: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.
translation.source: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
translation.medium: If the waist, skirt and long sleeves are in different colors, it will produce an elongating effect.
translation.reference: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.

translation.zh: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
translation.en: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.
translation.source: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
translation.medium: In fact, many dark-colored clothes are appropriate for chubby girls (something the author can relate to), dark colors can also hide your body shape, and the elegant black short skirt is also the first choice for chubby girls.
translation.reference: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.

translation.zh: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
translation.en: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.
translation.source: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
translation.medium: Wearing dark clothing, especially a short black skirt, will make a person appear thinner.
translation.reference: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.

translation.zh: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
translation.en: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.
translation.source: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
translation.medium: If you have chubby legs, avoid wearing tight socks and shoes that draw attention to your legs.
translation.reference: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.

translation.zh: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
translation.en: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.
translation.source: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
translation.medium: The greater the popularization, the less colorful it should be.
translation.reference: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.

translation.zh: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
translation.en: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.
translation.source: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
translation.medium: So as not to make people feel your legs and feet are fat.
translation.reference: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.

translation.zh: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.
translation.source: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
translation.medium: We must talk about the tips for dressing and matching for a slightly chubby girl.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.

translation.zh: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
translation.source: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
translation.medium: Chubby girls should avoid tight skirts at all costs. Apart from that, blouses should not be too short or stuffed into the skirts, which would make people feel uncomfortable. If your legs are thick, choose dark coloured long socks or netted socks (the kind with a fine mesh); select a soft printed dress with a floral design, and team it with a collared blouse. This can effectively camouflage the chubby girl's shortcomings.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.

translation.zh: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
translation.en: Of course, there are some skills for slightly overweight girls to wear short skirts.
translation.source: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
translation.medium: Of course, chubby girls in short skirts are also worth talking about.
translation.reference: Of course, there are some skills for slightly overweight girls to wear short skirts.

translation.zh: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
translation.en: When slightly overweight girls wear short skirts, they shall choose upper outer garment with the same color as the short skirt, so as to make them look taller.
translation.source: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
translation.medium: If you are an overweight girl wearing a short skirt, you should choose a top that is the same color as the short skirt. This will have the effect of enhancing your body shape.
translation.reference: When slightly overweight girls wear short skirts, they shall choose upper outer garment with the same color as the short skirt, so as to make them look taller.

translation.zh: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
translation.en: Wearing skirt with a pair of high heels will make your legs seem slimmer and longer, which is the most fashionable outfit in summer!
translation.source: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
translation.medium: A short skirt paired with high heels can make your legs appear longer, which is the most IN combination for summer!
translation.reference: Wearing skirt with a pair of high heels will make your legs seem slimmer and longer, which is the most fashionable outfit in summer!

translation.zh: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
translation.en: Girls with fat upper body and slim legs shall choose short dress of luxurious style.
translation.source: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
translation.medium: If you are top-heavy but have slim legs, choose a glamorous knee-length dress.
translation.reference: Girls with fat upper body and slim legs shall choose short dress of luxurious style.

translation.zh: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
translation.en: It can not only cover the fat stomach, but also show your advantages.
translation.source: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
translation.medium: It will not only cover your big belly but also show your advantage.
translation.reference: It can not only cover the fat stomach, but also show your advantages.

translation.zh: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
translation.en: A-line skirt makes people seem slimmer and is suitable for fat girls; it’s better to choose tight-fitting upper outer garment so as to form a sense of layers and make you look slimmer.
translation.source: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
translation.medium: A-line skirts will show more slimming effect. They are more suitable for chubby girls. The top should choose body-hugging type to form layered feeling.
translation.reference: A-line skirt makes people seem slimmer and is suitable for fat girls; it’s better to choose tight-fitting upper outer garment so as to form a sense of layers and make you look slimmer.

translation.zh: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
translation.en: Fat girls can also try simple white T-shirt with short skirt.
translation.source: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
translation.medium: A simple white T-shirt and short skirt are also good choices for plumpers.
translation.reference: Fat girls can also try simple white T-shirt with short skirt.

translation.zh: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls can be fashionable.
translation.source: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
translation.medium: Even chubby girls can look stylish.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls can be fashionable.

translation.zh: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls can be the focus of attention as long as they master the clothing matching rules.
translation.source: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
translation.medium: If you can master the art of dressing and matching, even chubby girls will be the focus of public attention.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls can be the focus of attention as long as they master the clothing matching rules.

translation.zh: 在穿衣搭配方面上有了改变后，在生活中也要多运动，争取早一天脱离微胖女生的标签吧😄
translation.en: In addition to changes in matching outfits, slightly overweight girls need to do more exercises, and hopefully you will remove the label of slightly overweight girls sooner😄
translation.source: 在穿衣搭配方面上有了改变后，在生活中也要多运动，争取早一天脱离微胖女生的标签吧😄
translation.medium: After the change in dressing and matching, we should exercise more in life and try to get rid of the label of being chubby as soon as possible 😄
translation.reference: In addition to changes in matching outfits, slightly overweight girls need to do more exercises, and hopefully you will remove the label of slightly overweight girls sooner😄

translation.zh: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
translation.en: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
translation.source: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
translation.medium: The 18th "World Beverage Innovation Awards" (World Beverage Innovation Awards) are co-hosted by FoodBev Media and the International Beer, Wine and Beverage Industry Exhibition (Brau Beviale) in Nuremberg, Germany.
translation.reference: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.

translation.zh: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
translation.en: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
translation.source: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
translation.medium: attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 different genres to participate.
translation.reference: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.

translation.zh: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
translation.en: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
translation.source: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
translation.medium: On October 15, the list of finalists will be published, and the list of winners will be published online on November 11 (British Summer Time).
translation.reference: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).

translation.zh: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
translation.en: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
translation.source: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
translation.medium: We have seen that Yakult’sLP28 sugar-free milk won the Best Dairy Drink Award, while Illy’s “GOGO Wuhan” marketing campaign won the Best Marketing Campaign Award. The packaging of Coca-Cola and People’s Daily’s new media also won the Best Design/Label Award.
translation.reference: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.

translation.zh: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
translation.en: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
translation.source: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
translation.medium: FoodBev Media senior marketing director Laura Nettle said: "We're delighted to be celebrating the 18th anniversary of the World Beer Awards with Brau Beviale.
translation.reference: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.

translation.zh: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
translation.en: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
translation.source: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
translation.medium: From new flavors, new concepts, and new functions to brands, packaging, and production, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we see the trend of the beverage industry.
translation.reference: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.

translation.zh: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
translation.en: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
translation.source: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
translation.medium: The World Beverage Innovation Awards honored the most daring new products and developments of both new and established brands in the global beverage industry this year.
translation.reference: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.

translation.zh: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。

translation.medium: Ardagh Group's technology allows 100% of the recycled glass to be remelted into new bottles.

translation.medium: Ardagh Group's technology allows 100 per cent of the recycled glass to be remelted and made into new bottles.
translation.reference: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.
