For Chinese colleges and universities, this began during a time of national crisis, and its spirit is deeply influenced by traditional culture and changes in the times. They advocate the values of "benefiting mankind, purifying the world" and the patriotic responsibility of "promoting learning to strengthen the nation".
translation.reference: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.

translation.zh: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.en: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
translation.source: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.medium: At present, the trends of informatization and internationalization in higher education are increasingly prominent. Education competition, scientific and technological competition, and talent competition are intensifying globally, and higher education as an important "supply side" is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.
translation.reference: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.

translation.zh: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.en: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.
translation.source: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.medium: In particular, the proposal of "Overall Plan for Advancing World-Class Universities and Disciplines" has set higher requirements for university development while demonstrating the confidence and determination of our country in moving from a high-education power to a high-education powerhouse.
translation.reference: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.

translation.zh: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.en: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?
translation.source: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.medium: How can we strive to enter the world’s top rankings in a short period of time, and accelerate the establishment of several world-class universities and a number of world-class disciplines on the basis of a certain gap?
translation.reference: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?

translation.zh: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.en: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.
translation.source: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.medium: In addition to firm goal confidence, path confidence, and ability confidence, colleges and universities should also fully utilize their three advantages: the first is the follow-up advantage, through continuous introduction of outstanding overseas academic talents and learning from the advanced experiences of world-class universities, achieving remarkable improvement in academic level and teaching quality; the second is the cultural advantage, inheriting the wisdom of Chinese civilization accumulated over 5,000 years and promoting excellent traditional Chinese culture, thereby gathering strength, shaping the brand, and improving the image; the third is the institutional advantage, leveraging the institutional superiority of a socialist country, strengthening goal-driven,
translation.reference: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.

translation.zh: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.en: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.
translation.source: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.medium: It should be noted that building world-class universities is not a one-size-fits-all approach. Each school must highlight its strengths and characteristics.
translation.reference: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.

translation.zh: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.en: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.
translation.source: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.medium: In addition to having common Chinese characteristics, it should also reflect the unique goals and target positioning, educational traditions, and resource endowment of each institution of higher learning.
translation.reference: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.

translation.zh: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.medium: For Zhejiang University, we focus on highlighting three characteristics in our education: the first is to emphasize the cultivation of innovative and entrepreneurial talents, to build an integrated person training environment that combines science and technology and school-enterprise, and form a complete chain of entrepreneurial education ecosystem; the second is to emphasize the characteristics of interdisciplinary integration, to promote the optimization and adjustment of the disciplinary system, and to create an institutional environment of interdisciplinary integration, actively cultivating new interdisciplinary and signature interdisciplinary achievements; the third is to emphasize the characteristics of educational and social services, to carry out in
translation.reference: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.en: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.
translation.source: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.medium: In this process, it is particularly important to always adhere to the university spirit and make the university spirit resonate with the times.
translation.reference: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.

translation.zh: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.medium: For Zhejiang University, the “Seeking Truth and Innovation” school motto, “Diligence, morality, clarity of mind, and adherence to principles” shared values, as well as “Embrace the world, pursue truth, work for the people” and “Plant trees for our country” jointly constitute the latest expression of the Zhejiang spirit.
translation.reference: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
translation.en: The university insists on the correct direction of running an university, continuously accumulates the altitude of culture and the important support by condensing the power of spirit; it has profound connotations and far-reaching significance.
translation.source: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
translation.medium: This is an important guarantee for schools to adhere to the correct direction of study and continue to accumulate cultural height and gather spiritual strength. It is rich in connotation and far-reaching in meaning.
translation.reference: The university insists on the correct direction of running an university, continuously accumulates the altitude of culture and the important support by condensing the power of spirit; it has profound connotations and far-reaching significance.

translation.zh: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
translation.en: In which, “harboring generosity like the ocean” emphasizes the spirit of inclusiveness, reflecting the mindset of “inviting all talents”, which is manifested as absorbing the premium concepts of university operation and talent training of world famous universities; “seeking the truth while upholding morality” lays emphasis on the spirit of the pursuit for truth and kindheartedness, meaning that universities shall accept the cultivation of virtue and the tempering of personality while pursuing for truth; “being brave enough to keep exploring” reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, including innovation in knowledge and science and technology, as well as reform, development and innovation; “building our country”stresses the spirit of patriotism and dedication, meaning that universities shall always share the glory and disgrace with the destiny of the country.
translation.source: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
translation.medium: Among them, "Yangtze River Delta" emphasizes the spirit of openness and inclusiveness, which is reflected in the chest-beating of "the world's talents are for me to use". It means to draw on the excellent ideas of world-renowned institutions of higher learning. "Seeking Truth and Goodness" emphasized by "Qixue" refers to the pursuit of truth and goodness. It means that while universities pursue truth, they should also accept the molding and tempering of morality and personality. "Open up a new world" embodies the reform and innovation spirit, which includes both the pursuit of knowledge and the
translation.reference: In which, “harboring generosity like the ocean” emphasizes the spirit of inclusiveness, reflecting the mindset of “inviting all talents”, which is manifested as absorbing the premium concepts of university operation and talent training of world famous universities; “seeking the truth while upholding morality” lays emphasis on the spirit of the pursuit for truth and kindheartedness, meaning that universities shall accept the cultivation of virtue and the tempering of personality while pursuing for truth; “being brave enough to keep exploring” reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, including innovation in knowledge and science and technology, as well as reform, development and innovation; “building our country”stresses the spirit of patriotism and dedication, meaning that universities shall always share the glory and disgrace with the destiny of the country.

translation.zh: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
translation.en: These spiritual ethos and the pursuit of values are the soul of Zhejiang University in its 120 years of university running.
translation.source: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
translation.medium: It is the soul of the 120-year-old Zhejiang University.
translation.reference: These spiritual ethos and the pursuit of values are the soul of Zhejiang University in its 120 years of university running.

translation.zh: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
translation.en: “Wise people can hear when there is only silence and see before things are formed.”
translation.source: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
translation.medium: The wise listen in silence, the intelligent see what is not yet formed.
translation.reference: “Wise people can hear when there is only silence and see before things are formed.”

translation.zh: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
translation.en: Universities and colleges in China shall further master the direction of the times and the historical mission of higher education based on the overall situation of the socialism with Chinese characteristics, and accelerate the construction of top universities in the world.
translation.source: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
translation.medium: As China's higher education institutions further step into the general situation of socialism with Chinese characteristics, they should deeply understand the times and historical missions of higher education and accelerate the process of building world-class universities.
translation.reference: Universities and colleges in China shall further master the direction of the times and the historical mission of higher education based on the overall situation of the socialism with Chinese characteristics, and accelerate the construction of top universities in the world.

translation.zh: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
translation.en: At the same time, hold fast to humanistic care, independence and freedom, to make university spirit, spirit of the times and national spirit promote each other, so as to provide infinite power for realizing state prosperity, national rejuvenation and the common ideal of all human beings.
translation.source: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
translation.medium: At the same time, adhering to humanistic care and independence, let the university spirit and the spirit of the times, and the national spirit resonate with each other, so as to provide endless momentum for achieving national prosperity and revitalizing the nation, and realizing the common ideal of human beings.
translation.reference: At the same time, hold fast to humanistic care, independence and freedom, to make university spirit, spirit of the times and national spirit promote each other, so as to provide infinite power for realizing state prosperity, national rejuvenation and the common ideal of all human beings.

translation.zh: 订了套餐，有 2 样东西送错了
translation.en: I ordered a set meal and two of the delivered items were wrong.

translation.medium: Ordered a meal deal and got two of the same thing
translation.reference: I ordered a set meal and two of the delivered items were wrong.

translation.zh: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
translation.en: President of Iran: an agreement may be reached after talks on Iran nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran are lifted - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
translation.medium: Iranian President: If the sanctions against Iran are lifted, there is hope to reach an agreement in the nuclear negotiations - Xinhua
translation.reference: President of Iran: an agreement may be reached after talks on Iran nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran are lifted - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Teheran on December 11 (Journalists: Gao Wencheng and Wang Shoubao): Lahey, president of Iran, said in Teheran, the capital of Iran, on December 11 that a “satisfactory agreement” might be reached after the comprehensive talks about Iran’s nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran were lifted by the US.
translation.source: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Tehran December 11 wire (Reporter: Gao Wenqiang) Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said in Tehran on December 11 that if the US lifts sanctions on Iran, a comprehensive agreement on the Iranian nuclear issue can be reached through negotiations.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Teheran on December 11 (Journalists: Gao Wencheng and Wang Shoubao): Lahey, president of Iran, said in Teheran, the capital of Iran, on December 11 that a “satisfactory agreement” might be reached after the comprehensive talks about Iran’s nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran were lifted by the US.

translation.zh: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
translation.en: According to information published by the website of the president of Iran, Lahey said in a meeting with envoys of Iran in surrounding countries that Iran had proved its sincerity in the talks by submitting proposals to other related parties of the agreement of Iran nuclear issue.
translation.source: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
translation.medium: According to a report on the Iranian president's website, Raisi said during a meeting with ambassadors of neighboring countries that Iran has proven its negotiating seriousness by submitting proposals to other parties involved in the nuclear agreement.
translation.reference: According to information published by the website of the president of Iran, Lahey said in a meeting with envoys of Iran in surrounding countries that Iran had proved its sincerity in the talks by submitting proposals to other related parties of the agreement of Iran nuclear issue.

translation.zh: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
translation.en: If the US is determined, “it will be easy to reach the agreement”.
translation.source: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
translation.medium: The path to an agreement will be smooth if the US is determined.
translation.reference: If the US is determined, “it will be easy to reach the agreement”.

translation.zh: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
translation.en: Related parties of the Iran nuclear agreement started hosting talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, since this April, to discuss the problem of restoring honoring the agreement by the US and Iran.
translation.source: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
translation.medium: The parties to the Iran nuclear agreement began a meeting in Vienna, the capital of Austria, in April this year to discuss the issue of the resumption of obligations between the United States and Iran.
translation.reference: Related parties of the Iran nuclear agreement started hosting talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, since this April, to discuss the problem of restoring honoring the agreement by the US and Iran.

translation.zh: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
translation.en: A new round of talks started in Vienna on November 29, which was adjourned on December 3, and will resume on December 9.
translation.source: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
translation.medium: The new round of talks began on November 29 in Vienna, temporarily suspended on December 3, and resumed on December 9.
translation.reference: A new round of talks started in Vienna on November 29, which was adjourned on December 3, and will resume on December 9.

translation.reference: Please contact the delivery person.

translation.zh: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
translation.en: Xi Jinping sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News
translation.source: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
translation.medium: Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory message to the 2021 Gulf Science Forum - Xinhua
translation.reference: Xi Jinping sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
translation.en: Xinhua News Beijing December 11th, on December 11th, Chinese president, Xi Jinping, sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.
translation.source: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11 wire December 11, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the 2021 Gulf Science Forum.
translation.reference: Xinhua News Beijing December 11th, on December 11th, Chinese president, Xi Jinping, sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.

translation.zh: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
translation.en: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.
translation.source: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
translation.medium: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world is experiencing an unprecedented major change, and the global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period. A new technological revolution and industrial transformation have profoundly affected the global economic structure.
translation.reference: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.

translation.zh: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
translation.en: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.
translation.source: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
translation.medium: The Guangdong-Hong Kong-Australia Bay Area should surround the strategic positioning of building an international science and technology innovation center, strive to build a global science and technology innovation highland, and promote the development of emerging industries.
translation.reference: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.

translation.zh: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
translation.en: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.
translation.source: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
translation.medium: China is willing to work with scientists and international scientific and technological organizations around the world to strengthen international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific issues, promote common scientific and technological breakthroughs, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, and jointly promote the development of world science for the benefit of mankind.
translation.reference: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.

translation.zh: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
translation.en: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。
translation.source: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
translation.medium: The 2021 Gulf Area Science Forum opened today in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province. The theme is “Exploring the Future, Sharing Science”. It is hosted by the Guangdong Provincial Government.
translation.reference: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。

translation.zh: 对的，订单是接受状态
translation.en: Yes, the order status is accepted.
translation.source: 对的，订单是接受状态
translation.medium: Yes, the order is in the acceptance state.
translation.reference: Yes, the order status is accepted.

translation.zh: 但餐厅打电话说由于骑手不运送骨头，所以餐厅需要将肉和骨头切开，骨头弃掉
translation.en: But the restaurant called saying the delivery person did not deliver bones, and so the restaurant needed to separate the bones and meat and discard the bones.
translation.source: 但餐厅打电话说由于骑手不运送骨头，所以餐厅需要将肉和骨头切开，骨头弃掉
translation.medium: But when the restaurant called to complain that the courier didn't deliver the bones, the restaurant was told to cut the meat and discard the bones.
translation.reference: But the restaurant called saying the delivery person did not deliver bones, and so the restaurant needed to separate the bones and meat and discard the bones.

translation.zh: 是否明白我的问题
translation.en: Do you understand my question?

translation.reference: Do you understand my question?

translation.en: It’s not that the order was delayed.

translation.source: 或者你可以直接打电话给我
translation.medium: You can call me directly.
translation.reference: Or you can just call me.
