translation.source: 是否在跟进？
translation.medium: Are you following?
translation.reference: Are you following up on it?

translation.zh: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
translation.en: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
translation.medium: The longest period for graduates of Guangxi University to start a business is 5 years - Xinhua
translation.reference: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.
translation.source: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Nanning, May 19 (Reporter Zhang Yi) Reporters learned from the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Education Department on the 19th that in the days to come, all institutions of higher learning in Guangxi will implement a flexible curriculum and relax the university students’ study leave period. The period for on-campus students to suspend studies to start a business will be extended by 2 to 5 years based on the existing academic calendar. The period for on-campus students to suspend studies to start a business will be deemed as practice teaching period.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.

translation.zh: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
translation.en: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.
translation.source: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
translation.medium: In order to promote the innovation and entrepreneurship ability of college students, the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security and other departments worked together to build entrepreneurship platform, and built more college student practice teaching base, college science and technology park, college student entrepreneurship park and business incubator to provide college students with external guarantee.
translation.reference: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.

translation.zh: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
translation.en: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.
translation.source: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
translation.medium: In accordance with the requirements, by 2020, the innovation and entrepreneurship practice base area of each college should reach 30,000 m2 or more for undergraduate schools and 20,000 m2 or more for graduate schools.
translation.reference: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.

translation.zh: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
translation.en: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.
translation.source: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
translation.medium: The government encourages colleges and universities to establish innovation and entrepreneurship courses, and gives priority support to outstanding students who major in innovation and entrepreneurship.
translation.reference: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.

translation.zh: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
translation.en: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.
translation.source: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
translation.medium: College teachers must go to industry enterprises for at least two months every two years to enhance their awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education.
translation.reference: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.

translation.zh: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
translation.en: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.
translation.source: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
translation.medium: The Autonomous Region Education Office called on all institutions of higher learning in Guangxi to carry out in-depth the university student innovation and entrepreneurship training plan, and strive to make every college student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in school.
translation.reference: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.

translation.zh: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
translation.en: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.
translation.source: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
translation.medium: Colleges and universities should actively organize students to participate in various types of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions and provide financial support.
translation.reference: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.

translation.zh: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
translation.en: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people
translation.source: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
translation.medium: GOV-MO: Australia awards 7 outstanding individuals with honorary doctorates
translation.reference: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people

translation.zh: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
translation.en: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.
translation.source: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
translation.medium: The University of Macau held the “2021 Conferment Ceremony for Honorary Degrees and Higher Degrees” on the 11th day of the month. Degrees were conferred on Liu Cigui, Chen Kai, Zhang Jian, Liu Yan, Li Yong, Zhu Lianglang and Jiang Chaoqing in recognition of their outstanding contributions and significant contributions to the development of society and education.
translation.reference: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.

translation.zh: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
translation.en: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.
translation.source: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
translation.medium: At the conferment ceremony, Executive Vice President and Australian National University (ANU) Proctor, Director of the School of Social and Cultural Studies, You Yuanyuan, conferred the degree of Doctor of Philosophy on Lin Jingcheng, President of the ANU Council and Vice-Chancellor of the University, and Song Yonghua.
translation.reference: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.

translation.zh: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
translation.en: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.
translation.source: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
translation.medium: Liu Jingui Professor was awarded the Doctor of Education degree, Chen Kai Professor was awarded the Doctor of Philosophy degree in Logic, Zhang Cuirui Professor was awarded the Doctor of Philosophy degree in Logic, Li Lanfang Professor was awarded the Doctor of Philosophy degree in Logic, Li Yong Professor was awarded the Doctor of Business Administration degree, and Zhu Liang Professor was awarded the Doctor of Philosophy degree in Logic. Ms. Jiang Chaohui was awarded the Doctor of Philosophy degree in Logic.
translation.reference: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.

translation.zh: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
translation.en: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.
translation.source: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
translation.medium: At the beginning of his speech, Dr. Yu Yongli, when congratulating the seven outstanding individuals who won the honorary doctoral degree, expressed warm congratulations and deep respect. They made outstanding contributions to the country's development and world progress in their respective fields. At the same time, Dr. Yu Yongli expressed the most sincere blessings to the graduates and their parents, and also expressed sincere respect to the dedicated and excellent teaching staff of the university.
translation.reference: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.

translation.zh: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.
translation.source: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
translation.medium: When Professor Sun Yifeng, a lecturer at the Australian Academy of Humanities, read the commendatory speech for Professor Li Yinhong, he said that Professor Li Yinhong was an internationally renowned economist who was famous for his outstanding academic achievements and forward-looking educational ideas.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.

translation.zh: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
translation.en: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.
translation.source: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
translation.medium: Besides his achievements in economic development, economic growth, and the East Asian economic field, he is also a visionary educational leader.
translation.reference: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.

translation.zh: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
translation.en: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.
translation.source: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
translation.medium: In short, he excels in many fields.
translation.reference: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
translation.en: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
translation.medium: Professor Zhang Yufang of the School of Energy and Power Engineering said in his speech that Professor Zhang Jian is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
translation.reference: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.

translation.zh: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
translation.en: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.
translation.source: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
translation.medium: He was one of the three Nobel laureates in Physics in 2014 for inventing the blue light-emitting diode (LED).
translation.reference: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.

translation.zh: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
translation.en: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.
translation.source: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
translation.medium: Professor Nakamura's invention not only completely changed the lighting industry, but also led to the widespread use of white light-emitting diodes in everyday life and industrial production, making a great contribution to human well-being.
translation.reference: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
translation.medium: Sun Yifang said in his laudatory speech that Professor Li Lanjun, as a pioneer in the field of Chinese artificial liver, has created a unique and effective liver system of the Li type, which has made a major breakthrough in the treatment of severe hepatitis and liver failure, significantly reducing the mortality of liver failure.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.

translation.zh: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
translation.en: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.
translation.source: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
translation.medium: In this fight against COVID-19, she and her team proposed the "四抗二平衡" (Four-pronged attack) plan as well as the three major technologies of artificial liver, micro-ecosystem and dry cells, which significantly increased the critical treatment rate.
translation.reference: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
translation.medium: When Professor Sun Yifeng read the commencement speech of Professor Li Yongsheng, he said that Professor Li Yongsheng laid the foundation for innovative research in operational management, shaped the thinking of supply chain theory and practice, and completely changed the business model around the world.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.

translation.zh: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
translation.en: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.
translation.source: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
translation.medium: Li Yifeng is known for popularizing the concept of the long-hand effect in project management, and has explored measures to address this phenomenon.
translation.reference: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.

translation.zh: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
translation.en: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.
translation.source: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
translation.medium: Nowadays, in the context of pandemic and tense economic situation, the long-term effect is becoming increasingly prominent, leading to serious damage to the supply chain.
translation.reference: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.

translation.zh: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
translation.en: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.
translation.source: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
translation.medium: Li Yifeng's far-sighted research is like a helping hand in the snow, helping the industry deal with difficulties and bring great social value.
translation.reference: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
translation.medium: According to Sun Yifang, when delivering the speech on behalf of Zhu Lianglan, she found a kind of breakthrough and innovative method for preparing samples, which is well-known both domestically and internationally.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.

translation.zh: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
translation.en: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.
translation.source: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
translation.medium: She won prestigious titles such as the International Eurasian Academy of Sciences for her outstanding scientific achievements, and with her brilliant performance, she deservedly won a high status in the world technology sanctuary.
translation.reference: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.

translation.zh: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.
translation.source: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
translation.medium: When Professor Chen Kai, the dean of the institute, read the congratulatory message, he said that Professor Chen has engaged in drug research and development for more than 40 years. His outstanding scientific achievements and his important contributions to the country, Macao, the University of Macao, and the National Key Laboratory have earned him a high international status and reputation.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.

translation.zh: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
translation.en: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.
translation.source: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
translation.medium: His active promotion of the development of traditional Chinese medicine in Macao and the Greater Bay Area fully embodies his mission sense of dedication to the national strategy of pharmaceutical industry development.
translation.reference: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.

translation.zh: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.
translation.source: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
translation.medium: In his congratulatory message, the President of the Australian Academy of Technology and Innovation said that Ms. Jiang Chaohong, who was engaged in the research and development of major inventions and patents, has accumulated more than 15 practical and widely used inventions related to storage virtualization, navigation, file systems and power management. These inventions have significantly improved the convenience of human life.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.

translation.zh: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
translation.en: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.
translation.source: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
translation.medium: As a talented inventor, Ms. Jiang often able to popularize high-level science and theory.
translation.reference: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.

translation.zh: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
translation.en: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.
translation.source: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
translation.medium: Finally, Chen Kai, as the honorary doctor, read out the congratulatory message.
translation.reference: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.

translation.zh: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
translation.en: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.
translation.source: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
translation.medium: He is very pleased to see that the pharmaceutical industry in Macao and the Greater Bay Area has established a good model: from the establishment of the first national key laboratory for Chinese medicine quality research in Australia to the rapid development of Chinese medicine in the Greater Bay Area, Australia has made great contributions to the integration of outstanding talents in the pharmaceutical field of the Greater Bay Area.
translation.reference: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.

translation.zh: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
translation.en: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.
translation.source: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
translation.medium: In addition, he believes that the Australian management team has foresight, not only providing students with research opportunities in academia, but also delivering many responsible talents to society.
translation.reference: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.

translation.zh: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
translation.en: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.
translation.source: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
translation.medium: He felt honored to communicate and cooperate with Australia and sincerely congratulated Australia on its recent achievements.
translation.reference: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.

translation.zh: 他有没有正确的地址？
translation.en: Does he have the correct address?
translation.source: 他有没有正确的地址？
translation.medium: Does he have the right address?
translation.reference: Does he have the correct address?

translation.zh: 还没看到
translation.en: It was not seen yet.
translation.source: 还没看到
translation.medium: Haven't seen
translation.reference: It was not seen yet.

translation.zh: 那个骑手刚才去错了地方，所以我没有收到
translation.en: That delivery person went to the wrong place, so I didn’t receive it.
translation.source: 那个骑手刚才去错了地方，所以我没有收到
translation.medium: The rider just went the wrong way so I didn't get it
translation.reference: That delivery person went to the wrong place, so I didn’t receive it.

translation.zh: 不过我#PRS_ORG#收到了
translation.en: But I #PRS_ORG# received it.
translation.source: 不过我#PRS_ORG#收到了
translation.medium: However, we #PRS_ORG# received
translation.reference: But I #PRS_ORG# received it.

translation.zh: App 暂时未能联系到骑手
translation.en: App is not able to contact the delivery person for the time being.
translation.source: App 暂时未能联系到骑手
translation.medium: The app is currently unable to contact the rider.
translation.reference: App is not able to contact the delivery person for the time being.

translation.zh: 我家人以为没有
translation.en: My family thought there was none.
translation.source: 我家人以为没有
translation.medium: My family thought I
translation.reference: My family thought there was none.

translation.zh: 但是，已经过了 1 小时了
translation.en: But it has already been 1 hour.
translation.source: 但是，已经过了 1 小时了
translation.medium: More than an hour later
translation.reference: But it has already been 1 hour.

translation.zh: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
translation.en: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.
translation.source: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
translation.medium: Just as NFTs were taking off, the crypto community introduced a new concept.
translation.reference: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.

translation.zh: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
translation.en: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
translation.source: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
translation.medium: In 2021, a blockchain game called "Axie Infinity" had a huge impact in Southeast Asia. Some residents who lost their jobs due to the pandemic began to obtain stable income from this game.
translation.reference: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.

translation.zh: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
translation.en: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
translation.source: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
translation.medium: Axie Infinity is a pet-rearing game that is based on blockchain technology. It combines various play methods, including NFTs. It is currently the NFT project with the highest transaction volume, having exceeded US$3 billion.
translation.reference: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.

translation.zh: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
translation.en: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.
translation.source: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
translation.medium: TokenTerminal data shows that Axie Infinity’s daily revenue exceeded $8.2 million, close to “Honor of Kings”.
translation.reference: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.

translation.zh: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
translation.en: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.
translation.source: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
translation.medium: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity officially claimed that its daily active users exceeded one million.
translation.reference: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.

translation.zh: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
translation.en: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
translation.source: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
translation.medium: The popularity of Axie Infinity will pass on a new "palytoearn" model to more people. With the help of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer a single character. In addition to being able to obtain fun and economic benefits from the game, players can also participate in the governance of the game ecology.
translation.reference: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.

translation.zh: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
translation.en: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
translation.source: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
translation.medium: This kind of subjectivity is not conferred by game developers, but is guaranteed by blockchain technology.
translation.reference: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.

translation.zh: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
translation.en: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
translation.source: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
translation.medium: When I saw the news about my friend’s stock, my biggest feeling was the company’s choice, that is, the choice of investment target industry. The first is to choose an industry with large growth space, with a market size of at least RMB100 billion; secondly, to choose an industry with good growth prospects for the next 3-5 years; finally, to choose an industry with policy support.
translation.reference: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.

translation.zh: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
translation.en: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
translation.source: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
translation.medium: The width of the racecourse refers to the market size, the length of the racecourse refers to the industry's development stage, and whether the racecourse is flat or rugged refers to the industry's competitive landscape.
translation.reference: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.

translation.zh: 为对的赛道加油！
translation.en: Cheer for the right track!
translation.source: 为对的赛道加油！
translation.medium: Go for it!
translation.reference: Cheer for the right track!

translation.zh: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
translation.en: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
translation.source: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
translation.medium: The first thing in the new year is to summarize the 2021 and adjust the 2022 strategic layout.
translation.reference: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.

translation.zh: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
translation.en: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
translation.source: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
translation.medium: Tactics is "doing the right things", that is, doing things right.
translation.reference: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.

translation.zh: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
translation.en: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
translation.source: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
translation.medium: The strategy is to "do the right thing," which means to do the right thing.
translation.reference: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.

translation.zh: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
translation.en: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
translation.source: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
translation.medium: Tactics is about finding a direction, strategy is about making a landing. In most tactical thinking, there is space for strategic thinking.
translation.reference: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.

translation.zh: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
translation.en: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
translation.source: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
translation.medium: For example, how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking) can be considered as whether to continue deepening in the current field or expand horizontally to other fields (strategic thinking); for example, how to improve customer retention rate (tactical thinking) can be considered as how to improve the retention rate of core and high-value customers (strategic thinking); in terms of improving activity participation rate (tactical thinking), it can be considered as how to set up appropriate activity KPIs and achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving target customer participation degree, activating high-value silent customers, and precision reactivation. In terms of improving DAU (tactical thinking), it can be considered as whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
translation.reference: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.

translation.zh: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
translation.en: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
translation.source: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
translation.medium: Twelve years after its inception, Bitcoin celebrated several milestones in 2021.
translation.reference: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.

translation.zh: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
translation.en: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
translation.source: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
translation.medium: On September 7, El Salvador, a small country in Central America, declared Bitcoin as a legal currency, which is the first time for Bitcoin to become a legal currency of a country or region.
translation.reference: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.

translation.zh: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
translation.en: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
translation.source: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
translation.medium: On October 12, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved ProShares to list its Bitcoin ETF on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), marking the first time the SEC has approved a Bitcoin ETF. This means that the first compliant Bitcoin futures ETF has landed in the US capital market, expanding the scope of Bitcoin investment.
translation.reference: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.

translation.zh: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
translation.en: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
translation.source: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
translation.medium: From the perspective of blockchain technology development, Bitcoin is not the main character.
translation.reference: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.

translation.zh: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
translation.en: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
translation.source: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
translation.medium: On November 14, 2021, Bitcoin underwent a soft fork upgrade called "Taproot", which improved the anonymity of transactions on the Bitcoin network and reduced data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the blocks themselves.
translation.reference: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.

translation.zh: 麦乐鸡，没有麦乐鸡酱
translation.en: McNuggets, without the McNuggets sauce.
translation.source: 麦乐鸡，没有麦乐鸡酱
translation.medium: No McDonald's, no McDonald's sauce.
translation.reference: McNuggets, without the McNuggets sauce.

translation.zh: 那个麦乐鸡要是就干吃，会好难吃的
translation.en: The McNuggets would taste horrible without the sauce.
translation.source: 那个麦乐鸡要是就干吃，会好难吃的
translation.medium: That McDonald's chicken is so dry and hard to eat.
translation.reference: The McNuggets would taste horrible without the sauce.

translation.zh: 你的 $32 优惠代码是不是要买够多少钱才可以用
translation.en: Is your $32 discount code only applicable when your order reaches certain amount?
translation.source: 你的 $32 优惠代码是不是要买够多少钱才可以用
translation.medium: Your $32 discount code, is it enough to buy enough money
translation.reference: Is your $32 discount code only applicable when your order reaches certain amount?

translation.zh: 15 分钟不到的话是不是可以取消
translation.en: You can cancel it if it doesn’t arrive in 15 minutes.
translation.source: 15 分钟不到的话是不是可以取消
translation.medium: Can a 15-minute call be cancelled?
translation.reference: You can cancel it if it doesn’t arrive in 15 minutes.

translation.zh: 我正在输入 code，为什么变成确认订单
translation.en: I was entering the code, and why does it change to order confirmation?
translation.source: 我正在输入 code，为什么变成确认订单
translation.medium: I am inputting code, why is it confirming the order?
translation.reference: I was entering the code, and why does it change to order confirmation?

translation.zh: 好的
translation.en: OK.
translation.source: 好的
translation.medium: Good.
translation.reference: OK.

translation.zh: 那我没有了优惠？
translation.en: Then I won’t enjoy the discount?
translation.source: 那我没有了优惠？
translation.medium: Did I not get a discount?
translation.reference: Then I won’t enjoy the discount?

translation.zh: 你好
translation.en: Hello,
translation.source: 你好
translation.medium: Hello
translation.reference: Hello,

translation.zh: 订的餐未送到
translation.en: the ordered food was not delivered.
translation.source: 订的餐未送到
translation.medium: The ordered meal was not delivered.
translation.reference: the ordered food was not delivered.

translation.zh: 骑手已经送到
translation.en: the delivery person has made the delivery.
translation.source: 骑手已经送到
translation.medium: The rider has been taken to
translation.reference: the delivery person has made the delivery.

translation.zh: 我希望你们能准时，不是想要你们的优惠券！！
translation.en: I hope you can be on time, and it’s not that I want your coupons! !
translation.source: 我希望你们能准时，不是想要你们的优惠券！！
translation.medium: I hope you can make it - not that I want your discount coupon!
translation.reference: I hope you can be on time, and it’s not that I want your coupons! !

translation.zh: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
translation.en: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
translation.source: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
translation.medium: Did you encounter any issues during the initial registration for primary pricing?
translation.reference: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?

translation.zh: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
translation.en: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
translation.source: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
translation.medium: The overdue registration staff did not provide proof of continued education and learning. The overdue registration should provide proof of continued education and learning for at least 30 hours in the past year. Re-registration should provide proof of continued education and learning for at least 120 hours in the past 4 years. Re-registration should provide proof of continued education and learning for at least 30 hours per year.
translation.reference: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.

translation.zh: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
translation.en: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
translation.source: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
translation.medium: Cost Engineer Continues Education Fee Standard
translation.reference: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer

translation.zh: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
translation.en: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
translation.source: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
translation.medium: The cost engineer who participates in the online continuing education must pay tuition fees to the management agency when registering. The standard is that the cost of 30 hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including the unified teaching materials of continuing education).
translation.reference: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);

translation.zh: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
translation.source: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.medium: The cost of the 30-minute elective course is 300 yuan per person per year.
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.

translation.zh: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
translation.source: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.medium: The cost of compulsory courses and elective courses totaling 30 credits per year is 600 yuan/person (including unified teaching materials for continuing education).
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).

translation.zh: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.en: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
translation.source: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.medium: (1) Participate in the registered cost engineering network organized by the China Association of Cost Engineers or the provincial and departmental management agencies continue to receive education and learning, and calculate the learning time according to the online learning materials.
translation.reference: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;

translation.zh: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.en: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.medium: (2) Participate in the registration of appraisal engineers organized by the China Appraisers Association or the management agencies of various provinces and departments, and attend training and various types of training classes, seminars, etc. Each half-day can be recognized as 4 hours of study.
translation.reference: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.en: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.medium: (3) Participants who are members of the China Price Valuation Association, as well as price valuation engineers and officers at all levels of provinces and departments, shall continue to give lectures, with 10 hours of teaching recognized per half day.
translation.reference: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.en: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.medium: (4) Participate in the research of the China Council for the Promotion of Standards and the preparation of industry standards and curriculum, each for 30 hours per year.
translation.reference: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.en: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.medium: (6) Participate in the national professional qualification examination for construction cost engineers and write the syllabus, questions and answer sheets. A total of 30 hours can be recognized each year.
translation.reference: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.en: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
translation.source: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.medium: (7) Publish personalized and openly published engineering cost-related professional papers and books (in formal journals).
translation.reference: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).

translation.zh: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.en: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
translation.source: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.medium: The standard for publishing works is 12 lessons per 10,000 words.
translation.reference: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;

translation.zh: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.en: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
translation.source: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.medium: The publication of papers in national journals is evaluated at 8 points per thousand words, in provincial journals at 5 points per thousand words, and in municipal journals at 3 points per thousand words.
translation.reference: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;

translation.zh: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.en: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
translation.source: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.medium: (9) Enterprises that are approved or authorized by the China Price Consulting Enterprise Organization, the Provincial Price Consulting Association, and the Provincial Management Organization can provide public training to the society (excluding management and skills training for enterprises in general). Up to 4 hours of training can be recognized per day, and a maximum of 30 hours can be recognized annually.
translation.reference: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.

translation.zh: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.en: Process of cost engineer online further education
translation.source: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.medium: Continuing education and learning process for cost engineering network
translation.reference: Process of cost engineer online further education

translation.zh: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.en: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
translation.source: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.medium: After the registration agency pays the fee, the student's identity will be activated immediately. The cost engineer can enter the online classroom to learn with the user name and password.
translation.reference: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.

translation.zh: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.en: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
translation.source: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.medium: Students learn through interactive methods such as broadcasting lessons, asking and answering questions, and online discussions.
translation.reference: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.

translation.zh: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.en: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
translation.source: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.medium: If you forget your password, you will not be able to log in during registration. In this case, please contact your teacher or the registration institution. The registration institution can help you change your password (but not your username), and then use the modified password to log in again.
translation.reference: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
