translation.zh: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.en: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.medium: Overseas Chinese group complains of discrimination by Yuru and three other well-known springboard schools - Xinhua
translation.reference: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
translation.source: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Washington May 23 wire (Reporter: Xu Jianmei) On the 23rd, more than 130 Asian groups submitted a protest to the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice against the discrimination of Asian students in the admission process of the three prestigious schools - Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

translation.zh: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.en: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.
translation.source: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.medium: The Asian Education Alliance, which filed the lawsuit, held a news conference in Washington that day.
translation.reference: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.

translation.zh: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.en: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.
translation.source: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.medium: At the press conference, the chairman of the group, Zhao Yuankun, said that over the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the conditions of American schools has doubled, but the proportion of Asians in these three American schools is basically maintained at the same level.
translation.reference: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.

translation.zh: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.en: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.
translation.source: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.medium: Many studies have shown that in the so-called "holistic" admissions process, these universities "systematically and continuously discriminate against Asian-American applicants."
translation.reference: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.

translation.zh: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.en: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.
translation.source: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.medium: According to Zhao Yukun, in 2014, research by Sanders and other scholars showed that in these three institutions of higher learning, the admission rate for ethnic Chinese was the lowest among all ethnic groups.
translation.reference: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.

translation.zh: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.en: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
translation.source: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.medium: Data from the US Department of Education also shows that among all members of the Ivy League, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students, and Yale University and Brown University have effectively implemented racial quotas for Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
translation.reference: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.

translation.zh: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.en: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.
translation.source: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.medium: Zhao Yuanku told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hoped that after submitting the complaint, the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice could launch investigations and take measures to prevent these colleges from continuing to discriminate against Asian students after the determination of facts.
translation.reference: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.

translation.zh: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.en: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.
translation.source: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.medium: They also hope that the higher education institutions can actively pay attention to this issue and change their admission policies for Asian students.
translation.reference: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.

translation.zh: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.en: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.
translation.source: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.medium: None of the three universities named in the complaint has responded yet.
translation.reference: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.

translation.zh: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.en: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.
translation.source: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.medium: Founded in 2001, the Asian American Education Alliance had once complained about Harvard University's admission discrimination, but the US Department of Education did not accept the application.
translation.reference: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.

translation.zh: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.en: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
translation.source: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.medium: In addition to the Chinese American group, the complaint also includes American Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani American educational groups.
translation.reference: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.

translation.zh: 需要餐具
translation.en: I need tableware.
translation.source: 需要餐具
translation.medium: Need utensils.
translation.reference: I need tableware.

translation.zh: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.en: I just canceled the order.
translation.source: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.medium: Just cancelled the order.
translation.reference: I just canceled the order.

translation.zh: 为什么还是执行中
translation.en: Why is it still in progress?
translation.source: 为什么还是执行中
translation.medium: Why is it still being implemented
translation.reference: Why is it still in progress?

translation.zh: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.en: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?
translation.source: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.medium: Can you help me check if it has been canceled?
translation.reference: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?

translation.zh: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.en: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.
translation.source: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.medium: But I had already ordered it at 5.9 on the morning of the 9th.
translation.reference: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.

translation.zh: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.en: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.
translation.source: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.medium: That's the takeout line, they don't know anything
translation.reference: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.

translation.zh: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.en: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?
translation.source: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.medium: Can you call them directly?
translation.reference: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?

translation.zh: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.en: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
translation.source: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.medium: In September 2020, Mr. Lu from the real estate agency learned about a factory building located in Yuyao, Zhejiang Province. After multiple on-site visits, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory building.
translation.reference: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.

translation.zh: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.en: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
translation.source: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.medium: In December of the same year, after Landlord Lin had negotiated with the owner of the house, he transferred 200,000 yuan as a deposit via bank transfer on the same day.
translation.reference: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.

translation.zh: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.en: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
translation.source: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.medium: Lin signed as the buyer on the “Factory Sale and Purchase Agreement”, which stated that “if the buyer does not want to buy this factory, the deposit will be returned to the seller. If the seller does not want to sell this factory, double deposit will be returned to the seller. Both parties agree to sign the sale and purchase contract within one week.
translation.reference: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”

translation.zh: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.en: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
translation.source: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.medium: However, subsequently, both parties failed to reach a consensus on the main provisions of the contract, such as the scope of factory buildings and payment methods, resulting in the failure to sign the house purchase and sale contract.
translation.reference: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.

translation.zh: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.en: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
translation.source: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.medium: As both parties failed to reach a consensus on the content of the contract, a few days later, Lin returned 200,000 yuan of the deposit to Luo.
translation.reference: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.

translation.zh: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.en: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
translation.source: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.medium: The house was so hard to miss, the deposit had been paid, the mortgage was ready, and we were just one signature away from exchanging contracts, but the vendors pulled out at the last minute, which left Mr Johnson fuming.
translation.reference: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.

translation.zh: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.en: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
translation.source: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.medium: Luo Fengshan will file a lawsuit on behalf of Lin Yi against Youyang City People's Court.
translation.reference: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.

translation.zh: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.en: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
translation.source: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.medium: The court held that the parties ultimately failed to sign a formal contract and that the failure should not be solely attributed to the defendant. Accordingly, the plaintiff should be reasonably presumed to have been unable to reach an agreement with the defendant. Therefore, the defendant should not be liable to pay double damages for breach of contract.
translation.reference: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.

translation.zh: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.en: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
translation.source: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.medium: After the first trial, the plaintiff files an appeal.
translation.reference: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.

translation.zh: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.en: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
translation.source: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.medium: Recently, the second instance court upheld the original judgment.
translation.reference: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.

translation.zh: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.en: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
translation.source: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.medium: 【Legal advice】 During the transaction process, it is necessary to pay attention to the obligation of caution.
translation.reference: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.

translation.zh: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.en: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
translation.source: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.medium: When signing the contract, the buyer shall fulfill the necessary cautious obligations, such as verifying the information of the property owner, whether the property is occupied, and specifying the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to prevent disputes during the performance of the contract.
translation.reference: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.

translation.zh: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.en: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.
translation.source: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.medium: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) After the "Democracy Summit" ended on Friday, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said in a statement on Saturday (December 11) that the United States held a "Leaders Summit" under the slogan of "drawing a red line for democracy", which means "to instrumentalize and weaponize democracy, and in the name of democracy, incite division and confrontation, and transfer domestic conflicts".
translation.reference: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.

translation.zh: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.en: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.
translation.source: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.medium: The Chinese government believes that "for a long time, the United States has forced its political system and values on people, carried out 'democratic transformation', imposed unilateral sanctions, and launched 'color revolution', causing disastrous consequences."
translation.reference: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.

translation.zh: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.en: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.
translation.source: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.medium: Democracy has long become a "大规模杀伤性武器" for the United States to interfere in other countries.
translation.reference: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.

translation.zh: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.en: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.
translation.source: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.medium: The summit is an action in line with Biden's election pledges.
translation.reference: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.

translation.zh: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.en: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.
translation.source: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.medium: The two-day meeting will be conducted through video conferencing, with leaders from 111 countries around the world invited, including the leader of Taiwan, but without inviting leaders from China and Russia.
translation.reference: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.

translation.zh: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.en: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.
translation.source: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.medium: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States for having problems with its own democracy and claimed that the United States was not qualified to hold such a summit.
translation.reference: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.

translation.zh: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.en: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.
translation.source: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.medium: There are also doubts internationally and in the United States, for example, about the invitation list, which included some leaders with authoritarian tendencies, such as leaders from the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspect that the purpose of the summit was not to promote democracy but to serve geopolitical purposes.
translation.reference: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.

translation.zh: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.en: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.
translation.source: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.medium: The newly appointed German Chancellor, Angela Merkel, also attended the video democracy summit.
translation.reference: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.

translation.zh: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.en: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.
translation.source: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.medium: The statement of the Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday said that "the American disease of democracy is most pronounced today. Issues such as money politics, identity politics, party confrontation, political extremism, social division, racial conflict, wealth polarization" are becoming more and more serious. American democracy is built on the basis of "rich people's games".
translation.reference: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.

translation.zh: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.en: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”
translation.source: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.medium: In his speech, President Trump stated, "As the leader of our government, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the guardrails of democracy, push for reform, achieve transparent accountability, and resist the forces of authoritarianism and corruption that seek to undermine our democracy."
translation.reference: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”

translation.zh: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.en: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”
translation.source: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.medium: He stressed that democracy is not a given, "We have to keep reinventing it in every generation, in my view the great challenge of our time.
translation.reference: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”

translation.zh: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.en: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.
translation.source: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.medium: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights "are facing sustained and distressing challenges, and democracy needs warriors to defend it."
translation.reference: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.

translation.zh: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.en: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.
translation.source: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.medium: The United States has pledged to launch a one-year campaign after this democratic summit, which includes a $424.4 million initiative to strengthen democracy around the world and provide support to independent news media.
translation.reference: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.

translation.zh: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.en: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.
translation.source: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.medium: The United States hopes that countries will make specific public commitments to improve their democratic systems before the planned physical democracy summit in late 2022.
translation.reference: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.

translation.zh: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.en: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.
translation.source: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.medium: Let us all countries implement our commitments and report on the progress we have made next year, said Biden.
translation.reference: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.

The cake was too delicious to resist!😋 Fans of sweets must try "East Sichuan Braised Fish in Miso Soup". The soup was very delicious, and the fish was very fresh. Miso...

translation.reference: It was mainly because the flavor was a little off, the base was not salty enough and the sweetness was exaggerated, you can imagine sweetness + various spice and garnish...

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
translation.en: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
translation.source: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
translation.medium: What is the "Red Card" taboo drinking method?
translation.reference: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?

translation.zh: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
translation.en: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
translation.source: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
translation.medium: Everyone's hobbies are different, some people like to collect, some people like to eat美食, of course, there are also those who like to drink, Red Label whisky is currently one of Scotland's best-selling whiskies in various countries, and Red Label whisky has won the International Wine & Spirit Competition Gold Award.
translation.reference: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.

translation.zh: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
translation.en: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
translation.source: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
translation.medium: Every bottle of red wine has its unique taste, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, it would be a waste of its aroma.
translation.reference: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.

translation.zh: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
translation.en: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
translation.source: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
translation.medium: So how do you drink a Bloody Mary?
translation.reference: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?

translation.zh: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
translation.en: I’ll introduce for you now.
translation.source: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
translation.medium: Let me introduce it to you simply.
translation.reference: I’ll introduce for you now.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌喝法：
translation.en: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
translation.source: 红牌威士忌喝法：
translation.medium: The Red Card Rule:
translation.reference: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:

translation.zh: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
translation.en: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
translation.source: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
translation.medium: Gin made with 35 varieties of Scottish whisky, it has the characteristics of traditional Scottish whisky and a strong fragrance, with a sweet and smoky aroma.
translation.reference: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.

translation.zh: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
translation.en: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
translation.source: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
translation.medium: The entrance is fresh and slightly fragrant with a strong aroma of barley.
translation.reference: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.

translation.zh: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
translation.en: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
translation.source: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
translation.medium: The vodka can be drunk straight up or mixed with your favorite beverage.
translation.reference: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
translation.en: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
translation.source: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
translation.medium: The Bloody Mary, once banned in China as a foreign import, has become a timeless fashion in the country as adaptations using local tastes such as Coca-Cola, Sprite or Qingdao Beer are popular.
translation.reference: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.

translation.zh: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
translation.en: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
translation.source: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
translation.medium: These sweet drinks not only neutralize acidity, but also visually please people. When added to drinks, they can change the taste of alcohol and make it more refreshing.
translation.reference: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
translation.en: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
translation.source: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
translation.medium: The authentic and most traditional way to drink it is with a slice of lemon and a spoonful of sugar (white or brown).
translation.reference: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.

translation.zh: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
translation.en: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
translation.source: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
translation.medium: The true red wine has a slightly sour taste, adding sugar can neutralize the sourness, lemon will give the wine a fresh aroma, of course, the sweet-sour degree can be according to personal taste.
translation.reference: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.

translation.zh: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
translation.en: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.
translation.source: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
translation.medium: The above three are the best drinking methods for red wine. You can try them. Hopefully, our introduction can help you.
translation.reference: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.

translation.zh: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
translation.en: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
translation.medium: Education Thought: How do college entrance exams make “tigers” and “flops”?
translation.reference: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
translation.en: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.
translation.source: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
translation.medium: Three students of Lanzhou Transportation University wrote a letter to the school leader, expressing their confusion about the university entrance examination and proposing to increase the difficulty of the examination, change the form of the examination and make the examination really reflect the actual level of students.
translation.reference: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.

translation.zh: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
translation.en: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.
translation.source: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
translation.medium: Indeed, for a long time, college entrance examination has been a “hot topic”.
translation.reference: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.

translation.zh: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
translation.en: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.
translation.source: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
translation.medium: In the university campus, students come from all over the country, with different levels of ability, and different learning experiences.
translation.reference: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.

translation.zh: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
translation.en: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.
translation.source: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
translation.medium: There are different opinions about groups with such diverse characteristics.
translation.reference: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.

translation.zh: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
translation.en: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.
translation.source: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
translation.medium: Of course, if the exam questions are all the same type, the repetition rate is high, and the questions are too simple, it will inevitably lead to a completely different feeling.
translation.reference: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.

translation.zh: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
translation.en: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.
translation.source: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
translation.medium: Students who are not diligent may be able to pass the exam with a concentrated attack before the exam, but if they want other methods, they may achieve twice the effect with half the effort.
translation.reference: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.

translation.zh: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
translation.en: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.
translation.source: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
translation.medium: In this way, just by not investing, you can pass the exams, and even get high scores. In contrast, the “know-it-all” never misses a class and does well in homework and note-taking, but still cannot get high scores in the exam.
translation.reference: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.

translation.zh: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
translation.en: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
translation.source: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
translation.medium: It seems that the students of Lanzhou University have reflected the problems that exist in the college entrance examination. It is believed that such a situation does not exist in Lanzhou University alone.
translation.reference: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.

translation.zh: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
translation.en: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.
translation.source: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
translation.medium: In this sense, it is praiseworthy for these three students who wrote letters directly.
translation.reference: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.

translation.zh: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
translation.en: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.
translation.source: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
translation.medium: In fact, everyone who has been to college knows that it is common for students to prepare for the college entrance exam and try various methods to obtain the exam questions from the teachers, compete for the exam scope, and seek intensive tutoring before the exam. It is even common to see students cheat during the exam or seek the help of their teachers after the exam.
translation.reference: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.

translation.zh: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
translation.en: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.
translation.source: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
translation.medium: In the author's view, as a kind of teaching quality evaluation orientation, it is more about the comprehensiveness of teachers' command of teaching and learning, as well as scientific issues based on this foundation.
translation.reference: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.

translation.zh: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
translation.en: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.
translation.source: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
translation.medium: At the undergraduate stage, specializations become more detailed, and many specialized courses focus on basic knowledge.
translation.reference: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.

translation.zh: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
translation.en: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.
translation.source: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
translation.medium: There is no doubt that whether you have comprehensively mastered the basic knowledge points of a subject is what the college entrance exam wants to test.
translation.reference: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.

translation.zh: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
translation.en: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.
translation.source: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
translation.medium: The basic knowledge of undergraduate courses is mainly based on disciplinary foundation theories and common sense. In terms of knowledge points, the space for change is not large. It is fixed.
translation.reference: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.

translation.zh: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
translation.en: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”
translation.source: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
translation.medium: As the teacher said, "The basic knowledge of mathematics learned 20 years ago in college is still being studied now and is still the focus."
translation.reference: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”

translation.zh: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
translation.en: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.
translation.source: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
translation.medium: But this does not mean that the examination questions are repetitive.
translation.reference: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.

translation.zh: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
translation.en: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.
translation.source: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
translation.medium: In many colleges, exams are generally composed of question groups, which are then compiled into试卷 by the department’s senior teachers. The exam papers are also graded by all the teachers in the department, so that the problem of repeated questions can be to some extent overcome.
translation.reference: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.

translation.zh: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
translation.en: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.
translation.source: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
translation.medium: But to design a set of tests that are consistent with actual teaching and have a normal distribution according to students' overall learning status, in addition to comprehensively grasping the teaching situation and comprehensively analyzing the degree of students' learning, so that the exam questions are dynamically grasped in terms of difficulty and type, which can highlight the basic knowledge examination and comprehensively consider the ability to examine while being innovative in the design of the questions.
translation.reference: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.

translation.zh: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
translation.en: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.
translation.source: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
translation.medium: Exams are the commanding rod of university education. Any exam, and students will have a corresponding preparation plan. In the past, this has affected the effectiveness of university education.
translation.reference: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.

translation.zh: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
translation.en: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.
translation.source: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
translation.medium: Lanzhou Jiaotong University attaches great importance to the recommendation letter for students. A reform plan has been put in place school-wide.
translation.reference: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.

translation.zh: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
translation.en: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.
translation.source: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
translation.medium: Require each teaching unit to organize teachers to carry out research and course final exams self-check, formulate exam questions and relevant regulations, strengthen supervision and inspection of exam questions and review cycle, refine grading criteria, and strengthen comprehensive supervision of all teaching sections.
translation.reference: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.

translation.zh: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
translation.en: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.
translation.source: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
translation.medium: Solving the problem of single-type test questions and repeated questions from the mechanism is a major issue that college entrance examinations need to face. Of course, corresponding systems need to be established, but the key is that teachers need to have a comprehensive grasp of the teaching situation. They should not only understand the teaching content, but also the learning situation of students. Only in this way can teaching and learning be better connected, and a positive interaction be established. The examination will also be more in line with the actual situation, so that “学霸” and “学渣” can each find their place.
translation.reference: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.

translation.zh: 如果无法为我变更分店位置，可以改为外送吗？
translation.en: If you cannot change the location of the branch store for me, can I change it to delivery?
translation.source: 如果无法为我变更分店位置，可以改为外送吗？
translation.medium: If you can't change my store location, can it be delivered instead?
translation.reference: If you cannot change the location of the branch store for me, can I change it to delivery?

translation.zh: 那我不必再多给次钱吧？
translation.en: Then I don’t need to pay again, right?
translation.source: 那我不必再多给次钱吧？
translation.medium: So do I really need to give you change?
translation.reference: Then I don’t need to pay again, right?

translation.zh: 同事的订单已经送完了
translation.en: My colleague has delivered all the orders.
translation.source: 同事的订单已经送完了
translation.medium: Your colleague's order has been delivered.
translation.reference: My colleague has delivered all the orders.

translation.zh: 拉不到完成呀
translation.en: I can’t pull it to complete.
translation.source: 拉不到完成呀
translation.medium: Can't finish it.
translation.reference: I can’t pull it to complete.

translation.zh: GPS 呢？到没到呀
translation.en: Where is GPS? Has it arrived yet?
translation.source: GPS 呢？到没到呀
translation.medium: GPS? Not yet.
translation.reference: Where is GPS? Has it arrived yet?

translation.zh: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
translation.en: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.
translation.source: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
translation.medium: Golden Lady Wedding Dress Photography (Nan Street Store) has not yet branched out
translation.reference: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.

translation.zh: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
translation.en: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.
translation.source: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
translation.medium: We changed the time twice before the photo shoot because we did not arrange the time properly. Advisor Lan Lan patiently helped us arrange the time.
translation.reference: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.

translation.zh: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
translation.en: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.
translation.source: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
translation.medium: Later, they chose a good weather weekend to shoot.
translation.reference: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.

translation.zh: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
translation.en: The staff at Mrs. Gold, no matter it’s consultant or makeup artist, are fantastic.
translation.source: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
translation.medium: Mrs. Kim's staff, whether consultants, makeup artists or photographers, all speak highly of her.
translation.reference: The staff at Mrs. Gold, no matter it’s consultant or makeup artist, are fantastic.

translation.zh: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
translation.en: That was the first time that I had officially put on makeup and wow, I couldn’t even believe that I could be so pretty one day, haha.
translation.source: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
translation.medium: It was my first formal make-up in my life. Wow ~ I can't believe it. I will also look like that one day, ha ha.
translation.reference: That was the first time that I had officially put on makeup and wow, I couldn’t even believe that I could be so pretty one day, haha.

translation.zh: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
translation.en: Xiaojie and the other girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were super patient while doing my makeup and the makeup was natural.
translation.source: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
translation.medium: Xiaojing and the other girl (I'm sorry, I forgot her name) applied makeup super patiently, and the makeup also very natural.
translation.reference: Xiaojie and the other girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were super patient while doing my makeup and the makeup was natural.

translation.zh: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
translation.en: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.
translation.source: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
translation.medium: The scene was filmed in Jiaxing, Zhejiang Province. Fortunately, the weather was good that day and I did not feel cold. While filming, the make-up artist occasionally paid attention to our clothing, hairstyle, and slightly helped us to arrange.
translation.reference: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.

translation.zh: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
translation.en: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.
translation.source: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
translation.medium: The photographer was also very humorous, and he felt very happy after taking photos for a day.
translation.reference: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.

translation.zh: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
translation.en: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
translation.source: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
translation.medium: At the time of selecting photos, as I had seen many cases online, I did not want to let the customer delete too many photos. However, when we were selecting photos, we really did not have the intention of adding any photos. There were 24 photos in the package, and not a single one was added. (I heard that my cousin, who got married just a few days after me, had over 7,000 photos added to her package, bringing the total to over 8,000 photos. I was shocked at the time, and I was also afraid that I would select too many photos)
translation.reference: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).

translation.zh: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
translation.en: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.
