translation.source: 那人在你身后追：“小姐！请等等！”（全程日文对话） 你在便利店门口停下了脚步。
translation.medium: The person behind you calls out "Miss! Please wait!" (all Japanese dialogue) You stopped in your tracks at the convenience store entrance.
translation.reference: The one chased behind you, “miss!” Please wait! “(Japanese dialogue) You stopped in front of a convenience store.

translation.zh: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
translation.en: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”
translation.source: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
translation.medium: "Miss... I am a director, I think you are very beautiful, are you interested in participating in a reality show?"
translation.reference: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”

translation.zh: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
translation.en: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.
translation.source: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
translation.medium: You're skeptical, fearful this is a trick.
translation.reference: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.

translation.zh: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
translation.en: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.
translation.source: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
translation.medium: He gives you a business card and you find out he's really the director of a major Japanese entertainment company.
translation.reference: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.

translation.zh: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
translation.en: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”
translation.source: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
translation.medium: If you have time, we can go to the company to talk. The salary will certainly be less.
translation.reference: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”

translation.zh: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
translation.en: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.
translation.source: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
translation.medium: You came to the company just because he said he saw you on the street and really hoped you could come.
translation.reference: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.

translation.zh: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
translation.en: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.
translation.source: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
translation.medium: You don't lose anything, you can even make money, so I signed the contract.
translation.reference: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.

translation.zh: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
translation.en: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.
translation.source: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
translation.medium: This is a large-scale reality show about love, divided into two parts.
translation.reference: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.

translation.zh: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
translation.en: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.
translation.source: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
translation.medium: Getting to know each other in advance can help build mutual trust in real life.
translation.reference: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.

translation.zh: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
translation.en: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.
translation.source: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
translation.medium: In the end, he will enter the game together.
translation.reference: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.

translation.zh: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
translation.en: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.
translation.source: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
translation.medium: Next week, the official recording will begin. Do you know who your partner is? What interesting things will happen?
translation.reference: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.

translation.zh: 那么，系统是否可看到新订单
translation.en: So, can the system see new orders?
translation.source: 那么，系统是否可看到新订单
translation.medium: So, can the system see the new order
translation.reference: So, can the system see new orders?

translation.zh: 那么会如何处理那个骑手
translation.en: So what would you do with the delivery person?
translation.source: 那么会如何处理那个骑手
translation.medium: So how do you deal with that rider
translation.reference: So what would you do with the delivery person?

translation.zh: 我想我不能接受订单多等 20 分钟都没有送到
translation.en: I don’t think I can accept the order still not being delivered after another 20 minutes.
translation.source: 我想我不能接受订单多等 20 分钟都没有送到
translation.medium: I think I cannot accept such late delivery. It has been 20 minutes, but it has not been sent yet.
translation.reference: I don’t think I can accept the order still not being delivered after another 20 minutes.

translation.zh: 沙巴3200名新生婴儿无报生纸 因特制防伪纸断货
translation.en: 3200 new infants in Sabah have no birth certificates because of the supply shortage of the specially made security paper.
translation.source: 沙巴3200名新生婴儿无报生纸 因特制防伪纸断货
translation.medium: 3,200 babies born in Shaanxi without birth certificates due to counterfeit paper cutting supply
translation.reference: 3200 new infants in Sabah have no birth certificates because of the supply shortage of the specially made security paper.

translation.zh: （亚庇11日讯）沙巴国民登记局说，由于特制防伪纸存货用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，至今累积的受影响者达3200人。
translation.en: (Kota Kinabalu News on the 11th) According to the National Registration Bureau of Sabah, new infants cannot be provided with birth certificates from the beginning of October due to supply shortage of the specially made security paper; a total of 3,200 infants have been influenced so far.
translation.source: （亚庇11日讯）沙巴国民登记局说，由于特制防伪纸存货用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，至今累积的受影响者达3200人。
translation.medium: (Azerbaijan 11th day of the month) The State Registration Service of the Republic of Azerbaijan said that due to the use of special paper for the storage of passports, it has been impossible to issue birth certificates to newborn babies since the beginning of October. To date, 3200 people have been affected.
translation.reference: (Kota Kinabalu News on the 11th) According to the National Registration Bureau of Sabah, new infants cannot be provided with birth certificates from the beginning of October due to supply shortage of the specially made security paper; a total of 3,200 infants have been influenced so far.

translation.zh: 不过，该局主任凯鲁阿米努斯保证，所有已经申请报生纸的婴儿，资料已经记录在系统，当防伪纸在下周运到后就会补发。
translation.en: However, director of the bureau, Kerouaminus, promised that the data of all the infants applying for birth certificate has been recorded in the system, and the certificates will be issued as soon as the security paper arrives next week.
translation.source: 不过，该局主任凯鲁阿米努斯保证，所有已经申请报生纸的婴儿，资料已经记录在系统，当防伪纸在下周运到后就会补发。
translation.medium: However, the director of the center, Khalid Amirunus, said that all babies who have applied for birth certificates will be recorded in the system. The false birth certificates will be issued next week.
translation.reference: However, director of the bureau, Kerouaminus, promised that the data of all the infants applying for birth certificate has been recorded in the system, and the certificates will be issued as soon as the security paper arrives next week.

translation.zh: 他在新闻发布会上，针对一家网媒指沙巴报生纸印制问题出现长达10个月的报导，作出解释。
translation.en: He made the explanation at the press conference regarding to an online media’s report that the paper shortage of birth certificates in Sabah has been going on for ten months.
translation.source: 他在新闻发布会上，针对一家网媒指沙巴报生纸印制问题出现长达10个月的报导，作出解释。
translation.medium: At a press conference, he explained a 10-month-old report by a web media alleging problems in the printing of the Sabah newspaper.
translation.reference: He made the explanation at the press conference regarding to an online media’s report that the paper shortage of birth certificates in Sabah has been going on for ten months.

translation.zh: 他说，有关问题在2个月前就出现，砂拉越也面对同样的问题。
translation.en: He said that related problems started 2 months ago, and that Sarawak is also facing this problem.
translation.source: 他说，有关问题在2个月前就出现，砂拉越也面对同样的问题。
translation.medium: He said the issue arose two months ago and that Salt Lake was facing similar problems.
translation.reference: He said that related problems started 2 months ago, and that Sarawak is also facing this problem.

translation.zh: “其中一个原因是生产特制防伪纸的中国厂家受疫情影响，导致延迟运抵我国 。 ”
translation.en: “One of the reasons is that the manufacturers of the security paper in China are influenced by the epidemic, leading to a delay in delivery to our country.”
translation.source: “其中一个原因是生产特制防伪纸的中国厂家受疫情影响，导致延迟运抵我国 。 ”
translation.medium: One of the reasons is that Chinese manufacturers producing special anti-counterfeit paper have been affected by the epidemic, resulting in delays in delivery to China.
translation.reference: “One of the reasons is that the manufacturers of the security paper in China are influenced by the epidemic, leading to a delay in delivery to our country.”

translation.zh: 他解释，沙巴报生纸使用的防伪纸和其他地区不同，因此不能商借其他州属的存货。
translation.en: He explained that the security paper used for birth certificates in Sabah is different from that of other regions, and therefore stock in other regions cannot be borrowed.
translation.source: 他解释，沙巴报生纸使用的防伪纸和其他地区不同，因此不能商借其他州属的存货。
translation.medium: He explained that the counterfeit-detecting paper used by Saipan's newspaper is different from that used in other areas, so it cannot be shipped to other states.
translation.reference: He explained that the security paper used for birth certificates in Sabah is different from that of other regions, and therefore stock in other regions cannot be borrowed.

translation.zh: 凯鲁阿米努斯透露，最新一批防伪纸已经于本月6日运抵吉隆坡，过后于8日交给印刷公司，进行部分印制工作。
translation.en: Kerouaminus disclosed that the latest batch of security paper has been delivered to Kuala Lumpur on December 6, and was handed over to the printing company on December 8 for part of the printing work.
translation.source: 凯鲁阿米努斯透露，最新一批防伪纸已经于本月6日运抵吉隆坡，过后于8日交给印刷公司，进行部分印制工作。
translation.medium: It is revealed that the latest batch of counterfeit notes arrived in Kuala Lumpur on the 6th of this month and was handed over to the printing company on the 8th for partial printing work.
translation.reference: Kerouaminus disclosed that the latest batch of security paper has been delivered to Kuala Lumpur on December 6, and was handed over to the printing company on December 8 for part of the printing work.

translation.zh: “该局下周四将派人到吉隆坡取货，回到沙巴立刻进行最后阶段的打印，估计多2个工作日（12月20日）就可以交到申请者手上 。 ”
translation.en: “The National Registration Bureau of Sabah will dispatch staffs to pick up the goods in Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to complete the printing of the last stage after returning to Sabah, and it is estimated that they can be given out to the applicants at most 2 working days later (December 20).”
translation.source: “该局下周四将派人到吉隆坡取货，回到沙巴立刻进行最后阶段的打印，估计多2个工作日（12月20日）就可以交到申请者手上 。 ”
translation.medium: The agency will send a courier to Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to pick up the passports and bring them back to Sharjah for the final stage of printing, which should take about two working days (December 20).
translation.reference: “The National Registration Bureau of Sabah will dispatch staffs to pick up the goods in Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to complete the printing of the last stage after returning to Sabah, and it is estimated that they can be given out to the applicants at most 2 working days later (December 20).”

translation.zh: “我们会通知申请者前往各地分局领取报生纸 。 ”
translation.en: “We’ll notify the applicants to get the birth certificates at their local branch bureau.”
translation.source: “我们会通知申请者前往各地分局领取报生纸 。 ”
translation.medium: We will notify the applicants to go to the local branch to pick up the admission notice.
translation.reference: “We’ll notify the applicants to get the birth certificates at their local branch bureau.”

translation.zh: 他补充，沙巴今年至今共发出2万4801张报生纸。
translation.en: He added that Sabah has issued 24,801 birth certificates so far this year.
translation.source: 他补充，沙巴今年至今共发出2万4801张报生纸。
translation.medium: He added that Shabbi has issued a total of 24,801 birth certificates since the beginning of this year.
translation.reference: He added that Sabah has issued 24,801 birth certificates so far this year.

translation.zh: 从 7 点多等到现在
translation.en: I’ve been waiting since 7 o’clock.
translation.source: 从 7 点多等到现在
translation.medium: More than seven years later
translation.reference: I’ve been waiting since 7 o’clock.

translation.zh: 那是不是就快到了？
translation.en: Will it arrive soon?
translation.source: 那是不是就快到了？
translation.medium: Is it just about time?
translation.reference: Will it arrive soon?

translation.zh: 我指的是食物
translation.en: I meant the food.
translation.source: 我指的是食物
translation.medium: I mean food.
translation.reference: I meant the food.

translation.zh: 我又在#PRS_ORG#对面等
translation.en: I waited again across the #PRS_ORG#.
translation.source: 我又在#PRS_ORG#对面等
translation.medium: I'm also at #PRS_ORG# across from
translation.reference: I waited again across the #PRS_ORG#.

translation.zh: 好好，谢谢，因餐厅说已准备好
translation.en: Okay, thank you, because the restaurant said it has prepared
translation.source: 好好，谢谢，因餐厅说已准备好
translation.medium: Good, thank you. The restaurant is ready.
translation.reference: Okay, thank you, because the restaurant said it has prepared

translation.zh: 人民日报评论员 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神-新华网
translation.en: Commentators from People’s Daily: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference – Xinhuanet
translation.source: 人民日报评论员 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神-新华网
translation.medium: People's Daily commentator: "The 14th Five-Year Plan got off to a good start - Xinhua
translation.reference: Commentators from People’s Daily: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference – Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 11: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference
translation.source: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11 wire People’s Daily December 12 commentary: “A Good Start for the 14th Five-Year Plan——A Commentary on Studying and Implementing the Spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference”
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 11: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference

translation.zh: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
translation.en: “Realizing a good start of the 14th Five-Year Plan”, the achievements made in economic and social development in our country for the past year were highly praised at the Central Economic Work Conference held from December 8 to 12.
translation.source: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
translation.medium: A good start has been made for the “14th Five-Year Plan”. The Central Economic Work Conference held from December 8 to 10 highly praised the achievements of China’s economic and social development over the past year.
translation.reference: “Realizing a good start of the 14th Five-Year Plan”, the achievements made in economic and social development in our country for the past year were highly praised at the Central Economic Work Conference held from December 8 to 12.

translation.zh: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
translation.en: General Secretary Xi Jinping gave an important speech at the conference, made a profound summary of the economic work of 2021, conducted in-depth analysis on current economic situations, made significant deployment on economic work of 2022, pointed out the direction for moving forward and provided the fundamental principles for the economic work next year to welcome the 21st National Congress of the CPC.
translation.source: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
translation.medium: General Secretary Xi Jinping gave a keynote speech at the meeting, summarized the economic work in 2021 in-depth, analyzed the current economic situation, made major arrangements for the economic work in 2022, and provided guidance for next year’s economic work, and pointed out the direction for moving forward and provided the fundamental guidelines.
translation.reference: General Secretary Xi Jinping gave an important speech at the conference, made a profound summary of the economic work of 2021, conducted in-depth analysis on current economic situations, made significant deployment on economic work of 2022, pointed out the direction for moving forward and provided the fundamental principles for the economic work next year to welcome the 21st National Congress of the CPC.

translation.zh: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
translation.en: We solemnly celebrated the centenary of the foundation of the Communist Party of China, officially announced the comprehensive building of a moderately prosperous society and the realization of the first centennial objective, and we will embark on a new journey of building a modern socialist country in an all-round way and march towards the second centennial objective.
translation.source: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
translation.medium: We solemnly celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Chinese Communist Party, officially declare the establishment of a moderately well-off society in an all-around way, and embark on a new journey of realizing the second centenary goal.
translation.reference: We solemnly celebrated the centenary of the foundation of the Communist Party of China, officially announced the comprehensive building of a moderately prosperous society and the realization of the first centennial objective, and we will embark on a new journey of building a modern socialist country in an all-round way and march towards the second centennial objective.

translation.zh: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
translation.en: We held the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party, summarized the significant achievements and historical experience of one-hundred-year struggle of the Party, passed Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party’s Centennial Struggle, the third historical resolution in the one-hundred year history of the Party, which is also the political declaration for the Chinese Communists in the new era in order to bear in mind our initial aspiration and mission, and insist on developing socialism with Chinese characteristics; it is an action guide for creating the future and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation by taking history as reference.
translation.source: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
translation.medium: We held the 6th plenary session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party to summarize the major achievements and historical experiences of the Party's century-long struggle, and adopted the third historical resolution of the Party's history, the Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on Major Achievements and Historical Experiences of the Party's Century-Long Struggle, which is a political declaration for the Chinese Communists in the new era to remember their original aspiration, adhere to socialism with Chinese characteristics, and provide a guide for action to realize the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
translation.reference: We held the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party, summarized the significant achievements and historical experience of one-hundred-year struggle of the Party, passed Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party’s Centennial Struggle, the third historical resolution in the one-hundred year history of the Party, which is also the political declaration for the Chinese Communists in the new era in order to bear in mind our initial aspiration and mission, and insist on developing socialism with Chinese characteristics; it is an action guide for creating the future and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation by taking history as reference.

translation.zh: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
translation.en: For the past year, under the intertwined influences of the great changes never seen during the past one hundred years and the COVID-19 global pandemic, external environments were more complicated and grim, and the tasks of pandemic prevention and control and various economic and social development tasks are extremely heavy and arduous.
translation.source: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
translation.medium: In the past year, the world has experienced unprecedented major changes and the global spread of the COVID-19 pandemic, and the external environment has become increasingly complex and severe. The prevention and control of the COVID-19 pandemic and the economic and social development tasks are extremely heavy and arduous.
translation.reference: For the past year, under the intertwined influences of the great changes never seen during the past one hundred years and the COVID-19 global pandemic, external environments were more complicated and grim, and the tasks of pandemic prevention and control and various economic and social development tasks are extremely heavy and arduous.

translation.zh: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。
translation.en: The Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core insists on taking both the domestic and international situations into consideration, adheres to the general tone of seeking progress in stability, calmly copes with the great changes in the past one hundred years and the epidemic of the century, coordinates epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, accelerates the construction of the new development pattern, strengthens the cross cyclical adjustment of macro policies, lays emphasis on promoting continuous healthy development of economy and deepening reform, opening up and innovation, and works hard to complete reform and development tasks; new significant achievements in various undertakings of the Party and our country have been made.
translation.source: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。
translation.medium: The CPC Central Committee, with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, adheres to the general guidance of the two major national and international situations, adheres to the general tone of seeking progress while ensuring stability, responds to the changes of the times and the challenges of the century, coordinates the prevention and control of epidemics and economic and social development, accelerates the building of a new development pattern, strengthens macroeconomic policy coordination across periods, promotes sustained and healthy economic development, strives to deepen reform and opening up and innovation, and makes new major achievements in the cause of reform and development.
translation.reference: The Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core insists on taking both the domestic and international situations into consideration, adheres to the general tone of seeking progress in stability, calmly copes with the great changes in the past one hundred years and the epidemic of the century, coordinates epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, accelerates the construction of the new development pattern, strengthens the cross cyclical adjustment of macro policies, lays emphasis on promoting continuous healthy development of economy and deepening reform, opening up and innovation, and works hard to complete reform and development tasks; new significant achievements in various undertakings of the Party and our country have been made.

translation.zh: “十四五”实现良好开局，一个重要方面体现在，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效。
translation.en: One of the important aspects of the good start of the “14th Five-Year Plan” is that we are taking a new step in constructing the new development pattern, and new achievements have been obtained with high-quality development.
translation.source: “十四五”实现良好开局，一个重要方面体现在，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效。
translation.medium: The “Silk Road” initiative has got off to a good start. One important aspect is that it has taken a new step in building a new development pattern and achieved new results in high-quality development.
translation.reference: One of the important aspects of the good start of the “14th Five-Year Plan” is that we are taking a new step in constructing the new development pattern, and new achievements have been obtained with high-quality development.

translation.zh: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
translation.en: The economic development and epidemic prevention and control of our country is a leading position in the world, with the characteristics of strong development tenacity, great potential and sufficient motivation continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs in key and core technologies; the industry chain tenacity is improved, and the foreign trade quantity and quality have been elevated, structure is further optimized, and new kinetic energy represented by new industries, new business forms and new models grows and expands; the reform and opening up are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points restraining the matching of the supply and the demand and the flowing of factors, and to build new competitiveness for cooperation with high-standard opening up; the guarantee of people’s livelihood is powerful and effective, employment scale is further expanded, and personal income growth is basically in step with economic growth; the grain output of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin for 7 consecutive years, getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years”; the construction of ecological civilization has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions and the carbon neutrality works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment has made new achievements.
translation.source: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
translation.medium: Our country's economic development and epidemic prevention and control have maintained a leading position in the world. The characteristics of resilience, great potential, and strong momentum have continued to appear. The national strategic scientific and technological power has accelerated and major innovative achievements have emerged one after another. The scientific and technological innovation capability has continued to improve. Key core technology breakthroughs have been achieved. The industry chain's resilience has been improved, the foreign trade volume has increased, and the structure has continued to optimize. The new driving force for growth has been greatly strengthened. The reform and opening-up has been deepened, and efforts have been made to break through the
translation.reference: The economic development and epidemic prevention and control of our country is a leading position in the world, with the characteristics of strong development tenacity, great potential and sufficient motivation continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs in key and core technologies; the industry chain tenacity is improved, and the foreign trade quantity and quality have been elevated, structure is further optimized, and new kinetic energy represented by new industries, new business forms and new models grows and expands; the reform and opening up are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points restraining the matching of the supply and the demand and the flowing of factors, and to build new competitiveness for cooperation with high-standard opening up; the guarantee of people’s livelihood is powerful and effective, employment scale is further expanded, and personal income growth is basically in step with economic growth; the grain output of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin for 7 consecutive years, getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years”; the construction of ecological civilization has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions and the carbon neutrality works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment has made new achievements.

translation.zh: 这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
translation.en: These achievements are the results of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as its core, the results of the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era, and the results of unity and hard work of the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in China.
translation.source: 这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
translation.medium: These achievements are the result of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, the result of the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and the result of the united efforts of the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in the country.
translation.reference: These achievements are the results of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as its core, the results of the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era, and the results of unity and hard work of the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in China.

translation.zh: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
translation.en: It is proved by practice again that the establishment of the position of Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the Party, and the establishment of the guiding position of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era play a decisive role in promoting the development of the Party and the country in the new era and in propelling the historical process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
translation.source: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
translation.medium: The practice once again proved that the Party established the central role of Comrade Xi Jinping in the Party Central Committee and the guiding position of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, which is of decisive significance for the development of the Party and our country in the new era and for advancing the process of realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
translation.reference: It is proved by practice again that the establishment of the position of Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the Party, and the establishment of the guiding position of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era play a decisive role in promoting the development of the Party and the country in the new era and in propelling the historical process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

translation.zh: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
translation.en: With General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee, with the scientific guidance of socialism with Chinese characteristics of Xi Jinping in the new era, with unity and struggle of people of all ethnic groups in the Party and the whole country, we can solve all difficulties and create new glories and historical achievements in the new journey of building a socialist modern country in an all-round way.
translation.source: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
translation.medium: Guided by General Secretary Xi Jinping, who is the core and helm of the Party Central Committee, and by the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and united as one by the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in the country, we must be able to overcome various difficulties and obstacles and make new contributions to building a socialist modern power.
translation.reference: With General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee, with the scientific guidance of socialism with Chinese characteristics of Xi Jinping in the new era, with unity and struggle of people of all ethnic groups in the Party and the whole country, we can solve all difficulties and create new glories and historical achievements in the new journey of building a socialist modern country in an all-round way.

translation.zh: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
translation.en: The 20th National Congress of the CPC will be held next year, which is a major event for the political life of our Party and country.
translation.source: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
translation.medium: Next year, the 20th CPC National Congress will be held, which is a major event in both the party and the country’s political life.
translation.reference: The 20th National Congress of the CPC will be held next year, which is a major event for the political life of our Party and country.

translation.zh: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
translation.en: We should carry forward the great spirit of Party building, insist on the fundamental principle of seeking for improvement in stability, implement the development idea in a complete, accurate and comprehensive way, accelerate construction of the new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, insist on driving development with innovation, promote high-quality development, insist on taking the supply-side structural reform as the principal line, coordinate the epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, plan development and security as a whole, continue to implement “six-stability” and “six-guarantee” work, continue to improve people’s livelihood, lay emphasis on stabilizing macroscopic economy, keep economy operation within reasonable ranges and maintain social stability; in this way, we must be able to keep a stable and healthy economic environment, a peaceful and safe social environment, a clean and upright political environment, and welcome the successful convocation of the 20th CPC National Congress with excellent results.
translation.source: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
translation.medium: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社
translation.reference: We should carry forward the great spirit of Party building, insist on the fundamental principle of seeking for improvement in stability, implement the development idea in a complete, accurate and comprehensive way, accelerate construction of the new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, insist on driving development with innovation, promote high-quality development, insist on taking the supply-side structural reform as the principal line, coordinate the epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, plan development and security as a whole, continue to implement “six-stability” and “six-guarantee” work, continue to improve people’s livelihood, lay emphasis on stabilizing macroscopic economy, keep economy operation within reasonable ranges and maintain social stability; in this way, we must be able to keep a stable and healthy economic environment, a peaceful and safe social environment, a clean and upright political environment, and welcome the successful convocation of the 20th CPC National Congress with excellent results.

translation.zh: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
translation.en: Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core, strengthen “four-awareness”, be steadfast in insisting on “four self-confidence”, achieve “two-maintenance”, keep improving political judgment, political perception, political execution, implement the decisions made by the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and keep promoting socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era.
translation.source: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
translation.medium: let us unite more closely around the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, enhance the “Four Consciousnesses”, strengthen the “Four Confidences”, implement the “Two Safeguards” and continuously improve our political judgment, political awareness and political execution to implement the decisions and policies of the CPC Central Committee and push forward the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics in a new era.
translation.reference: Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core, strengthen “four-awareness”, be steadfast in insisting on “four self-confidence”, achieve “two-maintenance”, keep improving political judgment, political perception, political execution, implement the decisions made by the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and keep promoting socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era.

translation.zh: 超级方便，和在电脑打开一样，解决了我电脑硬盘不足的困扰
translation.en: It is super convenient, the same as when I opened it on my computer, and solved the trouble of not having enough room on my computer’s hard drive.
translation.source: 超级方便，和在电脑打开一样，解决了我电脑硬盘不足的困扰
translation.medium: Super convenient, and just like opening it on a computer, it solved my problem of insufficient hard drive space on my computer.
translation.reference: It is super convenient, the same as when I opened it on my computer, and solved the trouble of not having enough room on my computer’s hard drive.

translation.zh: 今天刚到的崭新的固态移动硬盘，移动固态硬盘电脑无法读取，移动固态硬盘电脑不识别，而用用U盘电脑可以读取。
translation.en: The brand new mobile solid-state drive just arrived today cannot be recognized or read by computer, but the USB driver can be read by computer.
translation.source: 今天刚到的崭新的固态移动硬盘，移动固态硬盘电脑无法读取，移动固态硬盘电脑不识别，而用用U盘电脑可以读取。
translation.medium: The brand new solid-state mobile hard drive just arrived today, but the mobile solid-state hard drive cannot be read by the computer, and the computer does not recognize it, while it can be read by a USB hard drive.
translation.reference: The brand new mobile solid-state drive just arrived today cannot be recognized or read by computer, but the USB driver can be read by computer.

translation.zh: 机器上手很轻巧，外观大气、美观。
translation.en: The laptop is light-weight and looks beautiful and luxurious.
translation.source: 机器上手很轻巧，外观大气、美观。
translation.medium: The machine is easy to operate, and it looks and is beautiful.
translation.reference: The laptop is light-weight and looks beautiful and luxurious.

translation.zh: 今天使用了一下午，散热非常好，基本感觉不到烫人，运行速度很快，开机秒杀99%的用户。
translation.en: I used it for one afternoon today and the heat dissipation was really good; I basically didn’t feel any heat and the it was very fast; the startup speed was faster than 99% of users.
translation.source: 今天使用了一下午，散热非常好，基本感觉不到烫人，运行速度很快，开机秒杀99%的用户。
translation.medium: Today, I used it in the afternoon. It is very good for cooling. The basic feeling is not hot and the running speed is very fast. 99% of users can be killed within one second after opening.
translation.reference: I used it for one afternoon today and the heat dissipation was really good; I basically didn’t feel any heat and the it was very fast; the startup speed was faster than 99% of users.

translation.zh: 电池也很强劲，待机9个小时，使用4个小时应该没有问题，总之，这个价格能买到这种品质的机子，感觉非常开心，其他功能等以后发现了再补充。
translation.en: The battery is powerful, works 9 nines between charges, and using it for 4 hours is no problem at all; in all, I feel happy to buy such a quality machine at this price, and I will add review of other functions later.
translation.source: 电池也很强劲，待机9个小时，使用4个小时应该没有问题，总之，这个价格能买到这种品质的机子，感觉非常开心，其他功能等以后发现了再补充。
translation.medium: The battery is also very strong. 9 hours of standby and 4 hours of use should not be a problem. Overall, it feels very happy to be able to buy such a machine at this price. Other functions are supplemented after discovery.
translation.reference: The battery is powerful, works 9 nines between charges, and using it for 4 hours is no problem at all; in all, I feel happy to buy such a quality machine at this price, and I will add review of other functions later.

translation.zh: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
translation.en: Education News: Beijing reduces the proportion of students with special talents in middle schools enrollment in 2016 - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
translation.medium: Education news: Beijing's compression ratio of first-grade students in 2016 - Xinhua net
translation.reference: Education News: Beijing reduces the proportion of students with special talents in middle schools enrollment in 2016 - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
translation.en: On the 21st and the 22nd, the inspection of the enrollment of students with special talents in middle schools was organized and implemented by education commissions of different districts.
translation.source: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
translation.medium: On the 21st and 22nd, the enrollment special work of primary schools in Beijing city will be carried out by the unified organization of all districts.
translation.reference: On the 21st and the 22nd, the inspection of the enrollment of students with special talents in middle schools was organized and implemented by education commissions of different districts.

translation.zh: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
translation.en: This year, districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment, leading to more fierce competition in students with special talents.
translation.source: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
translation.medium: In Beijing this year, the proportion of births to first-born children in all districts was compressed. The competition for first-born children was more intense.
translation.reference: This year, districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment, leading to more fierce competition in students with special talents.

translation.zh: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
translation.en: Take Dongcheng District as an example, the entrance proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment of middle schools does not exceed 5% of the total number in the district; the planned number is 380, and the proportion of students checking in at the school shall not exceed 10% of the enrollment plan of the school.
translation.source: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
translation.medium: For example, in the Dongcheng District, the proportion of students enrolling in primary schools and middle schools this year generally did not exceed 5% of the total enrollment plan of the district. The planned enrollment number is 380 people. The enrollment rate did not exceed 10% of the school enrollment plan.
translation.reference: Take Dongcheng District as an example, the entrance proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment of middle schools does not exceed 5% of the total number in the district; the planned number is 380, and the proportion of students checking in at the school shall not exceed 10% of the enrollment plan of the school.

translation.zh: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
translation.en: Students with talent in sports, art and science and technology who applied online are all qualified to participate in the inspection of students with special talents.
translation.source: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
translation.medium: All students with sports, art, and science and technology strengths who register online are eligible to participate in the specialty enrollment examination.
translation.reference: Students with talent in sports, art and science and technology who applied online are all qualified to participate in the inspection of students with special talents.

translation.zh: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
translation.en: In order to provide convenience for students to participate in the examination at a nearby location, Dongcheng District continues with the examination arrangement of the past year by setting one or two examination locations in each school district, and there are totally 13 examination locations.
translation.source: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
translation.medium: In order to facilitate students to participate in the examination, the East District continues to arrange the examination site last year. A total of 13 examination sites will be set in each school district.
translation.reference: In order to provide convenience for students to participate in the examination at a nearby location, Dongcheng District continues with the examination arrangement of the past year by setting one or two examination locations in each school district, and there are totally 13 examination locations.

translation.zh: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
translation.en: The examination locations are divided according to the examination districts, and the time frames are divided in hours, and students will be examined in different examination rooms after entering the examination locations according to the assigned time frame.
translation.source: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
translation.medium: The exam points are divided according to the exam district, and the time is divided into one-hour intervals. Students who are examined on the same day will be examined according to the time period in different exam districts.
translation.reference: The examination locations are divided according to the examination districts, and the time frames are divided in hours, and students will be examined in different examination rooms after entering the examination locations according to the assigned time frame.

translation.zh: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
translation.en: On May 23, the list of the students who have passed the examination will be publicized on the website of the Educational Admission Examination Center of the district, and students can inquire the result of the examination on the website.
translation.source: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
translation.medium: On May 23, the district education enrollment examination center released the list of students who passed the examination. Students may check the examination results online.
translation.reference: On May 23, the list of the students who have passed the examination will be publicized on the website of the Educational Admission Examination Center of the district, and students can inquire the result of the examination on the website.

translation.zh: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
translation.en: President of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee: It is firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
translation.medium: BOCOG Chairman: I firmly believe that China has the capability to successfully host the Winter Olympic Games
translation.reference: President of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee: It is firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
translation.en: Message from Sarajevo of Xinhuanet on December 11, Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, said recently that Bosnia was looking forward to the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time.
translation.source: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency/Sarajevo December 11 wire. The chairman of the Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee Covic recently said that Bosnia and Herzegovina are very much looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics and are convinced that China has the capability to hold a special Winter Olympic Games.
translation.reference: Message from Sarajevo of Xinhuanet on December 11, Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, said recently that Bosnia was looking forward to the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time.

translation.zh: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
translation.en: Ji Ping, ambassador of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina, met with Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, in Sarajevo Olympic Center a few days ago.
translation.source: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
translation.medium: Recently, China's ambassador to Montenegro, Jiping, met with the president of the Montenegrin Olympic Committee, Kavaci.
translation.reference: Ji Ping, ambassador of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina, met with Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, in Sarajevo Olympic Center a few days ago.

translation.zh: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
translation.en: During the meeting, Kvesic spoke positively about the relationship between Bosnia and Herzegovina and China; when he visited China during the Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics, the excellent organization work of the Chinese left him with a deep impression, and he firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during a special time; Bosnia was looking forward to Beijing Winter Olympics, and Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee was actively organizing representatives to attend the Olympics; Bosnia and Herzegovina wished to take it as an opportunity to develop wider exchanges and cooperation with China in the sports field.
translation.source: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
translation.medium: During the meeting, Cuban President Raul Castro positively appraised the relations between the two countries and said that he was deeply impressed by China’s outstanding organization work during his visit to China in 2008. He believed that China had the capability to successfully host the Winter Olympics in the special period. The Balkan country was very much looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics. The BOC was actively organizing the participation. The Balkan country hoped to take this opportunity to develop more extensive exchanges and cooperation with China in the field of sports.
translation.reference: During the meeting, Kvesic spoke positively about the relationship between Bosnia and Herzegovina and China; when he visited China during the Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics, the excellent organization work of the Chinese left him with a deep impression, and he firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during a special time; Bosnia was looking forward to Beijing Winter Olympics, and Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee was actively organizing representatives to attend the Olympics; Bosnia and Herzegovina wished to take it as an opportunity to develop wider exchanges and cooperation with China in the sports field.

translation.zh: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
translation.en: According to Ji Ping, there is a special “Olympic bond” between China and Bosnia and Herzegovina.
translation.source: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
translation.medium: Ji Ping said that both China and Japan have a special "Olympic bond".
translation.reference: According to Ji Ping, there is a special “Olympic bond” between China and Bosnia and Herzegovina.

translation.zh: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
translation.en: Sarajevo Winter Olympics was held successfully here in 1984, and Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics will open in two months, showing a simple, safe and splendid event to the whole world.
translation.source: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
translation.medium: The 1984 Sarajevo Winter Olympics was successfully held here. Two months later, the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics will also begin, and will present to the world a show of simplicity, security and magnificence.
translation.reference: Sarajevo Winter Olympics was held successfully here in 1984, and Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics will open in two months, showing a simple, safe and splendid event to the whole world.

translation.zh: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
translation.en: Both countries are expected to deepen exchanges and cooperation in terms of winter sports event preparation and athletes training, and the embassy of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina is willing to continue to serve as a bridge to promote exchanges in humanity between the two countries by taking Beijing Winter Olympics as the opportunity, so that the people of the two countries can “work together for a shared future”; the embassy wished that athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina could acquire good results in Beijing.
translation.source: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
translation.medium: We look forward to the in-depth exchange and cooperation between the two countries in the preparation of winter sports events, athlete training and other aspects. The Chinese embassy in Belgrade is willing to continue to play a bridging role and take the opportunity of the Beijing Winter Olympics to promote the continuous deepening of people-to-people exchanges between the two countries, pushing the two peoples "move forward together" and wishing the Belgrade athletes achieve good results in Beijing.
translation.reference: Both countries are expected to deepen exchanges and cooperation in terms of winter sports event preparation and athletes training, and the embassy of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina is willing to continue to serve as a bridge to promote exchanges in humanity between the two countries by taking Beijing Winter Olympics as the opportunity, so that the people of the two countries can “work together for a shared future”; the embassy wished that athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina could acquire good results in Beijing.

translation.zh: 会见前，波黑奥委会举办了“第十届年度最佳运动员”颁奖典礼，季平作为特邀嘉宾为波黑最佳青年运动员颁奖。
translation.en: Before the meeting, Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee held the awards ceremony for “the 10th Best Athletes of the Year”, and Ji Ping awarded the prize for the best young athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina as a special guest.

translation.medium: Before the meeting, the Black Sea Olympic Committee held the “10th Annual Best Athlete Award Ceremony” and Jia Ping, as a special guest, presented the Best Young Athlete Award for the Black Sea region.
