translation.zh: 会员评价
translation.en: Member reviews
translation.source: 会员评价
translation.medium: Member evaluation
translation.reference: Member reviews

translation.zh: [效果]照片效果：拍了两身衣服 整体来讲还不错 比较喜欢图片这一套～
translation.en: [Effect] Photo effects: I shot two outfits, and it was overall nice; I prefer the outfit on this picture~
translation.source: [效果]照片效果：拍了两身衣服 整体来讲还不错 比较喜欢图片这一套～
translation.medium: [Effect] Photo effect: The overall effect of the two pieces of clothing is not bad. I quite like this set of photos.
translation.reference: [Effect] Photo effects: I shot two outfits, and it was overall nice; I prefer the outfit on this picture~

translation.zh: [服务]服务细节：因为怀孕在化妆的时候有点不舒服 化妆师和工作人员都很体贴 让我在一边休息了一会 还一直给我倒热水喝
translation.en: [Service] Service details: I was uncomfortable doing makeup because I was pregnant, and the makeup artist and staff were considerate enough to have me rest for while and keep pouring warm water for me.
translation.source: [服务]服务细节：因为怀孕在化妆的时候有点不舒服 化妆师和工作人员都很体贴 让我在一边休息了一会 还一直给我倒热水喝
translation.medium: [Service] Service details: I was a bit uncomfortable during pregnancy, so the makeup artist and staff were very considerate. They allowed me to rest for a while and gave me a cup of hot water to drink.
translation.reference: [Service] Service details: I was uncomfortable doing makeup because I was pregnant, and the makeup artist and staff were considerate enough to have me rest for while and keep pouring warm water for me.

translation.zh: 套系价格：1000元
translation.en: Set price: 1,000 yuan
translation.source: 套系价格：1000元
translation.medium: The set price is 1000 yuan.
translation.reference: Set price: 1,000 yuan

translation.zh: 谢谢兔子的点评 本来还说拒绝古风不适合古风 没想到成品出来简直太美了
translation.en: Thanks to Tuzi for commenting; I thought I would say no to the ancient style because it didn't suit me, unexpectedly the results were stunning.
translation.source: 谢谢兔子的点评 本来还说拒绝古风不适合古风 没想到成品出来简直太美了
translation.medium: Thank you for the rabbit's review. At first, I said that refusing the old style was not suitable for the old style. I did not expect that the finished product would be so beautiful.
translation.reference: Thanks to Tuzi for commenting; I thought I would say no to the ancient style because it didn't suit me, unexpectedly the results were stunning.

translation.zh: 感谢丹丹的认可，你的满意就能使我们充满电量继续向前，我们会继续加油！
translation.en: Thanks to Dandan for your recognition, your satisfaction will keep us going forward, and we will keep making improvement!
translation.source: 感谢丹丹的认可，你的满意就能使我们充满电量继续向前，我们会继续加油！
translation.medium: Thank you, Denmark, for your recognition. Your satisfaction will enable us to move forward with full batteries, and we will continue to try!
translation.reference: Thanks to Dandan for your recognition, your satisfaction will keep us going forward, and we will keep making improvement!

translation.zh: 这家摄影工作室真的太棒了 强烈推荐所有小伙伴们来！
translation.en: This photography studio is truly great, highly recommend it for everyone!
translation.source: 这家摄影工作室真的太棒了 强烈推荐所有小伙伴们来！
translation.medium: This photography studio is amazing! I strongly recommend all partners to come!
translation.reference: This photography studio is truly great, highly recommend it for everyone!

translation.zh: 无论从接待、化妆、服装、灯光、摄影到后期都无可挑剔。
translation.en: It was impeccable, no matter it’s reception, makeup, outfits, lighting or photography.
translation.source: 无论从接待、化妆、服装、灯光、摄影到后期都无可挑剔。
translation.medium: 无论从接待、化妆、服装、灯光、摄影到后期都无可挑剔。
translation.reference: It was impeccable, no matter it’s reception, makeup, outfits, lighting or photography.

translation.zh: 化妆师特别细腻，会根据你的风格搭配出适合你的妆容，化妆品用的也都是一线的大牌子。
translation.en: The makeup artist was attentive to details and would choose the makeup most suitable for you based on your style; the makeup products were also from leading brands.
translation.source: 化妆师特别细腻，会根据你的风格搭配出适合你的妆容，化妆品用的也都是一线的大牌子。
translation.medium: The makeup artist is particularly meticulous and will match your makeup style according to your taste. The makeup used are all top-line products.
translation.reference: The makeup artist was attentive to details and would choose the makeup most suitable for you based on your style; the makeup products were also from leading brands.

translation.zh: 田亮老师就更不用说了，摄影那是相当的专业。
translation.en: Not to mention Tian Liang, who is really a professional photographer.
translation.source: 田亮老师就更不用说了，摄影那是相当的专业。
translation.medium: Tian Liang did not need to say it again, photography is quite professional.
translation.reference: Not to mention Tian Liang, who is really a professional photographer.

translation.zh: 整个工作室很有艺术氛围，还有两只小猫咪陪伴玩耍。
translation.en: The whole studio is artistic, and there are two kittens to play with you.
translation.source: 整个工作室很有艺术氛围，还有两只小猫咪陪伴玩耍。
translation.medium: The whole office has an artistic atmosphere and there are two kittens playing around.
translation.reference: The whole studio is artistic, and there are two kittens to play with you.

translation.zh: 我们是在北京上班，北京好点的影楼都需要提前半年排队，同事有在北京拍的，看了下成片觉得just so so。
translation.en: We work in Beijing, and better studios in Beijing require queuing up half a year in advance; I have a colleague who did the photoshoot in Beijing and felt the photos were just so so.
translation.source: 我们是在北京上班，北京好点的影楼都需要提前半年排队，同事有在北京拍的，看了下成片觉得just so so。
translation.medium: We were working in Beijing, and had to queue up half a year in advance to watch a good movie in Beijing. A colleague watched it and thought it was just so-so.
translation.reference: We work in Beijing, and better studios in Beijing require queuing up half a year in advance; I have a colleague who did the photoshoot in Beijing and felt the photos were just so so.

translation.zh: 特意寻觅了这个工作室，一个有灵魂有态度的地方。
translation.en: I specifically found this studio, a place with soul and attitude.
translation.source: 特意寻觅了这个工作室，一个有灵魂有态度的地方。
translation.medium: I sought out this workshop, a place with a soul and attitude.
translation.reference: I specifically found this studio, a place with soul and attitude.

translation.zh: 我们的面部表情管理比较差，觉得这也是大多数人的短版，摄影师亮哥会抓拍，记录下自然精彩的瞬间。
translation.en: Our facial expression management was poor, and I think this is a problem for most people, but photographer Liang is good at capturing the natural and wonderful moments.
translation.source: 我们的面部表情管理比较差，觉得这也是大多数人的短版，摄影师亮哥会抓拍，记录下自然精彩的瞬间。
translation.medium: Our facial expression management is poor, and we think this is also the case for most people. Photographer Liao grabbed and recorded the moment of natural brilliance.
translation.reference: Our facial expression management was poor, and I think this is a problem for most people, but photographer Liang is good at capturing the natural and wonderful moments.

translation.zh: 化妆师，摄影师，后期设计，一个精良的团队。
translation.en: A brilliant team with makeup artist, photographer and post-editing design.
translation.source: 化妆师，摄影师，后期设计，一个精良的团队。
translation.medium: Makeup artist, photographer, post-production design, a skilled team.
translation.reference: A brilliant team with makeup artist, photographer and post-editing design.

translation.zh: 出来成片我们以及身边的人都赞不绝口。
translation.en: After the photos came out, we and everyone around us were full of praises for them.
translation.source: 出来成片我们以及身边的人都赞不绝口。
translation.medium: The finished film was applauded by both ourselves and those around us.
translation.reference: After the photos came out, we and everyone around us were full of praises for them.

translation.zh: 已经推荐闺蜜过去，而且闺蜜刚看了底片也同样满心欢喜。
translation.en: I have recommended my girlfriend to come, who was also satisfied with the photos.
translation.source: 已经推荐闺蜜过去，而且闺蜜刚看了底片也同样满心欢喜。
translation.medium: I have recommended the movie to my friends, and they all enjoyed it as well.
translation.reference: I have recommended my girlfriend to come, who was also satisfied with the photos.

translation.zh: 希望这样的工作室不要被埋没，有更多人发现ta，拍出来属于自己的风格，而不是千篇一律。
translation.en: I hope studio like this will get the attention it deserves and more people can discover it and shoot photos with their own style instead of being the same as everyone else.
translation.source: 希望这样的工作室不要被埋没，有更多人发现ta，拍出来属于自己的风格，而不是千篇一律。
translation.medium: We hope that these kind of workshops will not be buried, more and more people will find ta, shoot their own style, instead of thousands of one style.
translation.reference: I hope studio like this will get the attention it deserves and more people can discover it and shoot photos with their own style instead of being the same as everyone else.

translation.zh: 非常感谢占鹰、敬玲的五星点评，两位都是非常有想法、有创意的新人，我们就是创意工作室，只要顾客喜欢我们都尽百分二百的力去完成，感恩相识相遇
translation.en: Thank you to Zhanying and Jinglung for your five-star reviews, you are both creative new comers; we are a creative studio, and as long as customers like it, we will give our 200% to do it; we are grateful for meeting you.
translation.source: 非常感谢占鹰、敬玲的五星点评，两位都是非常有想法、有创意的新人，我们就是创意工作室，只要顾客喜欢我们都尽百分二百的力去完成，感恩相识相遇
translation.medium: Thank you very much for the five-star rating from Eagle and Jingling. Both of them are very creative and new people. We are a creative workshop. As long as the customers like us, we will go all out to complete the task. Thank you for recognizing us.
translation.reference: Thank you to Zhanying and Jinglung for your five-star reviews, you are both creative new comers; we are a creative studio, and as long as customers like it, we will give our 200% to do it; we are grateful for meeting you.

translation.zh: 甜美贴心的助理，还有活泼开朗的摄影师老师，团队的每一个人都超级nice 很美妙的一次拍摄，很难忘的一次经历，而且拍摄出来的效果比我想象的好很多 大家辛苦了，很感谢各位 😘😘
translation.en: Everyone on the team was nice, the sweet assistant, the lively photographer; it was a wonderful and unforgettable experience, and the photos were so much better than what I imagined them to be; thank you so much to everyone for your great efforts😘😘
translation.source: 甜美贴心的助理，还有活泼开朗的摄影师老师，团队的每一个人都超级nice 很美妙的一次拍摄，很难忘的一次经历，而且拍摄出来的效果比我想象的好很多 大家辛苦了，很感谢各位 😘😘
translation.medium: The sweet and thoughtful assistant, and the lively and outgoing photography teacher, every member of the team were extremely nice and wonderful to work with. It was an unforgettable experience and the results were even better than I had imagined. Thank you everyone! 😘😘
translation.reference: Everyone on the team was nice, the sweet assistant, the lively photographer; it was a wonderful and unforgettable experience, and the photos were so much better than what I imagined them to be; thank you so much to everyone for your great efforts😘😘

translation.zh: 谢谢小宇的点评 认识你们也是一种缘分 从呼和浩特到秦皇岛 对我们的信任就是几千公里的路程那么多 我很开心认识你们 有机会下次还来秦皇岛玩哦
translation.en: Thank you to Xiaoyu for your review, it was destiny to have met you; from Hohhot to Qinhuangdao, your trust in us is as long as the several thousand kilometers road; I am happy to get acquainted with you and hope you can come back to Qinhuangdao.
translation.source: 谢谢小宇的点评 认识你们也是一种缘分 从呼和浩特到秦皇岛 对我们的信任就是几千公里的路程那么多 我很开心认识你们 有机会下次还来秦皇岛玩哦
translation.medium: Thank you, Xiao Yu's comment. It's fate that we met you. The distance from Chongqing to Qingdao is thousands of kilometers. I'm very happy to meet you. Welcome to Qingdao next time.
translation.reference: Thank you to Xiaoyu for your review, it was destiny to have met you; from Hohhot to Qinhuangdao, your trust in us is as long as the several thousand kilometers road; I am happy to get acquainted with you and hope you can come back to Qinhuangdao.

translation.zh: 我要怎样给钱？
translation.en: How should I pay?
translation.source: 我要怎样给钱？
translation.medium: How do I give money?
translation.reference: How should I pay?

translation.en: The de-delivered food has arrived.
translation.source: 重送的餐已经送到了
translation.medium: The rescheduled meal has already been delivered.
translation.reference: The de-delivered food has arrived.

translation.zh: 没有骑手接收
translation.en: No delivery person received it.
translation.source: 没有骑手接收
translation.medium: No recipient
translation.reference: No delivery person received it.

translation.en: Now the restaurant employee is calling me.
translation.source: 现在餐厅职员给我打电话
translation.medium: The restaurant staff is calling me now.
translation.reference: Now the restaurant employee is calling me.

translation.zh: 一个想分享个人经历的编程小白。
translation.en: I am a programming newbie and I want to share my experience.
translation.source: 一个想分享个人经历的编程小白。
translation.medium: A programming whitepaper about sharing personal experiences.
translation.reference: I am a programming newbie and I want to share my experience.

translation.zh: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
translation.en: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place to get some training , but if you don’t want to, it’s better to study on your own; after all, trainings are expensive and it will take you six months to learn it.
translation.source: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
translation.medium: If you plan to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place for training, but if you don't have this idea, self-study is better because training costs a lot of money and takes six months to learn.
translation.reference: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place to get some training , but if you don’t want to, it’s better to study on your own; after all, trainings are expensive and it will take you six months to learn it.

translation.zh: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
translation.en: However, if you want to enter this industry, then training is a great option, especially for those who are extremely not self-disciplined.
translation.source: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
translation.medium: But if the intention is to break into this industry, training is indeed a very good choice, especially for those who are self-taught and weak. Training is even better.
translation.reference: However, if you want to enter this industry, then training is a great option, especially for those who are extremely not self-disciplined.

translation.zh: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
translation.en: You can choose to teach yourself if you are self-disciplined, but it will be tiring.
translation.source: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
translation.medium: If you have strong self-study ability, you can choose to self-study, but it will be quite tiring.
translation.reference: You can choose to teach yourself if you are self-disciplined, but it will be tiring.

translation.zh: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
translation.en: Certainly, selecting a good training agency is very important.
translation.source: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
translation.medium: Of course, choosing a good training institution is very important.
translation.reference: Certainly, selecting a good training agency is very important.

translation.zh: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
translation.en: You need to first look at the faculty of this agency; if it’s not strong enough, you can cross that agency off your list; of course, some new agencies don’t have strong faculties.
translation.source: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
translation.medium: First, we need to look at the institution's teaching strength. If the teaching strength is not strong enough, then the training institution is meaningless. Of course, the teaching strength of some newly opened training institutions is not particularly strong.
translation.reference: You need to first look at the faculty of this agency; if it’s not strong enough, you can cross that agency off your list; of course, some new agencies don’t have strong faculties.

translation.zh: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
translation.en: Secondly, you shall do some research on the agency before choosing it; it’s best to contact former students of the agency; after all, only students know how the agency really is and whether the curriculum is good or not.
translation.source: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
translation.medium: Secondly, before choosing, it is better to inquire about this training institution. It is best to inquire about the students who have studied in this institution, after all, only the institution's students know this institution to the bottom, whether the courses are good or not.
translation.reference: Secondly, you shall do some research on the agency before choosing it; it’s best to contact former students of the agency; after all, only students know how the agency really is and whether the curriculum is good or not.

translation.zh: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
translation.en: Hello, actually I’m not sure how to answer your question since you didn’t introduce your own situation, and learning this is closely related to your situation.
translation.source: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
translation.medium: Hello, to be honest, I don't know how to answer your question because you haven't made a definite introduction about yourself, and learning this thing and your personal situation have a great relationship.
translation.reference: Hello, actually I’m not sure how to answer your question since you didn’t introduce your own situation, and learning this is closely related to your situation.

translation.zh: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
translation.en: Such as your major, age, the language you want to learn, and even which city you are in; all of these are related to what you want to learn or what industry you want to go into.
translation.source: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
translation.medium: For example, professionalism, age, the language you want to learn, and even the city where you want to learn, are all related to the industry you want to learn or want to engage in.
translation.reference: Such as your major, age, the language you want to learn, and even which city you are in; all of these are related to what you want to learn or what industry you want to go into.

translation.zh: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
translation.en: If you are a student who haven’t graduated yet, or if you are a computer major and have graduated, then I recommend learning it yourself if you have time, and this is the method with lowest efficiency and cost; many offline and online training agencies are good now, but it comes with great cost and takes a lot of time; it basically needs a concentrated training of three to six months.
translation.source: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
translation.medium: If you are a student and have not graduated yet, or if you are a graduate in computer science, I recommend self-study if there is enough time. This is the most efficient and cost-effective way. Nowadays, many online and offline training institutions are actually quite good, but the learning cost is high and the investment time is relatively long. It usually takes 3-6 months to concentrate on training.
translation.reference: If you are a student who haven’t graduated yet, or if you are a computer major and have graduated, then I recommend learning it yourself if you have time, and this is the method with lowest efficiency and cost; many offline and online training agencies are good now, but it comes with great cost and takes a lot of time; it basically needs a concentrated training of three to six months.

translation.zh: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
translation.en: However, if you are in the same situation as I mentioned, it is convenient to learn it yourself; many learning resources are free online, or you can gain access to a lot of training resources on Bilibili; if you don’t know how to search for them, you can contact me according to my bio and get free resources or detailed consultation.
translation.source: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
translation.medium: However, if I were to say these things, self-study would be very convenient. Nowadays, there are many free learning resources on the internet, and there are also many training resources on the B站. If you don't know where to find resources, you can also contact me for free resources or detailed consultation.
translation.reference: However, if you are in the same situation as I mentioned, it is convenient to learn it yourself; many learning resources are free online, or you can gain access to a lot of training resources on Bilibili; if you don’t know how to search for them, you can contact me according to my bio and get free resources or detailed consultation.

translation.zh: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
translation.en: There are also classic books to supplement your study with videos.
translation.source: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
translation.medium: In addition, there are some relatively classic books that can be combined with video comprehensive learning.
translation.reference: There are also classic books to supplement your study with videos.

translation.zh: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
translation.en: If you are not a computer major, but you can pay certain amount of money and devote your time to your learning, then I suggest you go to an agency to study; it’ll be easier this way as the teachers will explain in detail and there will be designated people answering your questions; in addition, it’ll be helpful to your study planning or help you get supervision.
translation.source: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
translation.medium: If you are not a computer professional but can pay a certain learning and time cost, I suggest going to training institutions to learn. This way of learning is not too tiring, and the teacher's explanation is also very detailed. There are people who specialize in answering questions, and in addition, there is help in learning planning or supervision.
translation.reference: If you are not a computer major, but you can pay certain amount of money and devote your time to your learning, then I suggest you go to an agency to study; it’ll be easier this way as the teachers will explain in detail and there will be designated people answering your questions; in addition, it’ll be helpful to your study planning or help you get supervision.

translation.zh: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
translation.en: Further, many training agencies will sign employment agreement; they have quota for internal promotion, and you can be recommended to a company after your learning, so that the job interview process can be easier.
translation.source: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
translation.medium: In addition, many training institutions nowadays will sign employment agreements and have internal referral amounts. After learning, they will recommend going to companies. As a result, the interview process for finding a job can be saved.
translation.reference: Further, many training agencies will sign employment agreement; they have quota for internal promotion, and you can be recommended to a company after your learning, so that the job interview process can be easier.

translation.zh: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
translation.en: The above is my opinion; as I said, I don’t know about your situation so my introduction is not detailed; if you want to consult other things, you may contact me any time.
translation.source: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
translation.medium: Above is my point of view. Because I don't understand your situation, I only roughly introduced it. If you have other questions to consult, you can contact me at any time for communication.
translation.reference: The above is my opinion; as I said, I don’t know about your situation so my introduction is not detailed; if you want to consult other things, you may contact me any time.

translation.zh: 我说 1 点前到，我在 App 都看见了
translation.en: I said it should arrive before 1 o’clock, and I’ve seen it in the App.
translation.source: 我说 1 点前到，我在 App 都看见了
translation.medium: I said 10 minutes ago, I saw it on the app
translation.reference: I said it should arrive before 1 o’clock, and I’ve seen it in the App.

translation.zh: 什么叫
translation.en: What is the...
translation.source: 什么叫
translation.medium: What
translation.reference: What is the...

translation.zh: 我还没说完，你干什么呢？
translation.en: I haven’t finished speaking, what are you doing?
translation.source: 我还没说完，你干什么呢？
translation.medium: I haven't finished yet, what are you doing?
translation.reference: I haven’t finished speaking, what are you doing?

translation.zh: 本人，承接各种（安装、清洗，维修）、壁挂炉热水器，净水器，洗衣机、空调、马桶、灶头、油烟机、装灯具、擦玻璃，专业美缝，家政服务
translation.en: I undertake all kinds of housekeeping services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall mounted water heater, water purifier, washing machine, air conditioner, toilet, stove, range hood, lamp installation, glass cleaning, and professional sewing.
translation.source: 本人，承接各种（安装、清洗，维修）、壁挂炉热水器，净水器，洗衣机、空调、马桶、灶头、油烟机、装灯具、擦玻璃，专业美缝，家政服务
translation.medium: I am proficient in various tasks such as installing, cleaning, and repairing stoves, water heaters, purifiers, washing machines, air conditioners, barrels, lamps, oil burners, lighting fixtures, and glass polishing, as well as providing domestic services.
translation.reference: I undertake all kinds of housekeeping services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall mounted water heater, water purifier, washing machine, air conditioner, toilet, stove, range hood, lamp installation, glass cleaning, and professional sewing.

translation.zh: 感谢那些默默给我点赞的人 ，为了生活努力拼搏 生活很累但要继续
translation.en: Thanks to everyone who liked my post; I will carry on working hard although life is difficult.
translation.source: 感谢那些默默给我点赞的人 ，为了生活努力拼搏 生活很累但要继续
translation.medium: Thank you to those who silently liked my post. Life is tough but we must continue to strive for it.
translation.reference: Thanks to everyone who liked my post; I will carry on working hard although life is difficult.

translation.zh: 生活不会辜负每一个努力的人 ，喜欢就关注我吧 ，感谢那些默默给我点赞的人
translation.en: Life will not let hardworking people down; follow me if you like me; thank you to everyone who have liked my post.
translation.source: 生活不会辜负每一个努力的人 ，喜欢就关注我吧 ，感谢那些默默给我点赞的人
translation.medium: Life won't forgive those who don't work hard. If you like it, pay attention to me. Thank those who silently supported me.
translation.reference: Life will not let hardworking people down; follow me if you like me; thank you to everyone who have liked my post.

translation.zh: 生活就是这样，别人只看结果，自己独撑过程，面对生活，我们除了坚强，就是继续，别无选择，路可以回头看但不能回头走……
translation.en: This is life; others only see the result and you must go through it alone; in the face of life, we can only stay strong and carry on; there is no other choice; you can look back on life, but you cannot relive it...
translation.source: 生活就是这样，别人只看结果，自己独撑过程，面对生活，我们除了坚强，就是继续，别无选择，路可以回头看但不能回头走……
translation.medium: Life is like this, others only see the results, but we have to go through the process alone. Facing life, we are not only strong, but also continue. We have no choice but to move forward, we cannot turn back and go back...
translation.reference: This is life; others only see the result and you must go through it alone; in the face of life, we can only stay strong and carry on; there is no other choice; you can look back on life, but you cannot relive it...

translation.zh: 保洁是工作，也是职责，生活因服务而美丽，服务因用心而精彩。
translation.en: Cleaning is a job and a responsibility; life is more beautiful with services, and services are wonderful because we work hard.
translation.source: 保洁是工作，也是职责，生活因服务而美丽，服务因用心而精彩。
translation.medium: Cleanliness is work, it is also a responsibility. Life is beautiful because of service, and service is excellent because of dedication.
translation.reference: Cleaning is a job and a responsibility; life is more beautiful with services, and services are wonderful because we work hard.

translation.zh: 保洁我们虽然做的是最脏的活，但我们会用最认真的态度把客户家每个角落打扫的干干净净，看到客户满意的笑容和竖起的大拇指，那一刻所有的累都值了，付出终有回报！
translation.en: Although we do the most dirty work in cleaning, we will try to clean all the corners of the client’s house with our hard work; the moment I see the client’s smile and big thumb up, all the efforts spent are worthwhile; your hard work will pay off!
translation.source: 保洁我们虽然做的是最脏的活，但我们会用最认真的态度把客户家每个角落打扫的干干净净，看到客户满意的笑容和竖起的大拇指，那一刻所有的累都值了，付出终有回报！
translation.medium: Although we do the dirtiest job, we will use the most serious attitude to clean every corner of the customer's home, and see the satisfied smile and raised thumb of the customer. At that moment, all the tiredness is worth it, and there is always a return!
translation.reference: Although we do the most dirty work in cleaning, we will try to clean all the corners of the client’s house with our hard work; the moment I see the client’s smile and big thumb up, all the efforts spent are worthwhile; your hard work will pay off!

translation.zh: 我的日常工作
translation.en: My daily work
translation.source: 我的日常工作
translation.medium: My daily work
translation.reference: My daily work

translation.zh: ——您的要求，我的服务。
translation.en: - your requirements, my service.
translation.source: ——您的要求，我的服务。
translation.medium: -- Your request, my service.
translation.reference: - your requirements, my service.

translation.zh: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。
translation.en: Keep the beauty with attentive service and cleaning.
translation.source: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。
translation.medium: Serve with heart, clean with heart, keep it beautiful.
translation.reference: Keep the beauty with attentive service and cleaning.

translation.zh: 您关心的细节，丰桂家政帮你做到了“净”我所能，服务爱家。
translation.en: Feng Gui Housekeeping will try our best to care for the details you care about and love your house with our services.
translation.source: 您关心的细节，丰桂家政帮你做到了“净”我所能，服务爱家。
translation.medium: The details you are concerned about, the housekeeper can do "clean" for me.
translation.reference: Feng Gui Housekeeping will try our best to care for the details you care about and love your house with our services.

translation.zh: 保万家洁净，树家政囗碑，服务到位，洁净到家。
translation.en: Keep thousands of houses clean, establish a brand of housekeeping; standard service, in-house cleaning.
translation.source: 保万家洁净，树家政囗碑，服务到位，洁净到家。
translation.medium: Keep your home clean and tidy, decorate your home with beautiful flowers, serve you well, and keep your home clean.
translation.reference: Keep thousands of houses clean, establish a brand of housekeeping; standard service, in-house cleaning.

translation.zh: 室内外保洁 ，我的日常工作
translation.en: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work
translation.source: 室内外保洁 ，我的日常工作
translation.medium: Cleaning indoors and outdoors is my daily work.
translation.reference: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work

translation.zh: 水晶灯虽然华丽，但长时间不清洗也会黯淡无光，只有清洗后才可以溢放光彩，人生亦是如此
translation.en: Although the crystal lamp looks luxurious, it will be dim if it has not cleaned for a long time; only after cleaning, can it shine brightly, and so is life.
translation.source: 水晶灯虽然华丽，但长时间不清洗也会黯淡无光，只有清洗后才可以溢放光彩，人生亦是如此
translation.medium: Although crystal lamps are beautiful, they will become dull if they are not cleaned for a long time. Only after cleaning can they radiate light. Life is the same.
translation.reference: Although the crystal lamp looks luxurious, it will be dim if it has not cleaned for a long time; only after cleaning, can it shine brightly, and so is life.

translation.zh: 用心去做方能成功，用细致去塑造精致，美缝我们是认真的。
translation.en: Do it with heart and we can succeed; we are serious about creating exquisite things with our attention to details, and we are serious about cleaning seams.
translation.source: 用心去做方能成功，用细致去塑造精致，美缝我们是认真的。
translation.medium: We put our hearts into our work and strive for success. We pay attention to details and strive for excellence. We take our work seriously.
translation.reference: Do it with heart and we can succeed; we are serious about creating exquisite things with our attention to details, and we are serious about cleaning seams.

translation.zh: 给我机会，一定会让你满意的，质量说明一切，因为专业值得被信赖，你的认可是我最鼓励！
translation.en: Give me a chance and you will be satisfied; quality is everything, because professionalism is worth trusting; your recognition is the best encouragement to me!
translation.source: 给我机会，一定会让你满意的，质量说明一切，因为专业值得被信赖，你的认可是我最鼓励！
translation.medium: Give me a chance, and I will definitely meet your expectations. Quality speaks for everything, as it is trustworthy, and your recognition is my biggest encouragement!
translation.reference: Give me a chance and you will be satisfied; quality is everything, because professionalism is worth trusting; your recognition is the best encouragement to me!

translation.zh: 当下的各行各业都不好干啊！
translation.en: At present, there is not one industry that is easy to do!
translation.source: 当下的各行各业都不好干啊！
translation.medium: All professions nowadays are not good!
translation.reference: At present, there is not one industry that is easy to do!

translation.zh: 但是我始终相信，只要认真态度，够坚持，够努力，我就会比别人好一点，至少总比坐着抱怨强吧”！
translation.en: But I always believe that as long as I am serious, persistent and hard-working, I will be slightly better than others; it’s at least better than sitting around and complaining!”
translation.source: 但是我始终相信，只要认真态度，够坚持，够努力，我就会比别人好一点，至少总比坐着抱怨强吧”！
translation.medium: But I always believe that as long as you are serious, persevere and work hard, you will be better than others, at least be better than those who only complain.
translation.reference: But I always believe that as long as I am serious, persistent and hard-working, I will be slightly better than others; it’s at least better than sitting around and complaining!”

translation.zh: 一天之计在于晨，所有的美好从清晨开始 希望你携带着快乐、幸运、健康、如意出发 开始新的一天，保持一整天的好心情 早安
translation.en: Morning is the most important time of the day; all the good things begin in the morning; I hope you can start a new day with happiness, luck, health and joy; keep a good mood all day long; good morning.
translation.source: 一天之计在于晨，所有的美好从清晨开始 希望你携带着快乐、幸运、健康、如意出发 开始新的一天，保持一整天的好心情 早安
translation.medium: The plan for the day begins in the morning, all good things start from the morning. Hope you carry happiness, luck, health, and a positive mind to start a new day and maintain a good mood throughout the day. Good morning.
translation.reference: Morning is the most important time of the day; all the good things begin in the morning; I hope you can start a new day with happiness, luck, health and joy; keep a good mood all day long; good morning.

translation.zh: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
translation.en: When we were children, happiness was a thing, and we were happy when we had it; when we grow up, happiness is a goal, and we will be happy when we reach it; after maturity, I found that happiness is actually a state of mind, and understanding is happiness.
translation.source: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
translation.medium: When I was young, happiness was a thing, having it made me happy; when I grew up, happiness became a goal, achieving it made me happy; when I became mature, I discovered that happiness was a state of mind, realizing it made me happy.
translation.reference: When we were children, happiness was a thing, and we were happy when we had it; when we grow up, happiness is a goal, and we will be happy when we reach it; after maturity, I found that happiness is actually a state of mind, and understanding is happiness.

translation.zh: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
translation.en: Be the truest and kindest self, act according to your heart, and leave no regrets in your life; life is a road, go your own way; there are two treasures in life: good health and good mood, and you will live a beautiful life!
translation.source: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
translation.medium: Be true to yourself, be kind-hearted, make the most of the present; life is a one-way street, take your own path; life has two treasures: a sound body and a good mind, live a long and happy life!
translation.reference: Be the truest and kindest self, act according to your heart, and leave no regrets in your life; life is a road, go your own way; there are two treasures in life: good health and good mood, and you will live a beautiful life!

translation.zh: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
translation.en: We will encounter different difficulties in different stages of life.
translation.source: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
translation.medium: Every stage of life will encounter different difficulties.
translation.reference: We will encounter different difficulties in different stages of life.

translation.zh: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。
translation.en: Often times, what is restraining you is not you ability but your courage to face it actively.
translation.source: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。
translation.medium: Many times, what holds you back is not ability, but the courage to face it.
translation.reference: Often times, what is restraining you is not you ability but your courage to face it actively.

translation.zh: 既然无法躲避，不如坦然面对。
translation.en: Since you cannot hide, you’d rather face it.
translation.source: 既然无法躲避，不如坦然面对。
translation.medium: Since we can't avoid it, we might as well face it head-on.
translation.reference: Since you cannot hide, you’d rather face it.

translation.zh: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
translation.en: The more scared you are, the easier you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you take it head on, the problem will be solved.
translation.source: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
translation.medium: The more you fear, the more you will be defeated; if you face difficulties with courage, you will eventually find a solution.
translation.reference: The more scared you are, the easier you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you take it head on, the problem will be solved.

translation.zh: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
translation.en: Exhibition planners of China and Saudi Arabia work together to hold the first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
translation.medium: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
translation.reference: Exhibition planners of China and Saudi Arabia work together to hold the first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Riyadh on December 12 (journalists: Wang Haizhou and Hu Guan): The first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia, Diriyah contemporary art biennale, was officially opened to the public in the JAX arts district of Diriyah in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, on December 11, and a total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and other countries and regions participated in the exhibition.
translation.source: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Riyadh December 12 wire (Reporter Wang Haizhou) Saudi Arabia's first contemporary art biennial - the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennial - was officially opened to the public on the 11th at the Diriyah JAX Art District in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and other countries including China participated in the biennial.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Riyadh on December 12 (journalists: Wang Haizhou and Hu Guan): The first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia, Diriyah contemporary art biennale, was officially opened to the public in the JAX arts district of Diriyah in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, on December 11, and a total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and other countries and regions participated in the exhibition.

translation.zh: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
translation.en: The biennale is planned jointly by Diriyah biennale foundation of Saudi Arabia and UCCA of China, and Tian Feiyu, curator of UCCA of China, works as the art director.
translation.source: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
translation.medium: This dual-year exhibition is jointly planned by the Saudi Diriyah Dual-Year Exhibition Fund and the UCCA Ullens Center for Contemporary Art in China. The chief curator is Tian Fei, the director of UCCA Ullens Center for Contemporary Art.
translation.reference: The biennale is planned jointly by Diriyah biennale foundation of Saudi Arabia and UCCA of China, and Tian Feiyu, curator of UCCA of China, works as the art director.

translation.zh: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
translation.en: According to the introduction from the planning team, the theme of the biennale is “crossing the river by feeling the stones”, which is a metaphor of the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transition period and reflects the current situations of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia.
translation.source: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
translation.medium: According to the exhibition team, the theme of this year's two-year exhibition is "Crossing the River by Touching the Stone". It is a metaphor for the reform strategy adopted during the period of social and economic transformation. It also reflects the current situation of social cultural development in Saudi Arabia.
translation.reference: According to the introduction from the planning team, the theme of the biennale is “crossing the river by feeling the stones”, which is a metaphor of the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transition period and reflects the current situations of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia.

translation.zh: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
translation.en: The biennale occupies an area of nearly twelve thousand square meters, and the exhibition hall stretches across six connected buildings with six units: Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones, Inheritance as an Experiment, Thinking at the Edge, Walking to the Public, Beautiful New Word and On the Spirit of Arts.
translation.source: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
translation.medium: The bi-annual event, which occupies nearly 12,000 square meters of space, is comprised of six interconnected buildings showcasing six units: "Stone Bridges," "Inheriting the Experiment," "Marginal Thinking," "Facing the Public," "The Beautiful New World," and "The Spirit of Art."
translation.reference: The biennale occupies an area of nearly twelve thousand square meters, and the exhibition hall stretches across six connected buildings with six units: Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones, Inheritance as an Experiment, Thinking at the Edge, Walking to the Public, Beautiful New Word and On the Spirit of Arts.

translation.zh: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
translation.en: In which the number of the works of the 27 artists from Saudi Arabia accounts for more than 40% of the total number of the exhibits, including various art forms such as drawing, installation art and performing art; the works of the 12 Chinese artists also attracted much attention, and some artists create with recycled materials in an innovative way; for example, Xu Bing reconstructed a classic landscape painting with wastes in Behind the Story Series, Picture of Endless Streams and Mountains (2014).
translation.source: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
translation.medium: In particular, the works of 27 Saudi artists accounted for more than 40% of the total number of works at this exhibition, including painting, installation art and performance art, etc. The works of 12 Chinese artists were equally attractive. Some artists created works using recycled materials in an innovative way. For example, Xu Beihong constructed a classic landscape painting “The Endless Landscape” (2014) using waste materials.
translation.reference: In which the number of the works of the 27 artists from Saudi Arabia accounts for more than 40% of the total number of the exhibits, including various art forms such as drawing, installation art and performing art; the works of the 12 Chinese artists also attracted much attention, and some artists create with recycled materials in an innovative way; for example, Xu Bing reconstructed a classic landscape painting with wastes in Behind the Story Series, Picture of Endless Streams and Mountains (2014).

translation.zh: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
translation.en: According to Buckley, CEO of Diriyah biennale foundation, it is hoped that the biennale can establish an international dialogue, provide global audiences with opportunities to understand the vigorously developed culture industry and innovative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen interactions.
translation.source: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
translation.medium: Barkley, the CEO of the Diriyah Double Year Fund, said that he hopes that this year's dual year can establish international dialogue and give global audiences a chance to understand Saudi Arabia's cultural industries and creative communities, and strengthen interaction.
translation.reference: According to Buckley, CEO of Diriyah biennale foundation, it is hoped that the biennale can establish an international dialogue, provide global audiences with opportunities to understand the vigorously developed culture industry and innovative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen interactions.

translation.zh: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
translation.en: Tian Feiyu said, “The biennale has two objectives, i.e., establishing dialogue between contemporary art of Saudi Arabia and the world, and integrating audiences of Saudi Arabia into the contemporary art world.”
translation.source: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
translation.medium: Abdulnour said: "The goal of the two-year exhibition is dual, it can enable Saudi contemporary art to participate in the global dialogue and also enable Saudi audience to be integrated into the contemporary art world."
translation.reference: Tian Feiyu said, “The biennale has two objectives, i.e., establishing dialogue between contemporary art of Saudi Arabia and the world, and integrating audiences of Saudi Arabia into the contemporary art world.”

translation.zh: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
translation.en: It is understood that there will be a series of lectures during the biennale, and artists, exhibition planners and leaders of innovative industries will engage in discussions on cross-cultural communication, contemporary art development and other topics.
translation.source: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
translation.medium: It is understood that a series of lectures will also be held during the two-year cycle. Artists, curators and leaders in the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art.
translation.reference: It is understood that there will be a series of lectures during the biennale, and artists, exhibition planners and leaders of innovative industries will engage in discussions on cross-cultural communication, contemporary art development and other topics.

translation.zh: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
translation.en: Yunnan: Coordinate and standardize management of rural public welfare posts - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
translation.medium: Yunnan: The standardized management of village public interest positions
translation.reference: Yunnan: Coordinate and standardize management of rural public welfare posts - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Kunming on December 12 (journalist: Lin Bifeng): In order to continue to provide assistance to the employment of people lifted out of poverty, consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation work, Yunnan Province has released policies on the management of public welfare position in villages for promoting rural revitalization, as a way to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.
translation.source: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Kunming December 12 wire (Reporter: Lin Yuefeng) In order to continue to promote the employment of poverty-stricken population and consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation, Yunnan Province recently issued relevant policies to promote the management of public interest positions in rural areas, helping to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Kunming on December 12 (journalist: Lin Bifeng): In order to continue to provide assistance to the employment of people lifted out of poverty, consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation work, Yunnan Province has released policies on the management of public welfare position in villages for promoting rural revitalization, as a way to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.

translation.zh: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
translation.en: As introduced by person-in-charge of Department of Human Resources and Social Security of Yunnan, a total of 448.3 thousand rural public welfare positions have been developed in Yunnan to solve the employment of rural groups with difficulties such as labor force lifted out of poverty; they play an important role in helping people lifted out of poverty obtain employment and increase income, consolidating achievements of poverty relief and effectively improving rural public service abilities.
translation.source: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
translation.medium: The person in charge of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Human Resources and Social Security said that, at present, a total of 448,300 public interest positions in rural areas of Yunnan Province will be opened to help poverty-stricken groups, such as poverty-stricken workers, find jobs so as to help them achieve income increase, consolidate poverty eradication results, and effectively improve the ability of public services in rural areas.
translation.reference: As introduced by person-in-charge of Department of Human Resources and Social Security of Yunnan, a total of 448.3 thousand rural public welfare positions have been developed in Yunnan to solve the employment of rural groups with difficulties such as labor force lifted out of poverty; they play an important role in helping people lifted out of poverty obtain employment and increase income, consolidating achievements of poverty relief and effectively improving rural public service abilities.

translation.zh: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
translation.en: The new regulation is jointly printed and issued by seven departments such as the Department of Human Resources and Social Security, Rural Revitalization and Department of Finance of Yunnan, which mainly provides unified regulations on object scope, fund management, post development and post management of applicants of rural public welfare positions.
translation.source: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
translation.medium: The new regulations were jointly printed and circulated by seven departments including the Yunnan People’s Social Security Bureau, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Ministry of Finance, etc. The regulations mainly standardize the recruitment, remuneration, job development and job management of grassroots public interest positions.
translation.reference: The new regulation is jointly printed and issued by seven departments such as the Department of Human Resources and Social Security, Rural Revitalization and Department of Finance of Yunnan, which mainly provides unified regulations on object scope, fund management, post development and post management of applicants of rural public welfare positions.

translation.zh: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
translation.en: In terms of position development and setting, it is clearly stipulated in the new regulation that the positions are set according to the principles of “setting positions according to demands, designating personnel according to positions, dynamic management and total quantity control”, “the unit that develops and utilizes the positions shall be responsible for them” and “one position with one person, voluntariness, publicity and unified management”
translation.source: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
translation.medium: In terms of position development settings, the new regulations clearly state that the settings should be carried out in accordance with the principles of "flexible allocation of positions, fixed person, dynamic management, and total control". "Who develops, who uses, and who is responsible" as well as "one person one position, voluntary publicity, and unified management".
translation.reference: In terms of position development and setting, it is clearly stipulated in the new regulation that the positions are set according to the principles of “setting positions according to demands, designating personnel according to positions, dynamic management and total quantity control”, “the unit that develops and utilizes the positions shall be responsible for them” and “one position with one person, voluntariness, publicity and unified management”

translation.zh: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
translation.en: The recruitment procedures must be conducted in accordance the steps of announcement, application, review, making public notice, employment, pre-job training and taking up the post.
translation.source: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
translation.medium: The recruitment process must follow the steps of announcement, application, review, publicity, employment, pre-employment training, and arrangement of on-the-job training.
translation.reference: The recruitment procedures must be conducted in accordance the steps of announcement, application, review, making public notice, employment, pre-job training and taking up the post.

translation.zh: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
translation.en: In addition, the new regulation also specifies the specific duties of the main development department as well as the subsidy standard and method of the rural public welfare positions; it is stipulated that the development departments of rural public welfare positions shall purchase accidental injury commercial insurance for people taking rural public welfare positions; responsible departments are required to regularly supervise the subsidy distribution of rural public welfare positions.
translation.source: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
translation.medium: In addition, the new regulations also clearly defined the specific responsibilities of the main development departments of public interest positions in rural areas, the standards and methods of subsidies for public interest positions in rural areas, and stipulated that the departments responsible for the development of public interest positions in rural areas shall purchase commercial insurance for accidental injury for public interest position placement people. The relevant departments shall periodically supervise the subsidies for public interest positions.
translation.reference: In addition, the new regulation also specifies the specific duties of the main development department as well as the subsidy standard and method of the rural public welfare positions; it is stipulated that the development departments of rural public welfare positions shall purchase accidental injury commercial insurance for people taking rural public welfare positions; responsible departments are required to regularly supervise the subsidy distribution of rural public welfare positions.
