translation.zh: 长江干流实现水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖-新华网
translation.en: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas has been realized in the main stream of the Yangtze River - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 长江干流实现水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖-新华网
translation.medium: Yangtze River Delta achieves full coverage of water-based green comprehensive service zone - Xinhua
translation.reference: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas has been realized in the main stream of the Yangtze River - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
translation.en: Message from Wuhan Xinhua News Agency on December 11 (Reporter: Wang Xian): Chongqing Fuling on-water green comprehensive service area was completed on schedule and put into operation on December 10, which was the 2nd on-water green comprehensive service area officially put into operation on the upper reaches of Yangtze River after the Sichuan Luzhou water green comprehensive service area started operation on December 8.
translation.source: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Chongqing December 11 wire (Reporter Wang Jian) The Phase I construction of Chongqing Waterfront Green Integrated Service Area was completed as scheduled on December 10, which is the second waterfront green integrated service area to be officially put into operation on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River.
translation.reference: Message from Wuhan Xinhua News Agency on December 11 (Reporter: Wang Xian): Chongqing Fuling on-water green comprehensive service area was completed on schedule and put into operation on December 10, which was the 2nd on-water green comprehensive service area officially put into operation on the upper reaches of Yangtze River after the Sichuan Luzhou water green comprehensive service area started operation on December 8.

translation.zh: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。
translation.en: Up until now, on-water green comprehensive service areas have covered the upper reaches, the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River.
translation.source: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。
translation.medium: Up to now, the green comprehensive service area on water has covered the upper, middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.
translation.reference: Up until now, on-water green comprehensive service areas have covered the upper reaches, the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River.

translation.zh: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。
translation.en: According to introduction from Qiu Jianhua, deputy director general of Yangtze Navigation Administration Bureau of Ministry of Transport, before that, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu had constructed and put into use 10 on-water green comprehensive service areas in the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River, which had been recognized by sailors and had played an important role in promoting high-quality development of shipping in the Yangtze River.
translation.source: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。
translation.medium: Qiu Jianhua, deputy director of the Bureau of River Transport Management of the Ministry of Transport, said that up to now, 10 green comprehensive service areas have been built and put into operation on the upper and lower reaches of the Yangtze River in Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu provinces. This has won the recognition of boatmen and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River navigation.
translation.reference: According to introduction from Qiu Jianhua, deputy director general of Yangtze Navigation Administration Bureau of Ministry of Transport, before that, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu had constructed and put into use 10 on-water green comprehensive service areas in the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River, which had been recognized by sailors and had played an important role in promoting high-quality development of shipping in the Yangtze River.

translation.zh: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。
translation.en: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event for the construction of green shipping of the Yangtze River, which has greatly improved the abilities of pollutant collection and shipping services of the Yangtze River.
translation.source: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。
translation.medium: The full coverage of the green comprehensive service area on the water is another milestone event for the construction of green river transportation in the Yangtze River. The reception of pollutants by Yangtze River ships and the improvement of the transportation service capability are remarkable.
translation.reference: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event for the construction of green shipping of the Yangtze River, which has greatly improved the abilities of pollutant collection and shipping services of the Yangtze River.

translation.zh: 据介绍，水上绿色综合服务区是为广大船舶、船员提供全方位生产、生活服务，帮助广大船员解决“急难愁盼”问题的重要设施。
translation.en: As introduced, on-water green comprehensive service areas are important facilities that provide ships and sailors with comprehensive production and living services, and help them solve “emergent and difficult” problems.
translation.source: 据介绍，水上绿色综合服务区是为广大船舶、船员提供全方位生产、生活服务，帮助广大船员解决“急难愁盼”问题的重要设施。
translation.medium: According to the introduction, the water-based green comprehensive service area is an important facility that provides comprehensive production and living services for the majority of ships and crew, helping the majority of sailors solve the problem of "urgent distress".
translation.reference: As introduced, on-water green comprehensive service areas are important facilities that provide ships and sailors with comprehensive production and living services, and help them solve “emergent and difficult” problems.

translation.zh: 此次建成运行的长江上游两处水上绿色综合服务区，集生活服务、生产服务和政务服务为一体，以绿色环保为主题，以船舶维修与船舶应急救援服务为特色，实现港内船舶“一次靠泊、多项服务 ” ， 将使得常年航行在长江的船员工作更高效、生活更便捷。
translation.en: The two newly established on-water green comprehensive service areas in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River are integrated with life services, production services and government services; with environmental protection as the theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the features, they realize “multiple services at an anchoring” along the shore, providing sailors working in the Yangtze River all year long with more efficient work and more convenient life.
translation.source: 此次建成运行的长江上游两处水上绿色综合服务区，集生活服务、生产服务和政务服务为一体，以绿色环保为主题，以船舶维修与船舶应急救援服务为特色，实现港内船舶“一次靠泊、多项服务 ” ， 将使得常年航行在长江的船员工作更高效、生活更便捷。
translation.medium: These two water-side green comprehensive service areas built and put into operation on both banks of the Yangtze River Delta will integrate living, production and administrative services into one, with green environmental protection as the theme, and with ship repair and emergency rescue services as its characteristics. This will achieve “one-stop, multiple services” for ships in the port, making the work of ship crew sailing on the Yangtze River more efficient and convenient.
translation.reference: The two newly established on-water green comprehensive service areas in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River are integrated with life services, production services and government services; with environmental protection as the theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the features, they realize “multiple services at an anchoring” along the shore, providing sailors working in the Yangtze River all year long with more efficient work and more convenient life.

translation.zh: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
translation.en: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.
translation.source: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
translation.medium: Three U.S. aircraft carriers gather in the waters around China. Rare visit to the island by the most powerful weapon in the U.S. Navy. January 17, 2022. CCTV news: The latest news on Sino-U.S. relations: The latest satellite images show that the three U.S. aircraft carriers are gathering around China; In addition, the American media also revealed that one of the most powerful weapons in the U.S. Navy, which rarely visits the island, has sent an important signal to the allies and enemies of the United States in the Asia-Pacific region.
translation.reference: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.

translation.zh: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
translation.en: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.
translation.source: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
translation.medium: According to the news of the "South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform" of China's智库, on January 9, the satellite found the US "USS Carl Vinson" aircraft carrier near the Balabac Strait.
translation.reference: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.

translation.zh: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
translation.en: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
translation.source: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
translation.medium: The Panama Canal connects the South Sea and the Suwon Sea, and is a strategically important location on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
translation.reference: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.

translation.zh: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
translation.en: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.
translation.source: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
translation.medium: The platform expected that "Kearsarge" will be deployed to the South China Sea.
translation.reference: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.

translation.zh: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
translation.en: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.
translation.source: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
translation.medium: This is the first time the aircraft carrier "Kearsarge" has deployed the F-35C fighter and CMV-22 "Osprey" tilt-rotor aircraft.
translation.reference: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.

translation.zh: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
translation.en: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.
translation.source: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
translation.medium: In addition to the USS Carl Vinson, the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3, is also roaming in the Pacific.
translation.reference: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.

translation.zh: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
translation.en: USS Abraham Lincoln also carried the F-35C carrier based aircraft squadron for the first time, which belongs to the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.
translation.source: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
translation.medium: The "Lincoln" also for the first time embarked the F-35C aircraft, which belongs to the 314th Marine Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.
translation.reference: USS Abraham Lincoln also carried the F-35C carrier based aircraft squadron for the first time, which belongs to the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.

translation.zh: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
translation.en: Apart from the above two aircraft carriers, the US Navy currently also deploys the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia Pacific region.
translation.source: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
translation.medium: In addition to the above two aircraft carriers, the U.S. Navy currently has the “Ronald Reagan” aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia-Pacific region.
translation.reference: Apart from the above two aircraft carriers, the US Navy currently also deploys the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia Pacific region.

translation.zh: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
translation.en: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser “Champlain Lake” and guided missile destroyer “Stockdale”.
translation.source: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
translation.medium: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the "Shangpula Lake" missile cruiser and "Stoddart" missile frigate.
translation.reference: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser “Champlain Lake” and guided missile destroyer “Stockdale”.

translation.zh: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
translation.en: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform” released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China.
translation.source: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
translation.medium: Three U.S. aircraft carriers gather in the waters around China for a rare visit on January 17, 2022, "South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform" published the latest satellite images, showing that the three U.S. aircraft carriers are gathered around China.
translation.reference: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform” released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China.

translation.zh: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。
translation.en: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) three US aircraft carriers assembled around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the flight route of the US carrier-borne transport aircraft CMV-22B.
translation.source: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。
translation.medium: (Weibo @ South China Sea Strategic Trends) The US aircraft carrier and its escorts gathered around China and made a rare visit to the Diaoyu Islands. On January 17, 2022, the US military tilt-rotor aircraft CV-22B flew over the Diaoyu Islands.
translation.reference: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) three US aircraft carriers assembled around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the flight route of the US carrier-borne transport aircraft CMV-22B.

translation.zh: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 另据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）1月17日报道，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一上周末罕见地访问了关岛。
translation.en: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) According to report of CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy arsenal paid a visit to Guam in a rare case.
translation.source: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 另据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）1月17日报道，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一上周末罕见地访问了关岛。
translation.medium: According to a January 17 report on CNN, one of the strongest weapons in the US naval arsenal visited the island last weekend.
translation.reference: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) According to report of CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy arsenal paid a visit to Guam in a rare case.

translation.zh: 载有20枚三叉戟（Trident）弹道导弹和数十枚核弹头的俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”（USS Nevada）上周六（1月15日）驶入美国关岛海军基地。
translation.en: The Ohio class nuclear submarine USS Nevada, which carries 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).
translation.source: 载有20枚三叉戟（Trident）弹道导弹和数十枚核弹头的俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”（USS Nevada）上周六（1月15日）驶入美国关岛海军基地。
translation.medium: The Russian nuclear-powered submarine "Nevada" class, equipped with 20 Trident missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).
translation.reference: The Ohio class nuclear submarine USS Nevada, which carries 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).

translation.zh: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 分析称，这是向印度-太平洋地区日益紧张的局势中的盟友和敌人发出了一个信号。
translation.en: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; according to analysis, this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.
translation.source: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 分析称，这是向印度-太平洋地区日益紧张的局势中的盟友和敌人发出了一个信号。
translation.medium: The gathering of the three US aircraft carriers in the waters around China is a rare visit by the world's most powerful weapons. Analysts said that this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indian-Pacific region.
translation.reference: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; according to analysis, this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.

translation.zh: 这是美国弹道导弹潜艇自2016年以来首次访问关岛，也是自20世纪80年代以来第二次公开访问关岛。
translation.en: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016 and the second public visit to Guam since the 1980s.
translation.source: 这是美国弹道导弹潜艇自2016年以来首次访问关岛，也是自20世纪80年代以来第二次公开访问关岛。
translation.medium: This is the first visit by a U.S. ballistic missile submarine to the island since 2016 and the second public visit since the 1980s.
translation.reference: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016 and the second public visit to Guam since the 1980s.

translation.zh: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 中国近年来在南沙群岛修建大批军事设施。
translation.en: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; China has built a large number of military facilities in the Nansha Islands in recent years.
translation.source: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 中国近年来在南沙群岛修建大批军事设施。
translation.medium: The three US aircraft carriers gathered in the waters around China. This is a rare visit by the world’s most powerful weapons. China has built a large number of military facilities on the Nansha Islands in recent years.
translation.reference: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; China has built a large number of military facilities in the Nansha Islands in recent years.

translation.zh: 图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛。
translation.en: The picture shows China’s Yongshu Island in the Nansha Islands.
translation.source: 图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛。
translation.medium: It refers to the Diaoyu Island in the Nansha Islands.
translation.reference: The picture shows China’s Yongshu Island in the Nansha Islands.

translation.zh: （南海研究论坛） 美国海军在声明中称，俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”此次对关岛的访问加强了美国和该地区盟友之间的合作，展示了美国的能力、灵活性、战备状态，以及对印太地区安全与稳定的持续承诺。
translation.en: (South China Sea Research Forum) the U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Ohio class nuclear submarine “Nevada” to Guam strengthened the cooperation between the US and its allies in the region, demonstrated the ability, flexibility, combat readiness of the US, as well as its continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
translation.source: （南海研究论坛） 美国海军在声明中称，俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”此次对关岛的访问加强了美国和该地区盟友之间的合作，展示了美国的能力、灵活性、战备状态，以及对印太地区安全与稳定的持续承诺。
translation.medium: (South China Sea Research Forum) The U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Russian nuclear-powered cruiser "Nevsky" to the Diaoyu Islands has strengthened cooperation between the United States and allies in the region, demonstrating the United States' capabilities, flexibility, combat readiness, and continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
translation.reference: (South China Sea Research Forum) the U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Ohio class nuclear submarine “Nevada” to Guam strengthened the cooperation between the US and its allies in the region, demonstrated the ability, flexibility, combat readiness of the US, as well as its continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.

translation.zh: 弹道导弹潜艇通常被称为“雷鸣潜艇”（Boomer submarine）。
translation.en: Ballistic missile submarines are often called “Boomer submarines”.
translation.source: 弹道导弹潜艇通常被称为“雷鸣潜艇”（Boomer submarine）。
translation.medium: The ballistic missile submarine is usually called the "thunderboat" (Boomer submarine).
translation.reference: Ballistic missile submarines are often called “Boomer submarines”.

translation.zh: 美国海军舰队中14艘“雷鸣潜艇”的行踪通常是被严格保密的。
translation.en: The whereabouts of the 14 “Boomer Submarines” in the US Navy fleet are usually strictly confidential.
translation.source: 美国海军舰队中14艘“雷鸣潜艇”的行踪通常是被严格保密的。
translation.medium: The whereabouts of 14 submarines of the US Navy fleet are usually shrouded in utmost secrecy.
translation.reference: The whereabouts of the 14 “Boomer Submarines” in the US Navy fleet are usually strictly confidential.

translation.zh: 围绕着弹道导弹潜艇的秘密使“雷鸣潜艇”成为“核三位一体中最重要的生存武器”，这一体系还包括位于美国本土的发射井弹道导弹，以及B-2和B-52等可携带核弹头的轰炸机。
translation.en: The secret surrounding ballistic missile submarines makes “Boomer Submarine" the “most important survival weapon in the Nuclear Trinity”; this system also includes launching silo ballistic missile located in the US, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.
translation.source: 围绕着弹道导弹潜艇的秘密使“雷鸣潜艇”成为“核三位一体中最重要的生存武器”，这一体系还包括位于美国本土的发射井弹道导弹，以及B-2和B-52等可携带核弹头的轰炸机。
translation.medium: The secret surrounding the ballistic missile submarine has made the "Thunderboat" become the "most important survival weapon" in the "nuclear triad", which also includes the missile silo-based missiles in the United States, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.
translation.reference: The secret surrounding ballistic missile submarines makes “Boomer Submarine" the “most important survival weapon in the Nuclear Trinity”; this system also includes launching silo ballistic missile located in the US, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.

translation.zh: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
translation.en: I talked to my friend about the recent 26% plunge in Meta and its loss of US $251 billion in market value; Zuckerberg responded that he was “facing unprecedented competition”; why?
translation.source: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
translation.medium: With the recent 26% drop of Meta, the market capitalization of $251 billion, how does Jack Dorsey respond to “unprecedented competition”? Why?
translation.reference: I talked to my friend about the recent 26% plunge in Meta and its loss of US $251 billion in market value; Zuckerberg responded that he was “facing unprecedented competition”; why?

translation.zh: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
translation.en: Meta (formerly Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, whose revenue mainly comes from advertising; the advertising company that makes money today has its own channel for traffic.
translation.source: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
translation.medium: Facebook (the original Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, and its main source of revenue is advertising. It is now a profitable advertising company with its own flow channels.
translation.reference: Meta (formerly Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, whose revenue mainly comes from advertising; the advertising company that makes money today has its own channel for traffic.

translation.zh: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
translation.en: Regardless of its function positioning, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all channels of traffic for Meta.
translation.source: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
translation.medium: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and so on, regardless of any function positioning, are all flow channels for Meta.
translation.reference: Regardless of its function positioning, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all channels of traffic for Meta.

translation.zh: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
translation.en: Not only that, Meta is also the biggest “advertisement alliance”; Many apps are externally connected to Meta’s advertising, and they achieve realization through Meta’s advertising platform.
translation.source: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
translation.medium: Not only that, Meta is also the largest "ad alliance". Many apps outside of Meta achieve advertising revenue through Meta's advertising platform.
translation.reference: Not only that, Meta is also the biggest “advertisement alliance”; Many apps are externally connected to Meta’s advertising, and they achieve realization through Meta’s advertising platform.

translation.zh: 但是，时代变了。
translation.en: But, the time has changed.
translation.source: 但是，时代变了。
translation.medium: However, times have changed.
translation.reference: But, the time has changed.

translation.zh: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
translation.en: First, due to the adjustment of Apple’s privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users’ data information now, which affects the efficiency of advertising.
translation.source: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
translation.medium: First, because of the adjustment of Apple's privacy policy, it is very difficult for Meta to access the user's data information, which affects the efficiency of ad placement.
translation.reference: First, due to the adjustment of Apple’s privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users’ data information now, which affects the efficiency of advertising.

translation.zh: 苹果现在的隐私政策对用户很友好，会很明显的提示用户是否允许 App 获取自己的信息，大多数人的正常反应肯定是不允许。
translation.en: Apple’s current privacy policy is very user-friendly; it will use explicit prompt to ask users whether they allow apps to access their own information; most people’s normal reaction is definitely not to allow it.
translation.source: 苹果现在的隐私政策对用户很友好，会很明显的提示用户是否允许 App 获取自己的信息，大多数人的正常反应肯定是不允许。
translation.medium: Apple's current privacy policy is very user-friendly, providing a clear warning to users about whether they are allowing the app to access their information, and most people's normal reaction is certainly not to allow it.
translation.reference: Apple’s current privacy policy is very user-friendly; it will use explicit prompt to ask users whether they allow apps to access their own information; most people’s normal reaction is definitely not to allow it.

translation.zh: 接下来如果 Google 再捅一刀，对 Meta 的收入影响还会更大。
translation.en: If Google stabs again next, it will have a greater impact on Meta’s revenue.
translation.source: 接下来如果 Google 再捅一刀，对 Meta 的收入影响还会更大。
translation.medium: If Google were to take another slice, the impact on Meta's revenue would be even greater.
translation.reference: If Google stabs again next, it will have a greater impact on Meta’s revenue.

translation.zh: 第二，以前 Meta 的收入增长里的中国因素也弱化了（这个因素的比重不确定有多高，但确实存在）。
translation.en: Second, the Chinese factor in Meta’s revenue growth has also been weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).
translation.source: 第二，以前 Meta 的收入增长里的中国因素也弱化了（这个因素的比重不确定有多高，但确实存在）。
translation.medium: Second, the Chinese factor in the revenue growth of previous Meta has weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).
translation.reference: Second, the Chinese factor in Meta’s revenue growth has also been weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).

translation.zh: 大家平时都知道 Meta 在中国是没有业务的，但是这个理解并不准确。
translation.en: We all know that Meta doesn’t have business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.
translation.source: 大家平时都知道 Meta 在中国是没有业务的，但是这个理解并不准确。
translation.medium: Everyone knows that Meta has no business in China, but this understanding is inaccurate.
translation.reference: We all know that Meta doesn’t have business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.

translation.zh: 每年 Meta 至少10%的收入都来自中国，主要是中国做出海业务的公司贡献的。
translation.en: At least 10% of Meta’s revenue comes from China every year, mainly contributed by Chinese companies engaged in offshore business.
translation.source: 每年 Meta 至少10%的收入都来自中国，主要是中国做出海业务的公司贡献的。
translation.medium: At least 10% of Meta's revenue each year comes from China, mainly from companies that operate ships in China.
translation.reference: At least 10% of Meta’s revenue comes from China every year, mainly contributed by Chinese companies engaged in offshore business.

translation.zh: Meta 在香港的办公室大概几百人，在大陆还有几大代理商。
translation.en: There are around hundreds of staff at its Hong Kong office and several major agents in the mainland.
translation.source: Meta 在香港的办公室大概几百人，在大陆还有几大代理商。
translation.medium: Meta has about 200 staff in its Hong Kong office and a few major agents on the mainland.
translation.reference: There are around hundreds of staff at its Hong Kong office and several major agents in the mainland.

translation.zh: 中国公司想要拓展海外市场，Meta 都是绕不过的广告渠道，烧的钱大多都给了 Meta。
translation.en: When Chinese companies want to expand overseas market, Meta is an advertising channel that cannot be bypassed, and so most of the money is given to Meta.
translation.source: 中国公司想要拓展海外市场，Meta 都是绕不过的广告渠道，烧的钱大多都给了 Meta。
translation.medium: Chinese companies want to expand overseas markets, and Meta is an advertising channel that cannot be ignored. Most of the money spent goes to Meta.
translation.reference: When Chinese companies want to expand overseas market, Meta is an advertising channel that cannot be bypassed, and so most of the money is given to Meta.

translation.zh: 有意思的是，现在字节的 TT 是 Meta 主要的竞争对手之一，但是前两年 Meta 从字节身上可赚到不少钱。
translation.en: Interestingly, the TT of ByteDance now is one of Meta’s main competitors, but Meta made a lot of money from ByteDance in the past two years.
translation.source: 有意思的是，现在字节的 TT 是 Meta 主要的竞争对手之一，但是前两年 Meta 从字节身上可赚到不少钱。
translation.medium: Interestingly, ByteDance's TT is now one of the main competitors of Meta, but Meta earned a lot of money from ByteDance in the past two years.
translation.reference: Interestingly, the TT of ByteDance now is one of Meta’s main competitors, but Meta made a lot of money from ByteDance in the past two years.

translation.zh: 国内各个代理都在帮字节去 Meta 那里投广告，Meta 大中华区的业绩也很不错。
translation.en: All domestic agents are helping ByteDance to do advertising at Meta, and Meta’s performance in Greater China is also very good.
translation.source: 国内各个代理都在帮字节去 Meta 那里投广告，Meta 大中华区的业绩也很不错。
translation.medium: All domestic agencies are helping WeChat go to Meta. The performance of Meta in the Chinese market is also very good.
translation.reference: All domestic agents are helping ByteDance to do advertising at Meta, and Meta’s performance in Greater China is also very good.

translation.zh: 最近我没有专门去了解，但是肯定不会比之前好。
translation.en: I haven’t specifically learned about it recently, but it’s definitely not better than before.
translation.source: 最近我没有专门去了解，但是肯定不会比之前好。
translation.medium: I haven't specifically looked into it recently, but it certainly won't be better than before.
translation.reference: I haven’t specifically learned about it recently, but it’s definitely not better than before.

translation.zh: 中国公司在海外大规模烧钱的阶段已经过去了。
translation.en: The stage when Chinese companies were burning money overseas on a large scale has passed.
translation.source: 中国公司在海外大规模烧钱的阶段已经过去了。
translation.medium: The era of Chinese companies spending large amounts of money overseas is over.
translation.reference: The stage when Chinese companies were burning money overseas on a large scale has passed.

translation.zh: 第三，新的流量渠道拓展不顺利。
translation.en: Third, the expansion of new traffic channels is not smooth.
translation.source: 第三，新的流量渠道拓展不顺利。
translation.medium: Thirdly, new flow channels are not expanding smoothly.
translation.reference: Third, the expansion of new traffic channels is not smooth.

translation.zh: Facebook 越来越老了，新的包括 TT 在内的平台，都不在 Meta 手中。
translation.en: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms including TT is not in the hands of Meta.
translation.source: Facebook 越来越老了，新的包括 TT 在内的平台，都不在 Meta 手中。
translation.medium: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms, including TT, are not in the hands of Meta.
translation.reference: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms including TT is not in the hands of Meta.

translation.zh: 最大的问题不仅仅是收入下滑，而是缺乏增长预期。
translation.en: The biggest problem is not the decline of revenue but lack of growth expectation.
translation.source: 最大的问题不仅仅是收入下滑，而是缺乏增长预期。
translation.medium: The biggest problem is not just a decline in income, but a lack of growth expectations.
translation.reference: The biggest problem is not the decline of revenue but lack of growth expectation.

translation.zh: 资本市场不仅仅看中收入，更重要的是看未来的预期怎么样。
translation.en: The capital market not only focuses on income; more importantly, it depends on future expectations.
translation.source: 资本市场不仅仅看中收入，更重要的是看未来的预期怎么样。
translation.medium: The capital market doesn't just look at current income, it's more important to look at future expectations.
translation.reference: The capital market not only focuses on income; more importantly, it depends on future expectations.

translation.zh: 很显然，Meta 的预期是不够的。
translation.en: Obviously, the expectation for Meta is not enough.
translation.source: 很显然，Meta 的预期是不够的。
translation.medium: Clearly, Meta's ambitions are not enough.
translation.reference: Obviously, the expectation for Meta is not enough.

translation.zh: 为了给市场讲出新的故事，扎克伯格讲了 “元宇宙”.
translation.en: In order to tell new stories to the market, Zuckerberg told the story about “Meta-universe”.
translation.source: 为了给市场讲出新的故事，扎克伯格讲了 “元宇宙”.
translation.medium: In order to tell a new story to the market, Zuckerberg talked about "metaverse".
translation.reference: In order to tell new stories to the market, Zuckerberg told the story about “Meta-universe”.

translation.zh: 元宇宙确实应该是未来的方向之一，但是元宇宙的实现周期比较长，这个故事在这两三年应该不足以支撑起 Meta 的市值。
translation.en: Meta-universe indeed should be one of the future directions, but the period of the realization of Meta-universe is long, and this story is not sufficient to support the market value of Meta.
translation.source: 元宇宙确实应该是未来的方向之一，但是元宇宙的实现周期比较长，这个故事在这两三年应该不足以支撑起 Meta 的市值。
translation.medium: The realization of the metaverse indeed is one of the future directions, but the realization period of the metaverse is relatively long. This story is unlikely to support the market valuation of Meta in these two to three years.
translation.reference: Meta-universe indeed should be one of the future directions, but the period of the realization of Meta-universe is long, and this story is not sufficient to support the market value of Meta.

translation.zh: 所以未来这两年，应该是 Meta 比较艰难的时期。
translation.en: Therefore, the next two years should be a difficult time for Meta.
translation.source: 所以未来这两年，应该是 Meta 比较艰难的时期。
translation.medium: So the next two years should be a difficult period for Meta.
translation.reference: Therefore, the next two years should be a difficult time for Meta.

translation.zh: 别看脸书现在非常的风光，每年也有1,000亿到2,000亿美元的收入，实际上脸书现在危机感非常强，跟其他的互联网企业和高科技公司相比，没有什么好的安全的护城河。
translation.en: Although Facebook is very popular now with an annual income of US $100 billion to $200 billion; in fact, Facebook has a strong sense of crisis; compared with other Internet companies and high-tech companies, there is not any good security moat.
translation.source: 别看脸书现在非常的风光，每年也有1,000亿到2,000亿美元的收入，实际上脸书现在危机感非常强，跟其他的互联网企业和高科技公司相比，没有什么好的安全的护城河。
translation.medium: Facebook may now look very glamorous, but it is actually in deep crisis, with revenue of US$100 billion to US$200 billion each year. Compared with other Internet enterprises and high-tech companies, it has no good safe moat.
translation.reference: Although Facebook is very popular now with an annual income of US $100 billion to $200 billion; in fact, Facebook has a strong sense of crisis; compared with other Internet companies and high-tech companies, there is not any good security moat.

translation.zh: 虽然他的几款社交软件现在的日活比较高，也是主流的社交软件，比如Facebook，WhatsApp等等，但是面对tiktok的快速发展，脸书也没有什么信心，颠覆之间也就是眨眼的功夫。
translation.en: Although the DAU of several of his social software is relatively high, and they are mainstream social software such as Facebook, WhatsApp; however, in the face of the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook has little confidence, and subversion could happen in the blink of an eye.
translation.source: 虽然他的几款社交软件现在的日活比较高，也是主流的社交软件，比如Facebook，WhatsApp等等，但是面对tiktok的快速发展，脸书也没有什么信心，颠覆之间也就是眨眼的功夫。
translation.medium: Although his several social software are quite popular now and are mainstream social software, such as Facebook, WhatsApp and so on, facing the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook also has no confidence and the competition is just a flash in the pan.
translation.reference: Although the DAU of several of his social software is relatively high, and they are mainstream social software such as Facebook, WhatsApp; however, in the face of the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook has little confidence, and subversion could happen in the blink of an eye.

translation.zh: 而搞元宇宙这个可望而不可及的概念，短时间之内完全没有成功的希望，因此脸书非常的危险，这也是为什么扎克伯格又是换公司的名字，又是不停的寻找新的赛道的根本原因，但是我觉得他的赛道选择是错的，是一条不归路 以上是我的一些思考，供参考。
translation.en: The unattainable concept of meta universe has no hope of success in a short time, so Facebook is in danger; this is also the fundamental reason why Zuckerberg changed the name of the company and kept looking for new tracks, but I think his choice is wrong and there is no way back; the above is some of my thoughts for reference.
translation.source: 而搞元宇宙这个可望而不可及的概念，短时间之内完全没有成功的希望，因此脸书非常的危险，这也是为什么扎克伯格又是换公司的名字，又是不停的寻找新的赛道的根本原因，但是我觉得他的赛道选择是错的，是一条不归路 以上是我的一些思考，供参考。
translation.medium: The concept of the yuan universe, which is desirable but unattainable, has no hope of success in a short time, so Facebook is very dangerous. This is also why Zuckerberg has changed the company's name and is constantly looking for new business opportunities. However, I think his business choice is wrong, it is a dead-end road. This is my thinking, for reference.
translation.reference: The unattainable concept of meta universe has no hope of success in a short time, so Facebook is in danger; this is also the fundamental reason why Zuckerberg changed the name of the company and kept looking for new tracks, but I think his choice is wrong and there is no way back; the above is some of my thoughts for reference.

translation.zh: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
translation.en: Article 17 The state implements the registration and practice management system for the qualification of certified Fire Engineers.
translation.source: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
translation.medium: Article 17: The state implements a registration and employment management system for registered fire protection engineers.
translation.reference: Article 17 The state implements the registration and practice management system for the qualification of certified Fire Engineers.

translation.zh: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
translation.en: People who obtained the Level 1 and Level 2 qualification certificates of registered Fire Engineers can practice in the name of registered Fire Engineers of corresponding level.
translation.source: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
translation.medium: People who have obtained Grade I and Grade II qualification certificates for fire protection engineers may correspondingly register the name of fire protection engineers at the corresponding level.
translation.reference: People who obtained the Level 1 and Level 2 qualification certificates of registered Fire Engineers can practice in the name of registered Fire Engineers of corresponding level.

translation.zh: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
translation.en: Article 18 The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration and approval department of the qualification of Level 1 registered Fire Engineer.
translation.source: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
translation.medium: Article 18: The Fire Prevention Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration approval department for the registration of fire prevention engineer qualifications.
translation.reference: Article 18 The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration and approval department of the qualification of Level 1 registered Fire Engineer.

translation.zh: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
translation.en: The fire departments of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government are the registration and approval departments for the qualification of Level 2 registered Fire Engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the qualification of registration of Level 1 registered Fire Engineers.
translation.source: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
translation.medium: The public security bureaus of provinces, autonomous regions, and directly governed municipalities are the registration approval departments for secondary registered fire protection engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the registration of primary registered fire protection engineers.
translation.reference: The fire departments of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government are the registration and approval departments for the qualification of Level 2 registered Fire Engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the qualification of registration of Level 1 registered Fire Engineers.

translation.zh: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
translation.en: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer and applies for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technical service institution or key fire safety unit, and the employer shall submit registration application materials to the fire protection institution of the public security organ in the place where the employer is located (if the employer is an enterprise, it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration is located).
translation.source: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
translation.medium: Article 19: Persons who have obtained Grade I and Grade II fire protection engineering technician qualification certificates and applied for registration shall be employed by an approved fire technology service agency or fire safety key unit, and the employing unit shall submit registration application materials to the public security organ at the location of the employing unit (if the employing unit is an enterprise, through the enterprise to the location of the employing unit).
translation.reference: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer and applies for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technical service institution or key fire safety unit, and the employer shall submit registration application materials to the fire protection institution of the public security organ in the place where the employer is located (if the employer is an enterprise, it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration is located).

translation.zh: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
translation.en: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant, the fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected all at once on the spot or within 5 working days if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form; if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted from the date of receiving the application materials.
translation.source: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
translation.medium: Article 20: The public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities shall, within 5 working days from the date of receiving the registration application documents from the applicant, notify the applicant of the entire content that needs to be supplemented, if the application documents are incomplete or do not meet the statutory form. If no notice is given within the above time limit, the application shall be deemed accepted as of the date of receipt of the application documents.
translation.reference: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant, the fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected all at once on the spot or within 5 working days if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form; if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted from the date of receiving the application materials.

translation.zh: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
translation.en: For the registration applications that are accepted or rejected, a written certificate stamped with the special seal of the fire protection institution of the public security organ at the same level and date shall be issued.
translation.source: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
translation.medium: Registration applications, whether accepted or not, shall be accompanied by a written certificate issued by the fire protection agency of the primary-level public security organ and indicating the date.
translation.reference: For the registration applications that are accepted or rejected, a written certificate stamped with the special seal of the fire protection institution of the public security organ at the same level and date shall be issued.

translation.zh: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
translation.en: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall, within 20 working days after the date of accepting the registration application, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the registration and approval of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification according to the specified conditions and procedures, and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security for approval.
translation.source: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
translation.medium: Article 21: The public security organ of the province, autonomous region, and directly governed city shall, within 20 working days from the date of acceptance of registration application, complete the preliminary examination of the qualification registration application materials for Grade I fire protection engineers and the registration approval work for Grade II fire protection engineers in accordance with the prescribed conditions and procedures, and shall submit the preliminary examination opinions to the public security department for approval.
translation.reference: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall, within 20 working days after the date of accepting the registration application, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the registration and approval of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification according to the specified conditions and procedures, and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security for approval.

translation.zh: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
translation.en: The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall make a decision on whether to approve or not within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application materials and preliminary review opinions submitted by the Fire Department of the provincial public security organ.
translation.source: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
translation.medium: The fire bureau of the Ministry of Public Security should make a decision whether to approve or not within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application documents and preliminary review opinions reported by the fire prevention agencies of the provincial public security department.
translation.reference: The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall make a decision on whether to approve or not within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application materials and preliminary review opinions submitted by the Fire Department of the provincial public security organ.

translation.zh: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
translation.en: If the approval decision cannot be made within the prescribed time limit, the applicant shall be informed of the extended time limit and the reason.
translation.source: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
translation.medium: The approval decision cannot be made within the prescribed time limit. The extended time limit and reason should be notified to the applicant.
translation.reference: If the approval decision cannot be made within the prescribed time limit, the applicant shall be informed of the extended time limit and the reason.

translation.zh: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
translation.en: If the decision of disapproval is made, the reasons shall be explained in writing, and the applicant shall be informed of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or file an administrative lawsuit according to law.
translation.source: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
translation.medium: Decisions not to approve should be documented with reasons and the applicant should be informed of their right to seek administrative review or file an administrative lawsuit in accordance with the law.
translation.reference: If the decision of disapproval is made, the reasons shall be explained in writing, and the applicant shall be informed of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or file an administrative lawsuit according to law.

translation.zh: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
translation.en: Article 22 The registration review and approval department shall issue and deliver the registration certificate of the corresponding level within 10 working days from the date of making the approval decision.
translation.source: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
translation.medium: Article 22: The registration approval department shall issue and deliver corresponding registration certificates within 10 working days from the date of approval decision.
translation.reference: Article 22 The registration review and approval department shall issue and deliver the registration certificate of the corresponding level within 10 working days from the date of making the approval decision.

translation.zh: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
translation.en: Article 23 The period of validity is 3 years for each registration period of the registration certificate.
translation.source: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
translation.medium: Article 23 Each registration certificate is valid for 3 years.
translation.reference: Article 23 The period of validity is 3 years for each registration period of the registration certificate.

translation.zh: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
translation.en: The registration certificate is the practicing certificate of the registered Fire Engineer of the corresponding level within the period of validity, which is kept and used by the registered Fire Engineer themselves.
translation.source: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
translation.medium: The registration certificate is a practicing certificate for the corresponding level of registered fire protection engineers, which shall be kept and used by the registered fire protection engineer himself/herself.
translation.reference: The registration certificate is the practicing certificate of the registered Fire Engineer of the corresponding level within the period of validity, which is kept and used by the registered Fire Engineer themselves.

translation.zh: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
translation.en: Article 24 Initial registration shall be applied within 1 year from the date of obtaining the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer.
translation.source: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
translation.medium: Article 24: Applications for initial registration should be submitted within one year from the date of obtaining a Grade I or Grade II fire protection engineering technician qualification certificate.
translation.reference: Article 24 Initial registration shall be applied within 1 year from the date of obtaining the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer.

translation.zh: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
translation.en: When applying for initial registration beyond the time limit, it must meet the requirements on continuing education in this Regulation.
translation.source: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
translation.medium: When applying for initial registration beyond the deadline, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements prescribed by this regulation.
translation.reference: When applying for initial registration beyond the time limit, it must meet the requirements on continuing education in this Regulation.

translation.zh: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
translation.en: The specific measures for registration administration of initial registration, continuation of registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration and not-approved registration shall be separately formulated by the Ministry of Public Security.
translation.source: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
translation.medium: The specific methods of registration management, such as initial registration, renewal registration, change registration, deregistration, and non-registration, are prescribed by other regulations of the Ministry of Public Security.
translation.reference: The specific measures for registration administration of initial registration, continuation of registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration and not-approved registration shall be separately formulated by the Ministry of Public Security.

translation.zh: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
translation.en: Article 25 Continuation of Education is a necessary condition for the continuation of registration, re-registration and overdue initial registration of registered Fire Engineers.
translation.source: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
translation.medium: Article 25 Continuing education is a prerequisite for the renewal, re-registration, and initial registration of fire protection engineers.
translation.reference: Article 25 Continuation of Education is a necessary condition for the continuation of registration, re-registration and overdue initial registration of registered Fire Engineers.

translation.zh: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
translation.en: Within the period of validity of each registration, registered Fire Engineer of different levels shall complete the corresponding continuation of education according to the regulations.
translation.source: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
translation.medium: During each valid registration period, fire protection engineers at all levels should complete the corresponding continuing education in accordance with regulations.
translation.reference: Within the period of validity of each registration, registered Fire Engineer of different levels shall complete the corresponding continuation of education according to the regulations.

translation.zh: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
translation.en: Article 26 The registration review and approval department shall timely announce the registration of registered Fire Engineers to the public, establish the integrity archives of registered Fire Engineers, and implement credit management on their practices.
translation.source: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
translation.medium: Article 26 The department in charge of registration shall promptly announce the registration of fire protection engineers to the public, establish a register of fire protection engineers, and implement credit management for their professional activities.
translation.reference: Article 26 The registration review and approval department shall timely announce the registration of registered Fire Engineers to the public, establish the integrity archives of registered Fire Engineers, and implement credit management on their practices.

translation.zh: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
translation.en: Article 27 The registration administration departments for the qualification of registered Fire Engineers at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative License Law of the people’s Republic of China.
translation.source: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
translation.medium: Article 27: The registration management department at all levels for fire protection engineering shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative License Law of the People's Republic of China.
translation.reference: Article 27 The registration administration departments for the qualification of registered Fire Engineers at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative License Law of the people’s Republic of China.

translation.zh: 今日的考试资讯分享到此为止，希望能给大家一些帮助。
translation.en: This is the end of the sharing of today’s examination information; I hope this will be helpful to you.
translation.source: 今日的考试资讯分享到此为止，希望能给大家一些帮助。
translation.medium: Today's exam information is shared here. I hope it can help you.
translation.reference: This is the end of the sharing of today’s examination information; I hope this will be helpful to you.

translation.zh: 大家一定要努力备考，争取早日通过消防工程师考试！
translation.en: Everyone, please work hard on this and hopefully you will pass the Fire Engineer examination soon!
translation.source: 大家一定要努力备考，争取早日通过消防工程师考试！
translation.medium: Everyone must work hard and strive to pass the fire protection engineer exam as soon as possible!
translation.reference: Everyone, please work hard on this and hopefully you will pass the Fire Engineer examination soon!

translation.zh: 实时分享金融/财会/建筑最新考试资讯。
translation.en: Real time sharing of the latest examination information of Finance/ Accounting/Architecture.
translation.source: 实时分享金融/财会/建筑最新考试资讯。
translation.medium: Provide the latest exam information in finance/accounting/construction.
translation.reference: Real time sharing of the latest examination information of Finance/ Accounting/Architecture.

translation.zh: 我取消～等了好久
translation.en: I’ll cancel it~ I’ve waited for a long time.
translation.source: 我取消～等了好久
translation.medium: I cancelled ~ after waiting for a long time.
translation.reference: I’ll cancel it~ I’ve waited for a long time.

translation.zh: 你们不停推迟
translation.en: You kept putting it off.
translation.source: 你们不停推迟
translation.medium: You are always delaying
translation.reference: You kept putting it off.

translation.zh: 但口水鸡整盒是生肉，没办法吃，是否可以退款
translation.en: But the Poached Chicken in Chili Sauce is just a box of inedible raw chicken, and can I get a refund for it?
translation.source: 但口水鸡整盒是生肉，没办法吃，是否可以退款
translation.medium: I received a whole box of live chickens, what can I do? Can I return it?
translation.reference: But the Poached Chicken in Chili Sauce is just a box of inedible raw chicken, and can I get a refund for it?

translation.zh: 菠萝、玉子烧、馒头都没有到，#PRS_ORG# 退了 #NUMBER# 元
translation.en: Pineapple, tamagoyaki and steamed buns have not arrived, #PRS_ORG# returned #NUMBER# yuan
translation.source: 菠萝、玉子烧、馒头都没有到，#PRS_ORG# 退了 #NUMBER# 元
translation.medium: There was no pear, persimmon or chestnut, and PRS ORG withdrew #NUMBER#元.
translation.reference: Pineapple, tamagoyaki and steamed buns have not arrived, #PRS_ORG# returned #NUMBER# yuan

translation.zh: 但口水鸡是否可退款
translation.en: But can I ask for a refund of the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce?
translation.source: 但口水鸡是否可退款
translation.medium: Whether KFC can give a refund
translation.reference: But can I ask for a refund of the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce?

translation.zh: 因为生到没办法吃
translation.en: Because it is so raw that it is not edible.
translation.source: 因为生到没办法吃
translation.medium: There was no way to eat it.
translation.reference: Because it is so raw that it is not edible.

translation.zh: 我如果想取消？可以吗？
translation.en: If I want to cancel it? Is it okay?
translation.source: 我如果想取消？可以吗？
translation.medium: Can I cancel?
translation.reference: If I want to cancel it? Is it okay?

translation.zh: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
translation.en: The “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam completed successfully - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
translation.medium: The joint military exercise "Peace Rescue-2021" between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies successfully concluded - Xinhua
translation.reference: The “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam completed successfully - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Hanoi on December 12 (journalists: Zhou Na and Teng Huaijin): in the morning of December 12, all the Chinese squads participating in the “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam returned to Guangxi, China, indicating the successful completion of exercise and training tasks which lasted 7 days.
translation.source: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 12 wire (Wen Na) On the morning of December 12, the Chinese participating force in the “Peace Rescue-2021” joint exercise of the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries returned safely to the Chinese territory of Guangxi, marking the successful completion of the 7-day training mission.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Hanoi on December 12 (journalists: Zhou Na and Teng Huaijin): in the morning of December 12, all the Chinese squads participating in the “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam returned to Guangxi, China, indicating the successful completion of exercise and training tasks which lasted 7 days.

translation.zh: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
translation.en: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam completed joint military health service command, joint field rescue, batched treatment of the wounded and other content according to practical combat standard on the major topic of humanitarian medical assistance and the mission of healing the wounded and rescuing the dying; it effectively improved the military health service support ability of the two armies.
translation.source: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
translation.medium: In this joint exercise, the Chinese and Vietnamese soldiers focused on the theme of humanitarian medical aid and tightened their grip on the missions of rescuing the dying and treating the injured. They completed the content of joint field command, joint first-aid, mass casualty treatment and other courses in accordance with the standard of actual war, effectively improving the joint medical security ability of the two armies.
translation.reference: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam completed joint military health service command, joint field rescue, batched treatment of the wounded and other content according to practical combat standard on the major topic of humanitarian medical assistance and the mission of healing the wounded and rescuing the dying; it effectively improved the military health service support ability of the two armies.

translation.zh: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
translation.en: The results of the exercise have won recognition from both armies of China and Vietnam.
translation.source: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
translation.medium: The results of the exercise won the affirmation of both Chinese and Vietnamese armies.
translation.reference: The results of the exercise have won recognition from both armies of China and Vietnam.

translation.zh: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
translation.en: Ruan Xiongsheng, Director of the Exercise Guiding Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director and the Chief of Staff of the Administration of Logistics of People’s Army of Vietnam, said at the ending ceremony that military doctors of Vietnam learned knowledge about exercise organization and specialized activities from military doctors of China, and widened their knowledge of medical and logistics equipment of China.
translation.source: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
translation.medium: Nguyen Xuan Son, head of the Vietnamese delegation and deputy chief of the Logistics Department of the General Staff of the Vietnam People's Army, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that through this exercise, Vietnamese military doctors learned from Chinese military doctors about the organization and professional activities, and also gained knowledge of Chinese medicine and medical equipment.
translation.reference: Ruan Xiongsheng, Director of the Exercise Guiding Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director and the Chief of Staff of the Administration of Logistics of People’s Army of Vietnam, said at the ending ceremony that military doctors of Vietnam learned knowledge about exercise organization and specialized activities from military doctors of China, and widened their knowledge of medical and logistics equipment of China.

translation.zh: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
translation.en: The achievements made from the exercise proved the specialized ability of military doctors of two countries on medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
translation.source: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
translation.medium: The results of the exercise prove the professional capabilities of the military medical forces of both countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention.
translation.reference: The achievements made from the exercise proved the specialized ability of military doctors of two countries on medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

translation.zh: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
translation.en: According to Chen Chunming, leader of Guidance and Coordination Group of China and Deputy Director of Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, the exercise is another pioneering practice based on the joint voluntary clinics event held in 2018, which has an essential milestone significance.
translation.source: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
translation.medium: Chen Chunming, deputy director of the Health Bureau of the Logistics Department of the Central Military Commission, said that this exercise is another attempt to explore innovative practices on the basis of successfully holding joint medical activities in 2018. It is of great significance as a milestone.
translation.reference: According to Chen Chunming, leader of Guidance and Coordination Group of China and Deputy Director of Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, the exercise is another pioneering practice based on the joint voluntary clinics event held in 2018, which has an essential milestone significance.

translation.zh: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
translation.en: During the exercise, Chinese People’s Liberation Army donated health and epidemic prevention materials such as medical masks, medical protective suits and quick nucleic acid detectors to People’s Army of Vietnam.
translation.source: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
translation.medium: During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid detection instruments to the Vietnam People's Army.
translation.reference: During the exercise, Chinese People’s Liberation Army donated health and epidemic prevention materials such as medical masks, medical protective suits and quick nucleic acid detectors to People’s Army of Vietnam.
